story:
Summary

My name is Sean Bryan and I'm most known for my participation in the NBC show American Ninja Warrior, where I have taken on the identity of the "Papal Ninja." I have also been called to a ministry known as the Lay Mission Project. 

As a public figure, I am privileged to give talks around the country, inspiring and motivating youth and adults alike. Often I am asked where Papal Ninja gear could be purchased, and I respond by saying "papalninja.com." The apparel on the website is made-to order, so I do not have to front the money to hold a stock of inventory. However, because of the lack of "conversion" from in-person impulse demand to online ordering and waiting 2 weeks for delivery, I find it important to front some money for a small stock of inventory with which I can travel. 

The manufacturer of the shirts on papalninja.com is different than the one that makes the gear I wear on the show. This is because of price & convenience factors. The shirts on papalninja.com are less expensive, and the workflow is such that the manufacturer handles all the ordering and shipping details. However, I have received many requests for the "bioactive" polyester shirts & the sleek jacket that I wear at competitions. Because they are more expensive, it is also very difficult to keep a supply of these for in-person availability at talks and competitions. 

Your contribution to this campaign will make it possible for kids to proudly sport the faith, while kids and adults alike can support me, and the ministry I've been entrusted.

Apparel

The apparel on offer as "perks" for this campaign are the higher-end running shirts and jacket. 

The shirts are manufactured from non-chafing soft materials that will not shrink. The bioactive polyester Run-Tex fabric wicks excess moisture, keeping you dry, so you'll be able to play longer without getting overheated. 

The soft-shell jacket has a wind resistant membrane that allows moisture to escape while keeping the cold out. It’s lightweight and features two zipper pockets, two interior pockets, elastic side panels, thin stylish reflectors on each arm, and a drawstring around the waist.

3D Renderings

The above pictures are snapshots of the three-dimensional renderings which can be viewed at the following links: 

“Mozzetta Shirt” (Unisex)

Vatican Flag Shirt (Women's cut)

Vatican Flag Shirt (Men's cut)

Mozzetta Jacket

Again, more apparel such as cotton shirts and hoodies, and laptop cases are always readily ordered at http://papalninja.com .  However, the above shirts and jacket are only available during this special IndieGoGo campaign.

 

The Need

In order to have an adequate inventory to supply for the demands of the people who attend my talks, and the fans who come to the competitions, I need to raise at least $1500 more than the cost of the shirts themselves. Supporters can either contribute enough to cover their own "perks," or they can contribute an additional amount to help fund this inventory campaign.

Profit Margins?
I do not make money off apparel. All surplus funds toward making the Papal Ninja buttons (mentioned at the end of the campaign video) to encourage the youth whom I encounter. My markup per shirt on papalninja.com is about $4. This is enough to make about 16 buttons to give away. Thus far I have given away around 4,500 buttons, and have an inventory of roughly 1,000. I also give away shirts and autographed glossy's that cost quite a bit. Doing the math, around $1,375 has been invested into giving away buttons, and I several hundred dollars worth of shirts and other giveaways; it may seem like a lot, but you should se the kids' faces when I give them a glossy, or a shirt, or even a button!!! If the shirts become more popular that expected, and the surplus from the shirts exceeds what's needed to make the buttons, I will lower the prices of the shirts on papalninja.com, or find another way to invest the money strictly for the good of the youth to whom I'm sent.

 

How do I claim more than one perk?

Most IndieGoGo projects offer "perks" as a thank you for backing a campaign. If you would like more than one perk, you can do this too!

  • If just want one perk (including one perk that includes multiple of the same item, i.e. 2 mozzetta shirts) and you do not want to donate any additional funds to the campaign, you can simply click one of the links on the right that say "get this perk."
  • If you want multiple perks, or if you want to simply donate more money to help fund the inventory I need, then use the option at the top right that says "Back It." When you click that button, you can enter your donation amount. Keep in mind that in order to obtain perks through this method, you should include shipping costs (listed in the details of each perk). 

 

Risks & Challenges

There is zero risk for you! I will fulfill all backers' "perks," even if I don't reach my goal. Additionally, if my inadequacies in marketing result in a weak campaign, I find it more important to provide for the demands of the fans than to deprive them of the psycho-spiritual benefits they receive from sporting Papal Ninja gear, so if necessary, I will be going out-of-pocket for the inventory!

I know some people just aren't in the financial position to contribute, and if that's you, there are other ways, you can help:

  • Prayers are effective, and much appreciated!
  • Comments of encouragement on my social pages keep me focused on the mission
  • Get the word out! IndieGoGo has share tools to make this easy to share this campaign on social media.

 

Sizing

Please read this section carefully! The shirts are rather expensive to make a sizing error. The size charts below are manufacturer suggestions only, and were designed for casual wear. If you want more of a slim-fit athletic look, choose one or even two number sizes smaller. For example, Sean Bryan’s chest size is on the below chart is on the border between a size 7 and 8, but for competition he wears a size 6. So if you want a slim-fit or athletic look and are right in the middle of a shirt size, then perhaps one number size smaller is right for you. If you are on the boarder between sizes and want that same look, perhaps 2 sizes smaller is good for you. If you want the casual, relaxed fit, then the chart's sizing is fairly accurate. Remember, these shirts will not shrink.

Note: Due to IndieGoGo's limitations on the number of options perks may have, when selecting your size, you will have to choose not only your size in the correct "Size Range," but you also need to select "other" in the other two size ranges. Sorry for the inconvenience, but it will make more sense when you get to that step.

Jacket & Mozzetta Shirt Sizing
Both men and women  refer to “men’s tops” sizes for both the “Mozzetta Jacket” and the “Mozzetta Shirt.”

 

Vatican Flag Shirt Sizing

 You may refer to both “men’s top” and “women’s top” sizes respectively. The “women’s top” sizes are designed for women with more of an hourglass shape or athletic build. For women without these particular builds, it’s better to refer to specify a “men’s top” size in the perks options when claiming a perk.

 

Bonus Videos - Season 9 Spotlights

These videos have additional content not available on the official YouTube videos, and will only be available during this campaign. So share this campaign if you want to show the Papal Ninja's backstory with your friends.

LA City Finals

 
National Finals – Stage 2

 

 

Contact

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me at:

sean@papalninja.com

story:
A LITTLE BACKGROUND...

Brand founders Germanee and Krystal born in 1991 reign from Charlotte, North Carolina. After college, both ventured off to different parts of the country to pursue their career in Fashion. Being away from home made them realize how important their roots were and to appreciate the values that were instilled along the way.  As they stand at the intersection of where they are and where they are destined to be, the inception of 91+North began. The two wanted to pay homage to Charlotte, while celebrating women who are determined to achieve their success. 

Your support in our campaign will help us continue to celebrate and empower women, not just from Charlotte, but all those dedicated to obtaining their success. 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET...

We have raised capital ourselves, however, we would love your support in helping us to get our brand off the ground. 

We have created tiers of thanks ranging from personal 'shout outs' via social media channels to providing t-shirts as gratitude.  All funds will go towards the printing and production of our t-shirts. Once we launch, we plan to give a percentage of our proceeds to a girls empowerment non-profit organization in the Charlotte area to help foster and encourage young girls to live out their dreams.

SNAP SHOT OF PERKS( READ PERKS FOR FURTHER DETAILS):

  • $10 Thank You 
  • $25 Recieve gift bag at launch party as a token of appreciation.
  • $50 Get Signature Tee + Invitation to 91+North Launch Party 
  • $75 Choose any 1 91+North T-Shirt + Invitation to 91+North Launch Party
  • $100 Choose any 2 91+North T-Shirt(s) + Invitation to 91+North Launch Party
T-SHIRT INFORMATION:
Please note that all designs have been trademarked are legally owned by 91+North.

story:
Hi there! We're OTGbaby.

We design innovative premium diaper bags for the active family.

The Go Bag is a Diaper Changing Backpack that features patented technology and a portable changing station that's hidden inside this stylish diaper bag.

We provide parents with a safe, clean place to confidently change their baby on-the-go. To preorder our Diaper Changing Backpack, click Back This Project. Or read on!

How we got started:

OTGbaby was founded by Brett Guterman who was a high school student when he discovered a gap in the diaper bag market. It might sound silly right? 

But Brett learned from his friends who were babysitting that it was difficult to find a safe, clean, comfortable place to change a diaper when traveling with a baby. Moms reported that even going to a park was worrisome, because there are so few safe, clean places to change a baby when away from home.

So after becoming an Uncle, he decided to change that.

His mentor, entrepreneur and mom Barbara (now a new grandmother herself) later joined him to address that market need and launched OTGbaby to create an innovative diaper bag backpack that has a hidden changing station for on-the-go diaper changes anytime, anywhere, even when you're at Grandma's house. 

Why we made this:

The OTGbaby team conducted focus groups across the US and identified what moms and dads really want in a portable diaper changing station: lots of storage, easy to use when you're away from home, everything you need for diaper changes, and stylish design.

As we created The Go Bag, we’ve addressed each of these areas to create the perfect diaper changing backpack for active families. With a patented design and built-in diaper changing station, this lightweight bag – made from vegan leather – will instantly be your favorite diaper bag backpack for traveling with your baby.

 

Face it, a baby's diaper needs to be changed up to 10 times a day, no matter where you might be. Whether you’re at a coffee shop, in a park, on a hike, or even at a friend’s backyard barbecue, you shouldn’t have to ask yourself, “Can I change my baby here?” 

The Diaper Changing Backpack by OTGbaby puts you in control of diaper changes when you're traveling with baby. Made from 100% vegan leather with a built-in, water-repellant diaper changing station that unzips in seconds so moms and dads can be ready for on-the-go diaper changes anytime, anywhere. 

Designed with a stylish gender neutral exterior, this backpack is perfect for mom or dad. And since, dad's have an especially tough time while on-the-go, as there are rarely (or no) changing tables in men’s rooms, this is the most friendly diaper bag on the planet!

 

Not your every day diaper bag!

It's not just the stylish look and large capacity that makes the bag unique, this clever diaper bag backpack has a hidden changing station that unzips for on-the-go diaper changes anytime, anywhere. The Go Bag by OTGbaby is not your everyday diaper bag, it's the diaper changing backpack you never knew you needed (until now)!

Exterior:

Designed with active families in mind, this bag is lightweight and luxurious featuring sleek lines, vegan leather and locking YKK zippers. With multiple compartments and in 3 fashion-forward color options, there's no sacrificing style here!

  • 13.5” wide x 18” high x 4” deep
  • 26” adjustable padded backpack straps
  • 4” top handle drop
  • Lightweight, weighs less than 2 lbs
  • Unzips to 36" long changing pad
  • Magnetic metal clasp to hold top pocket down
  • Stroller straps to connect to stroller

Interior: 

The interior of the OTGbaby diaper bag fully unzips to feature an integral 36 inch long cushioned changing pad for your baby. The interior fabric is made of a soft taffeta nylon that is water repellent and won’t absorb fluids. 

  • Lots of storage with 7 spacious pockets 
  • Spacious back pocket fits books, blankets, toys and your laptop computer
  • 2 additional enclosed front pockets for diapers, wipes and other baby items
  • 1 insulated bottle pocket
  • Mesh insert pocket to keep you organized

Built-In Diaper Changing Station:

Exclusive to our bag is a proprietary built-in changing pad that provides worry-free diaper changing. This fully cushioned 36-inch changing station is perfect from infant to toddler. No more flimsy changing pads and no more searching for a clean or convenient place to change your baby when you are on-the-go.   

So Stylish You'd Never Know It's a Diaper Bag!

The Go Bag by OTGbaby was fashionably designed based on input from hundreds of moms who want to look and feel good while carrying their diaper bag backpack. The streamlined patented design is lightweight and features sleek lines, luxe vegan leather and custom YKK zippers. The rounded corners, magnetic front closure and neutral color scheme makes this the bag all the new parents are talking about. 

When we started planning for our crowdfunding campaign launch we knew we wanted to be more than a company that sells a product. We want to be a company that makes a difference in the world around us.

Because we understand how important it is to let children know that they are loved and that they matter,  we want to give our customers the opportunity to be a part of our mission as well. To do our part to help children in need, we have partnered with Comfort Cases to help bring a little love to kids in Foster Care. For every OTGbaby product purchased, we will donate a requested baby item including a backpack, blanket, pajamas or a stuffed toy to a child in need. 

Join us in helping to bring dignity and love to these special kids.

With the support of parents across the United States, OTGbaby is excited to bring our first product to market so every parent can experience worry-free diaper changing. 

The founders of OTGbaby, Brett and Barbara Guterman, are a mother and son duo who set out to make diaper changing worry-free for active families. Barbara joined the company to help ensure that the product details were mom-approved and that manufacturing was top-notch.

Armed with this amazing design and the support of awesome crowd funding backers, we’re excited to bring you an innovative and uniquely patented diaper bag backpack that offers the most worry-free diaper changing for active families, ever! 

Stretch goals are a way for us to add more fun features to the diaper bag as we get more funding. A stretch goal is a funding target set beyond our original Kickstarter goal of $15,000.

Once we hit a stretch goal, features associated with that stretch goal can be produced and become available to our backers. All backers who have pledged on a reward tier with a pre-ordered diaper bag are automatically eligible for these free upgrades once the stretch goal is met.

We'll unlock these cool new colors when we reach the $25,000 mark in our campaign.

You can help us meet our stretch goals and unlock cool features by spreading the word about the diaper bag! Tell your friends, share online, and more! You are also welcome to increase your pledge in order to help us meet a stretch goal.

What are you waiting for? With the Go Bag by OTGbaby, you are in control of on-the-go diaper changes. This clever diaper bag backpack has a hidden changing station that unzips in seconds for safe, clean diaper changes anytime, anywhere.  Just click the hot pink BACK IT button at the top of the page to help us get started! 

Risks and challenges

No project is risk-free, and as with most projects, our biggest risk is timing.

Fortunately, our team has been making consumer products for 20+ years, so we have a lot of practice delivering on exciting products launches for thousands of people. We’re even further along in the development and production process than in previous launches, and we know how to make this a seamless experience for each and every one of our fantastic backers (that’s you!).

We’re confident about our estimated ship date, but unforeseen events can and do happen — especially during these uncertain times. While we can’t always change our circumstances, we can and will promise to communicate transparently and frequently with you every step of the way.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

All backers who have pledged on a reward tier with a pre-ordered diaper bag are automatically eligible for these free upgrades once the stretch goal is met.We'll unlock these cool new colors when we reach the $25,000 mark in our campaign.You can help us meet our stretch goals and unlock cool features by spreading the word about the diaper bag! Tell your friends, share online, and more! You are also welcome to increase your pledge in order to help us meet a stretch goal.What are you waiting for? With the Go Bag by OTGbaby, you are in control of on-the-go diaper changes. This clever diaper bag backpack has a hidden changing station that unzips in seconds for safe, clean diaper changes anytime, anywhere.  Just click the hot pink BACK IT button at the top of the page to help us get started! Risks and challengesNo project is risk-free, and as with most projects, our biggest risk is timing.Fortunately, our team has been making consumer products for 20+ years, so we have a lot of practice delivering on exciting products launches for thousands of people. We’re even further along in the development and production process than in previous launches, and we know how to make this a seamless experience for each and every one of our fantastic backers (that’s you!).We’re confident about our estimated ship date, but unforeseen events can and do happen — especially during these uncertain times. While we can’t always change our circumstances, we can and will promise to communicate transparently and frequently with you every step of the way.THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
The Best Friend – Zip up the back of your dress all by yourself!

Never struggle with your dress zipper again, The Best Friend has got your back!

 

Ever have trouble zipping up the back of your dress? 

Of course you have! Every morning before work I’d stand in front of my closet, find a dress to wear, slip it on, start to zip it up, only to realize I could just zip it up halfway. I’d push and I’d pull, I’d wiggle and I’d jiggle and I thought to myself there has got to be a better way. That led me to invent The Best Friend which is the world’s first premium product that helps you zip up the back of your dress... all by yourself!

 

Here's How It Works.

The Best Friend’s *unique patented design* works on all zipper types and is revolutionizing how women get dressed. Here’s how it works:

Press

In a few short weeks we’ve received press coverage from Real Simple and Travel + Leisure  and were recently featured on Extra and in People for our participation in the SAG Awards Gift Bags. We’ve also received extensive organic social coverage from top tier influencers who are loving the product and we have a lot of press on deck slated for the next few months.

 

The reviews are in - The Best Friend is a Hit!

"Dear Best Friend - where have you been all my life?! I'm obsessed. I've been bringing her along on all of my recent travels in case I need a hand to zip up the back of my dress. Such a brilliant solution to an everyday problem!  @Seegoldenstyle, Fashion Influencer

"Now that I have The Best Friend I never have trouble zipping up my dresses! It’s such a cute gift idea, I’ve given it to a bunch of friends - they love it! Now I never have to ask my doorman to zip my dress again!! Such a life saver, best idea!"   @Thedanistahl, Style Director

"The Best Friend is genius and a total lifesaver!"   @lisadnyc, Fashion Influencer

 

Manufacturing/Fulfillment Timeline.

We’ve had incredible momentum in a few short months and with your help we want to keep the momentum going and bring The Best Friend  to the masses! We launched with our 1st model Kate in November and there is a BIG market demand for a Best Friend of color - even America’s most popular female talk show host is asking for one!

With our campaign you can be one the 1st to receive our strong powerful woman of color Sasha,  you’ll get serious bragging rights and win over the internet and all your friends!

Timelines for all product perks are listed below:

Kate The Great – ready to ship!

Sasha – ships in June

BFF – will ship 3-4 weeks after names are received

Girl Talk, Facetime with Carine! - ready to ship!

I Do, The Wedding Package – ships in May

Ready For My Close Up, Customize your own Best Friend! – ships 6-8 weeks after custom colors are chosen

Join us to help bring "Sasha" to market in June!

 

Meet the Founder.

 

Let's Be Friends.

Even if you can't contribute, you can help!

Share our campaign..

Follow us and share our posts on twitter, facebook, and instagram!

story:
Self Taught Starter!

Since I graduated from San Diego State University with a BS in Psychology, my career has always been in non- profit healthcare and most recently working with elderly women. I also learned to do things myself because I never had a budget.

After many years of teaching myself about photography, Photoshop, website design, jewelry design and branding, I want to launch my lifelong dream of creating timeless jewelry for modern women of all ages. With the support and encouragement from the women in San Diego, we want to see my unique jewelry ideas and designs available for everyone!

CREATING JEWELRY to HELP YOU REMEMBER

During the last few years, I became fascinated and inspired by understanding how deep emotions can be associated with jewelry.  I asked myself, "If I can  create an association with something great, passionate and inspiring and jewelry, why not create jewelry to inspire you to eat healthy?"

The ALL AMERICAN CHALLENGE to Eat Healthy

Like most Americans, we are so busy with our fast paced lives and we don't eat right. It's very easy to be distracted with so many daily tasks and goals. I am easily distracted and it's very challenging to stay on track, especially when it comes to eating right.


The first time I signed up for a diet program, I instinctively knew that I was going to be in big trouble!

The most valuable part of any good nutritional plan or diet is to write down what you are eating so you can track your deadly sins.

This modern method of TAR and FEATHERS worked for me, but only lasted a few weeks.

After a few weeks, I started to forget to write in my food journal. Then I stopped going to my meeting. Then I had buyers remorse. Then I started eating cupcakes.

Many people are embarressed to say they are on a diet or are having trouble remembering to stay on track...even if they are young.


THE SOLUTION to My Personal Challenge

I wanted to stick to the rules of a good nutritional program, but I needed something VISUAL and CONSTANTLY IN MY FACE. I also love and design jewelry.

I decided to try something NEW and DIFFERENT! I incorporated the great tools and advice I learned in my diet program, and twisted the method of logging what I ate!

I used my love and passion for jewelry and combined the power of color association to create visual reminder jewelry called SNACKER STACKERS.

SNACKER STACKERS are a  discreet way to remember daily tasks, LIKE EATING HEALTHY

Snacker Stackers make it easier to stay on track with daily food intake by using beautiful jewelry accessories as a constant visual reminder to eat healthy.

HOW IT WORKS

  • SNACKER STACKERS™ are placed on your wrist in the morning. As you complete a food group for the day, you move that bracelet (food category) to your other wrist!
  • They are a simple, lightweight, comfortable and easy to use jewelry accessory to help supplement your already healthy eating program. Snacker Stackers may also help you make better food choices during the day.

  • SNACKER STACKERS™ are helpful even if you are on a structured diet program that may use points, calories or purchased food. Anyone who struggles with eating right needs SNACKER STACKERS.

Other Reminder Projects

  • Memory issues affect millions of people.  Working with memory impaired people has empowered me to help create other usful reminder products like RemindSIGNS.
  • RemindSIGNS was created from the need to help advanced memory impaired elderly people. This loving project was co-created by myself and a wonderful partner. It was my original inspiration of creating signs for my grandmother to place around the house that led to that project.

Snacker Stackers can help all ages of people to stay on track:

  • CHILDREN- chores
  • TEENS-homework
  • ERRANDS-laundry, store, mail, grocery lists
  • IMPORTANT EVENTS-anniversaries, birthdays etc

How can you help?
Women have been desperate to use my Snacker Stackers bracelets, however, I do not have the funds to make the thousands of sets I need.

Each set includes 7 bracelets plus the packaging:

  •   WATER/ BLUE  
  •   VEGETABLE/ GREEN  
  •   FRUIT/ RED  
  •   PROTEIN/ BROWN  
  •   CARBOHYDRATE/ PINK  
  •   FAT/ YELLOW  
  •   DAIRY/ WHITE  

Funds would be used to

  • hire people to make the SNACKER STACKER jewelry at an affordable cost and
  • produce enough sets to appropriately test and market this unique idea to real women, children (and men)

I created all the designs, marketing concepts, patent pending, branding, website, logo and taken all the photographs. I do not need funds for that reason!

The more funds you contribute, the more Americans will have this unique way of remembering to eat right!

Other Ways You Can Help with SNACKER STACKERS

  • GET THE WORD OUT!
  • Send this link to everyone in your circle. You never know who may be able to help.
  • You can post it on your social media, tell friends, text, email
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Create an event at your club or social gathering with SANCKER STACKERS!

Send this link to everyone in your circle. You never know who may be able to help.
You can post it on your social media, tell friends, text, email
You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
About Mont Tendre

We are watch lovers, and we make watches for watch lovers. We believe that a watch is more than simply a timepiece or a device. It is truly a piece of art that showcases who you are.

That's why we are introducing the idea of fully customizable watches.


Our Watches

It all started with a group of young people talking about their desire to create their own watches. We have spent the entire year last year to sketching out different watch designs, selecting the best raw material we can find and seeking for a reliable manufacturer to bring our watches to life. Now we are proudly presenting you our limited launch edition watches.



Each watch in the launch edition features autometic mechanical movement, stainless steel case, transparent back design and 60 full-cut diamonds.



    Our Website

    We want to share this amazing idea with you, so we created our website www.monttendre.com. You can easily design your own watch using the watch building tool. We offer a variety of customizable options, including watch cases, dials, watchhands and wristbands. You can also customize the case back and case size, and even add gemstones on the watch.



    Apart from the launch edition, we have come up with many many more designs, which we also put on our website under the COLLECTION section. If you are not sure where to start, you can explore all our collections, select a watch design you like, customize it to create your own.


    Our Package

    As for the package, we go for simple and environment-friendly. All the boxes are crafted with recyclable materials.


    Along with your watch, you will also receive a personalized certificate in recognition of your creative watch design with Mont Tendre.


    What's more, your watch design will be displayed on our bespoke watch gallery with your consent.


    Your Support

    We have found a reliable manufacturer for the watch production. To realize the fully customization, we need to create watch models in different designs and sizes. That's a big challenge for us, financially. We need your support to make this happen. With the funds raised, we will be able to select high-quality materials and produce durable timepieces.


    Another reason we are on IndieGoGo is that we want to introduce this idea directly to you. In this way, we can cut out retailers and save marketing expenses.


      Risks & Challenges

      Since our watches are fully customized, we need to build each and every watch from the very beginning. There's no ready-to-go watches. We will start making the watch once we received your design. Thus, customers are expecting longer waiting time


      Each watch is the one and only in this world, meaning we are not able to resell the watch. However, if you are not satisfied with your watch, you can still return it for store credit, which you can use to purchase other items on our website. 


      Last but not least, quality control. We have enforced very strict quality control procedures. All watches come with a one-year warranty.


        Other Ways You Can Help

        Maybe you are not able to contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Here's what you can do:

        • Share this idea with your friends, colleagues and families.
        • Visit our website www.monttendre.com.
        • Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.


        Rewards

        Check out the Perks section for more rewards. Thank you for your support!

story:
A Labor of Love

It’s not enough to say that Adhesif Clothing is an eco-friendly clothing line because it’s so so much more than just that...



Every single handmade garment has a heartbeat and a story to tell, a true labor of love from start to finish. Inspired by the preservation of our planet, each up-cycled garment is completely original and made with up to 95% recycled and vintage materials.

Let's face it folks. The environment is a BIG topic and for obvious reasons! As far as I can see, we only have one inhabitable planet in our solar system and it's in dire need of our help! The great thing is that there are a lot of us out there that are trying to help make this world a better place thanks to organizations like Vancouver's own Eco Fashion Week where I was fortunate to have shown my work over many seasons.


While it's true that many of us are unwilling to sacrifice personal style for good moral standards, with Adhesif Clothing you don't have to compromise on either! We have a passion for one-of-a-kind, fresh fashion that compliments your unique personality so you can continue looking good while feeling great!

Adhesif Clothing is apart of the "slow fashion movement" That means we value quality over quantity. Like any other art form, this philosophy requires countless hours of physical production with the attention being on pieces that you can cherish for years.

Your generous contribution will directly go towards the development and growth of our budding local business. The funds will be used to increase our production staff by way of hiring additional home sewers from our local community. In addition your donation will also help us acquire better tools and machines necessary in the creation of our pieces.

Your Support Means the World to Us

My desired funding goal breaks down into a minimum budget needed for the start up costs of these specific categories;

-Hiring 2 additional p/t home sewers for production: $3500 (for the first 3 months salary) 

-1 new industrial serger sewing machine: $2000

-Additional Material Costs: $500

The hiring of 2 new part time sewers and the purchase of a new machine would allow us to be able to increase the production of our pieces.

As a thank you for your support we have designed some very special offers! 

I always tell the people I meet daily that every one person on this planet can make a difference in helping the environment and as such we have some amazing perks to help you become a contributor as a fellow earth warrior. 

Keeping it Green...

Everything we do at Adhesif Clothing has a grassroots approach. Continuing a zero waste practice and spreading the message of resourcefulness in our craft is our mission. 

The deeper message behind our process is very important to us and as such we often do educational workshops at local colleges, community centers and welcome visits to our studio from elementary school students so we can encourage the world around us about how to reduce waste in the environment. 

Funding will allow us to continue to grow green initiatives in our communities and thus the world over.  For every 1 pound of fabric recycled, 70 gallons of water is saved in the world. Since 2003 Adhesif Clothing has helped save over 10 000 pounds of discarded textiles from landfills.

For more information regarding the negative impacts of waste in the fashion industry have a look this brief informative video at 1 minute 

Other Ways You Can Help Spread the Love

Now that you've heard a little bit about our story, feel free to share our campaign with your friends and family. It's easy to do! Just use the Indiegogo share tools!


Or pop by and have a look at our work in person & say hello at our flagship shop/studio

Adhesif Clothing 2202 Main Street-Vancouver, BC

Feel free to have a look at the Adhesif Clothing blog where you can find out more about what makes us tick

story:
"An off the rack designer shirt takes 30 minutes to produce.
A Buttons 'n' Threads custom shirt takes 11 hours to produce.
It's the 10 hours and 30 minutes that makes all the difference."


Thank you so much for supporting us so far. To show you our appreciation we are introducing two new designs in our Premium collection: It's time to bring out the Ginghams!


Justin Jeffers from The Fine Young Gentleman  just reviewed our shirts. Check out what he has to say here.

Making Luxury Affordable

At some point in our lives, we’ve all wanted to own a designer shirt; a Zegna, an Armani, a Burberry. Some of us might not know this but brands artificially inflate prices and invest heavily in marketing to create an illusion of high quality. At the end of the day, what you are paying for is the label and not the shirt itself. Given our desire to want the finest quality we are under the impression that we get what we pay for. This is the illusion that the fashion industry has created.

It’s time we change the way we look and shop for clothes. We all need to be aware of what goes into making the clothes that we wear today as opposed to being influenced by brand marketing. We need to start appreciating the smaller details that differentiate the finest from the average. It’s the small things that matter when it comes to high quality clothing. Believe it or not most of us don’t even know what these details are.

With your support for this campaign, we can change this; together.  We want to show you that you don’t have to pay for the brand inflation and retail mark ups that we’ve all grown to accept as customary. We want to bring you the best quality dress shirts at a price that is not artificially inflated. We want to bring you the finest custom tailored shirt – we’re calling it affordable luxury. Along the way we want to educate and inform you all of the tiniest of details that differentiate a good shirt from the finest shirts. So the next time your out shopping for a shirt, you know exactly what to look for.

100% Egyptian Cotton Fabrics

Our shirts are crafted using the finest cotton sourced from the best mills around the world like Thomas Mason, Cotonificio Alibini and others in Switzerland and India. Our premium shirts are made using 2-ply 120’s 100% Egyptian cotton fabric and the exclusive ones use 2-ply 140’s. These fine quality fabrics have a luxurious hand feel and are climate adaptive which make them suitable to wear all year round.


23 - 25 Stitches per Inch

At this density the stitches become virtually invisible and the shirt looks seamlessly elegant. This is achieved with a combination of sophisticated machines, accurate machine settings, special sewing needles and rigorously researched threads and sewing speeds. The result is a shirt that is one of the finest and most durable in the world. The best place to check the quality of stitching on the shirt is the collar.


200 Stitches in every Buttonhole

Every buttonhole contains 200 stitches resulting in a smart look that allows for ease of buttoning and prevents the buttonholes from fraying. There is a unique horizontal buttonhole on the sleeve guard and lower front placket that allows for ease of movement while being seated. It also avoids tensing the shirt seams inside the trousers.


Australian Mother of Pearl Buttons

All our buttons are made using the highest quality Australian Mother of Pearl that have been sourced from Australia and crafted in Italy to offer durability, sheen and ease of buttoning. These high quality buttons add a touch of opulence to the shirt.


The Finer Details

1. Shank buttons
The buttons are wrapped to create space between the button and the shirt fabric. This makes buttoning simple as the buttons slip into buttonholes without tugging the fabric.

2. Removable collar stays
All our shirts have removable collar stays to preserve the shape and curvature of the collar.

3. French seams
A refined and delicate artisanal construction, resulting in a barely visible 3mm side seam giving the shirt a clean and luxurious finish.

4. Matched patterns
The patterns whether stripes or checks, are synchronized perfectly throughout the shirt. The patterns are also matched from shoulder to sleeve, a feature that is only found in the finest quality shirts.


Our shirts are far superior to any designer label and resonates the quality of the finest shirt makers such as Charvet. Below we've shown you how we compare to popular designer labels producing dress shirts and Charvet - a brand that inspires us to offer the finest quality. 

Customized

With Buttons 'n' Threads you can customize each detail of the shirt to your personal choice. It's not just the best quality but it's truly personalized for you in regards to the collar, cuffs, placket and pockets. You can also have your initials monogrammed on four different parts of the shirt, so you can truly call it your own. The monogram is offered in three different fonts and various colours that is sewn completely by hand by a skilled craftsmen, who has been trained for years in sewing letters in these fonts. 

Examples of a few different collars:

Examples of a few different cuffs:

Examples of a few different monograms:


Tailored

We've delivered on quality and we've delivered on price; so why not the fit? Small, Medium and Large would do no justice to these fine shirts. We know that no two people are alike and we are all unique individuals. No matter what your body shape or size, every shirt will be tailored to your body measurements to provide the perfect fitting shirt. A few simple measurements are all that is required to guarantee the best fitting shirt in your wardrobe.

Don’t worry we’ll send you all the information you need, when it comes time to order your shirt after the funding period closes. 

We’re starting off with 6 fabric choices ranging from 2 Ply 120’s to 2 Ply 140’s 100% Egyptian cotton. These are the essentials; designs so versatile that dressing up for any occasion would be a no-brainer.



We are proud to say that our shirts are produced in India, which has long been known for it's tailoring traditions and handwork. We shared the same vision as the factory that we have partnered with; that established itself to produce the finest custom shirts in the world. Together our aim is to bring back the prestige associated with the 'Made in India' label by offering one of the finest shirts in the market. Our mutual appreciation of fine tailoring and inspiration from the finest shirt makers like Charvet and Fray led us to design these shirts.

Know your factory

The shirts are manufactured in a specialized shirt making facility in a small town in India, where only women from neighbouring villages are recruited with no prior experience in tailoring and are provided training for a year before they are transferred to the actual production floor. Our aim is to provide meaningful employment to these women so they can look after their families better and learn a trade skill to craft such a fine product. The highest standards of quality and workmanship are maintained to offer the finest product. The factory is centrally air-conditioned and employees are provided with working gloves to ensure safety and maintain cleanliness when handling these fine shirts. 

Women Empowerment

We at Buttons ‘n’ Threads really admire the work and ethics of the factory that we have partnered with and that is the reason we have developed such a strong relationship with them. To extend a helping hand we have collaborated with a not for profit organisations in India. The organisation focuses on the empowerment of women in India as experience shows that, when equipped with the proper resources, women have the power to help whole families and entire communities overcome poverty, marginalization and social injustice. A certain percentage of the total funds raised will go towards generating skilled employment for women and their empowerment.

We've partnered with a small factory that produces a limited number of shirts every month.  When we launch these shirts on our website, they will be sold exclusively for members, people like you, who really want these shirts. As an early supporter, you will receive membership access to the website once we launch. We’ll keep you updated!


Each and every bit of your help will let us offer so much more. We would love to have your support and to show you our appreciation when you refer The Finest Dress Shirts to your friends, family and network you have the opportunity to get a free dress shirt by helping us spread the word. 
Receive one extra dress shirt of your choice for every four dress shirts that are pledged for through your unique referral link.
Click here for more information on the Referral Program.

Buttons ‘n’ Threads was started in September 2013 with a basic collection of custom tailored suits to alleviate two basic problems that men face: Off the rack clothing never delivered the best fit and bespoke tailoring was just too expensive to afford. By cutting out the middlemen in the retail channel we were able to offer high quality fabrics that high end retailers make use of and deliver custom fitted suits at affordable prices. This was our first step leading towards affordable luxury. Now, we have the chance to produce some of the finest dress shirts at affordable prices. Please help us make this a reality. 

What our customers have said about us

Josh Kingston, Australia
"A fantastic product, I've never had a suit fit like this. Less costs to me in time, effort and $ than buying at bricks and mortar. I see no reason to buy a suit anywhere else"

Essam Husaini, Australia
"My suit fit perfectly. The material was really good,and the delivery time was quick. Would definitely buy more suits. Recommended to anyone who is planning on buying a custom made suit"

Karl Foellmi, Switzerland
"Your suit arrived on time. It fits very nicely! Thank you for your good work"

Ben Abraham, New Zealand
"At first I was nervous about buying a suit online, but then I shopped with Buttons 'n' Threads. These guys are champs, with an easy to use site and top notch suits. Shipped promptly half-way across the world and arriving in top condition, I couldn't be happier with mine. These guys care about making you look good"

This isn’t our first endeavour!
Since we started in September of 2013, we’ve done quite a bit. We introduced our first collection of essential suits and accessories. Check them out here: www.buttonsnthreads.com

We have a fully functioning website and a slick order process. We also have experience in order fulfilment and logistics planning. 

We want to offer the complete range of custom tailored clothing for men. These fine dress shirts are the next step in this process. But, we need your help to get it done.

Each project has its own risks, but we are confident we can get it done. If any challenges arise, we WILL let you know, but we have a great factory backing us and we don’t anticipate many issues. WE WILL NOT LET YOU DOWN.

How do I submit measurements?

Don’t worry you’re in good hands. Once the funding period is over we will send you a link on our website where you can enter in your details, customisations and measurements. We've made easy to follow video guides so you have nothing to worry about. All you’ll need is a friend and a measuring tape.

Can I provide two different sets of measurements?

Unfortunately we cannot accept two measurement profiles under the same name. To create a seamless shopping experience, we will store your details and measurements on our system, so the next time you order you won’t have to go through the measurement process again.

Do you ship internationally? What are the charges?

We’re offering free international shipping through DHL to over 200 countries. You won’t have to pay anything extra for shipping.

Why are your suits a part of the perks?

When we started in September 2013, we started with a basic collection of custom tailored suits. Our suits are made using Australian Merino Wool sourced from mills in Italy (Gladsons) and England (Huddersfield). We thought that our suits would complement these fine dress shirts well and hence the decision to include them in some of our perks. 

What if my shirt doesn't fit?

Not to worry. We have an alteration, a remake and return policy to ensure that you’re shopping completely risk free.

Alteration Policy: If your shirt requires minor alterations we will credit back up to $25 to cover the cost of alterations.

Remake Policy: If your shirt doesn't fit you beyond minor alterations, you can send it back to us and we will replace the shirt for you at no extra cost.

Refund Policy: If there is something seriously wrong with your shirt, you can send it back to us for a complete refund. Refund should be claimed within 21 days from date of delivery.

What if there are any issues with quality?

We are so confident with the quality of our shirts that if you find anything wrong with any quality aspect, we will remake the shirt for you at no extra cost.

When is the expected delivery?

We expect to be able to ship out all the custom shirts by the end of July 2014. 

Can I make my suits a three piece?

Yes, if you wish to make your suits a three piece, please pledge an extra $50 in your contribution.

What if I want to add some additional customisations?

If there is a particular customisation that we do not offer, but you would like it on your shirt, please get in touch with us and we will try and accommodate your request if possible. We want your shirts to be unique to you and we will try our best to make that happen.

Are additional customisations chargeable?

All customisations that we offer are free of charge. There might be some requests that require additional labour or material charges; please get in touch with us in case of specific requests and we will sort it out for you.

Where can I buy your product after the campaign ends?

Our products will be available on our website that you would have helped make possible. We will offer the shirts exclusively for members who have helped fund our project, such as you.

Why can’t I pay through PayPal?

As we have launched this campaign out of India, the Reserve Bank of India has limitations with regards to receiving funds through PayPal. This is an issue that PayPal has been working with the government to get sorted. More details can be found here: http://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526426-International-PayPal-Restrictions

Contact Us

If you have any further questions, feel free to email us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

story:
Thank you for considering donating to my campaign!

  First off, it may look like I already have together, i.e. many people tell me my brand is "the BOMB", but I haven't had the means to sell suit's yet... and THAT'S WHY I'M HERE!

As a start-up with great potential, minus the proper amount of funding, it has taken me many years to get my design idea sketches made into samples.  The samples are what you now see on the models, which have been showcased at fashion shows and photo shoots.  Despite the demand, Cherry Bomb is now at a sticking point without money for fabric, manufacturing and inventory.  Thus, I can't move forward until I have inventory to sell!

My brand has the foundation paved as far as the first samples/styles, some patterns, photo's, a website and some exposure. This was only achieved with great thanks to family, friends, models, photographers and videographers, etc. who donated money, their time to model, photograph, and video for me!   With just over $15,000 of my own money, I was able to get to this point, which of course I'm very proud of nonetheless.  I believe in my passion and have come so far and yet so close, so I can't give up now!

This has been such a blessing and quite a journey, hence this small town girl's motto is "Don't Stop Believin'!"

So thanks to your help, Cherry Bomb will be another great success story due to the collaboration of many great people like you!  

 

ABOUT my Brand

Cherry Bomb suits are quality made with luxurious fabrics, and will be made right here in the USA.

We want you to feel great about who you are and how you look, and feel unique as you are in our suits.
A high-end line with an edgy vibe... that's Cherry Bomb.

My swimsuits are more than a string bikini, they cross over to a new category of swimwear… a new ERA of swim fashion... It's SWIM COUTURE.

It's a sweet & spicy mix of Rock-n-Roll, Pin-Up, & Futuristic Fashion!
CB is a reflection of music, people, and art.
An era that’s unfrozen in time… Merging the past, present, & the future.
A little bite of it all... it's the best of everything.

Cherry Bomb is everything, because you are everything!

Be a BOMB girl!

 

... and We Need YOUR HELP!

Our Ultimate goal is to reach $47,000 in order to get to the production/manufacturing stage.

However, if this stage of funding isn't reached, I will still be able to progress with the money I do raise... So whatever donation/perk you can do, it will save my Brand and help Cherry Bomb continue growing.

Funding will also be used to purchase fabrics, cover cost of materials, revised sampling/grading, tech packs, add a few crucial styles, get a small run of inventory, fulfill perks, get noticed at the Trade Shows, and hopefully participate in MIAMI Swim Week!

With your help I can get my brand seen and heard, start growing the Brand, and make a lot of women look amazing.

 We know we can do it with just a little help to get started. 

You can visit our website for more information and see some of our designs at http://cherrybombswimwear.com

For Partner/Investor Inquiry's~ contact cristalcox@yahoo.com or via social media

 Thank you in advance for your help, well wishes, and support!  

 

 

ABOUT ME

Designing is my passion and dream!

I’ve been designing for over 15 years now and decided it's time to stop dreaming and start doing!

 So many styles, so little time!

It has taken me many years to get here, but I’m a fighter… and believe anything is possible. I never gave up and despite many odds, I launched my Brand and have opened the Pandora’s box.

I’m a strong woman who overcame many struggles including leaving an abusive relationship, and being homeless. I am proof that women are strong and smart and can achieve anything they set their mind too!

I want my Brand to EMPOWER women to be confident, driven, and sassy despite any struggles or insecurities b/c that makes us stand out, not blend in.

 My Brand has been on our local news, in a magazine, a poolside event, and was even part of 2 Fashion Shows... not a bad way to start and now I've been asked to participate in MIAMI Swim Week!

Scary-yes... BUT, I'm not one to sit on the sidelines and wait for things to be perfect, the time is here & now and so I said YES and here I am! 

I want to share my love of designing with the world and be that testimony to inspire other's to believe in their own dream, and never give up... b/c eventually persistence and passion pays off. 

Once my Brand is going strong, we will be involved in helping women overcome & awareness of Domestic Violence. We want to give back too and can't wait to do great things together! 

My Brand is fun, fearless, and fashion-forward, just like YOU!!!

Other Ways You Can Help

You might not be able to financially contribute, but that doesn’t mean I can’t use your help.

Please help spread the word and make some noise about this campaign!

Use the IndieGoGo share tools in the top right of the menu or down below to share this campaign via social media!

We would love to have you join the Cherry Bomb community:

Website: http://www.cherrybombswimwear.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CherryBombSwimwear/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cherrybombswimwear/

...to keep up with all great new styles and happenings!!!

 

FUTURE PLANS

Get ready b/c Cherry Bomb is about to make a huge splash!

Starting with swimwear and eventually seeking to become a national brand.

I have so many plans for the Brand to expand and I'm so excited to see where it goes…

Cherry Bomb is going places and hope you are part of that journey!

 

As Seen In:

"Good Day Charlotte" News Segment

"Ryze-Up" Magazine- Swimsuit Edition

and in JULY- MIAMI Swim Week!

 

 

 

VIDEO of NCFA Fashion Show- Charlotte, NC

  First off, it may look like I already have together, i.e. many people tell me my brand is "the BOMB", but I haven't had the means to sell suit's yet... and THAT'S WHY I'M HERE!
As a start-up with great potential, minus the proper amount of funding, it has taken me many years to get my design idea sketches made into samples.  The samples are what you now see on the models, which have been showcased at fashion shows and photo shoots.  Despite the demand, Cherry Bomb is now at a sticking point without money for fabric, manufacturing and inventory.  Thus, I can't move forward until I have inventory to sell!
My brand has the foundation paved as far as the first samples/styles, some patterns, photo's, a website and some exposure. This was only achieved with great thanks to family, friends, models, photographers and videographers, etc. who donated money, their time to model, photograph, and video for me!   With just over $15,000 of my own money, I was able to get to this point, which of course I'm very proud of nonetheless.  I believe in my passion and have come so far and yet so close, so I can't give up now!
This has been such a blessing and quite a journey, hence this small town girl's motto is "Don't Stop Believin'!"
So thanks to your help, Cherry Bomb will be another great success story due to the collaboration of many great people like you!  
 
ABOUT my Brand
Cherry Bomb suits are quality made with luxurious fabrics, and will be made right here in the USA.
We want you to feel great about who you are and how you look, and feel unique as you are in our suits.A high-end line with an edgy vibe... that's Cherry Bomb.
My swimsuits are more than a string bikini, they cross over to a new category of swimwear… a new ERA of swim fashion... It's SWIM COUTURE.
It's a sweet & spicy mix of Rock-n-Roll, Pin-Up, & Futuristic Fashion!CB is a reflection of music, people, and art.An era that’s unfrozen in time… Merging the past, present, & the future.A little bite of it all... it's the best of everything.
Cherry Bomb is everything, because you are everything!

Be a BOMB girl!
 

... and We Need YOUR HELP!
Our Ultimate goal is to reach $47,000 in order to get to the production/manufacturing stage.
However, if this stage of funding isn't reached, I will still be able to progress with the money I do raise... So whatever donation/perk you can do, it will save my Brand and help Cherry Bomb continue growing.
Funding will also be used to purchase fabrics, cover cost of materials, revised sampling/grading, tech packs, add a few crucial styles, get a small run of inventory, fulfill perks, get noticed at the Trade Shows, and hopefully participate in MIAMI Swim Week!
With your help I can get my brand seen and heard, start growing the Brand, and make a lot of women look amazing.
 We know we can do it with just a little help to get started. 
You can visit our website for more information and see some of our designs at http://cherrybombswimwear.com
For Partner/Investor Inquiry's~ contact cristalcox@yahoo.com or via social media
 Thank you in advance for your help, well wishes, and support!  



 
 
ABOUT ME
Designing is my passion and dream!
I’ve been designing for over 15 years now and decided it's time to stop dreaming and start doing!
 So many styles, so little time!
It has taken me many years to get here, but I’m a fighter… and believe anything is possible. I never gave up and despite many odds, I launched my Brand and have opened the Pandora’s box.
I’m a strong woman who overcame many struggles including leaving an abusive relationship, and being homeless. I am proof that women are strong and smart and can achieve anything they set their mind too!
I want my Brand to EMPOWER women to be confident, driven, and sassy despite any struggles or insecurities b/c that makes us stand out, not blend in.
 My Brand has been on our local news, in a magazine, a poolside event, and was even part of 2 Fashion Shows... not a bad way to start and now I've been asked to participate in MIAMI Swim Week!
Scary-yes... BUT, I'm not one to sit on the sidelines and wait for things to be perfect, the time is here & now and so I said YES and here I am! 
I want to share my love of designing with the world and be that testimony to inspire other's to believe in their own dream, and never give up... b/c eventually persistence and passion pays off. 
Once my Brand is going strong, we will be involved in helping women overcome & awareness of Domestic Violence. We want to give back too and can't wait to do great things together! 
My Brand is fun, fearless, and fashion-forward, just like YOU!!!



Other Ways You Can Help
You might not be able to financially contribute, but that doesn’t mean I can’t use your help.
Please help spread the word and make some noise about this campaign!
Use the IndieGoGo share tools in the top right of the menu or down below to share this campaign via social media!
We would love to have you join the Cherry Bomb community:
Website: http://www.cherrybombswimwear.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CherryBombSwimwear/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cherrybombswimwear/
...to keep up with all great new styles and happenings!!!
 
FUTURE PLANS
Get ready b/c Cherry Bomb is about to make a huge splash!
Starting with swimwear and eventually seeking to become a national brand.
I have so many plans for the Brand to expand and I'm so excited to see where it goes…
Cherry Bomb is going places and hope you are part of that journey!
 
As Seen In:
"Good Day Charlotte" News Segment
"Ryze-Up" Magazine- Swimsuit Edition
and in JULY- MIAMI Swim Week!
