Be the First to Mobilize Your Life with the Kreyos

All-In-One “Meteor” Smart Watch

 

We can ease your tech aches and pains.

The Kreyos Meteor is a hands-free, two-way communication system that you wear on your wrist. On your belt. On your bike. Or even on a lanyard around your neck.

Because it is light and portable, it’s easy to wear while on the move – whether you’re on a long bike ride or a short-trip to the grocery store.

For the first time ever, you now will have hands-free control over the powerhouse mini-computer that sits in your pocket.

 

UPDATE (01-JULY-2013): Kreyos Meteor has the ability to answer phone calls DIRECTLY from your wrist without reaching for your phone in the pocket. You can answer the call with a  gesture or by simply pressing the answer button on the watch. We added this update as many backers are confused whether they can answer calls from their wrist. 

Question: Does the Kreyos Meteor have a sim card slot?

A: No, your Kreyos needs to be connected to your smartphone via Bluetooth in order to answer calls. Its not meant to replace a smartphone.

Since the first time Captain Kirk spoke into his “communicator,” people have dreamed of using their voice to control communications.  As the only waterproof, interactive smartwatch to feature a microphone and speaker, the Kreyos Meteor is the first to allow you to control your smartphone – and your smartphone functions – remotely using voice commands.

 

 


UPDATE (28-JUNE-2013): Gestures controls could be configured in the free Kreyos App.

Wish you could send texts without typing? Or change your music without pressing a button?

Talking to your watch makes communication easy, but we also added motion control right into the Kreyos operating system. Using a 3-axis gyroscope, controlling your Kreyos Meteor Smart watch is as easy as moving your hand.

In the Meteor, four different wrist motions come preconfigured – and you can pick an action to correspond to specific activities. In the future, we’ll be adding a variety of additional motions to the Kreyos platform, enabling you to expand the motions in your repertoire. And developers also will have the freedom to build additional gestures into applications.

Because of its hands-free functionality, the Kreyos Meteor gives you more freedom to move around your world – without losing contact with your social, business and family networks.

UPDATE (28-JUNE-2013):  Kreyos Meteor can keep time even when disconnected from your phone. Kreyos Meteor also has inbuilt “widgets” that comes included. It works independently WITHOUT any smartphone connected.

  • Daily Activity Tracker
  • Calendar 
  • Countdown Timer
  • Sports Mode – Walking, Running & Cycling 
  • Multi World Clock
  • Analog Display
  • Digital Display
  • Multi Silent Vibrating Alarms

UPDATE (28-JUNE-2013): We will be setting up a platform for developers to upload watch faces. Uploaded watch faces will then be available directly on the Kreyos App for downloading and pushing updates to the watch instantly.

Customizing your watchface is easy.  The Meteor includes more than 20 digital and analog watch faces.  Change the look and feel of your watch whenever you feel like it.  Of course, 20 is just the beginning!  More to come in the future!


No two humans are alike. So why should everyone have to wear their smartwatch on their wrist? That’s why we created a series of watchbands and accessories designed to fit your lifestyle.

All of our watchbands and accessories are designed using high-grade, durable silicone. As a result, they are waterproof, flexible and fun to wear – whether you’re a couch potato, a fashionista, or a professional athlete! 

This season, we’re offering our watchbands and accessories in a series of “hot” colors perfect for those who are fashion forward:

Because you can wear it as a watch, hang it from your belt, attach it to your bike or wear it around your neck, the Kreyos Meteor frees you up to do the things you need to do – without worrying about dropping or losing your smartphone.  And it gives you the freedom to communicate – via voice, text, or email – even when holding a phone or tablet is inconvenient.

Watch for more fun, flexible accessories and colors in the future!  You’ll want to collect them all!

UPDATE (28-JUNE-2013): Kreyos Meteor has a built-in accelerometer. Daily Activity “widgets” is built into the watch, so it tracks stats like steps, floor climbs, calories and distance taken daily. You will be able to sync them into your smartphone’s app. This is standalone, works totally fine without your smartphone with you. It automatically syncs the data to your app when its near the smartphone.

Kreyos Meteor WILL WORK directly with bluetooth or ANT+ sensors without being connected to the smartphone. Meteor WILL BE ABLE to receive data directly from the sensors WITHOUT a smartphone connected and populate it on the watch.

Kreyos Meteor itself has a sports mode for people who wants to track when they start and stop activities like, Walking, Running & Cycling. It has a 3,4,5 grid data option, CUSTOMIZABLE in any way you prefer . 

Grid Options include the below:

a) Total Workout time
b) Time of the day
c) Total Distance
d) Altitude
e) Elevation Gain
f) Speed
g) Average Speed
h) Top Speed
i) Pace
j) Average Pace
k) Calories Burned
l) Current Heart Rate
m) Average Heart Rate
n) Max Heart Rate
o) Current Lap Time
p) Average Lap Time
q) Best Lap Time

Question 1: Is Kreyos Meteor able to show running speed data in sports mode?

A: Yes, when a smartphone is NOT available, Kreyos uses metrics from the accelerometer and gyrometer and calculates your speed. In the event of a smartphone being available it will receive data from smartphone's GPS.

Question 2: Is Kreyos Meteor able to show Cycling speed data in sports mode independently?

A: No, for cycling it will require either a smartphone GPS data available or a ANT+/Bluetooth Speed cadence sensor to show speed data on the watch.

Question 3: Is Kreyos Meteor able to show Heart rate data in sports mode independently?

A: No, you will require a ANT+/Bluetooth Heart rate sensor for the watch to display the heart rate data.

Whatever your sport, the Kreyos Meteor will work for you.  Ever try and ride a horse with a smartphone?  Or race a dirt bike across country without breaking that expensive glass screen on your smartphone?  How about swimming in the ocean?

Or snorkeling offshore?  No matter what you love to do, the Kreyos Meteor will help you maintain your fitness, share your progress with friends and teammates, and shout your successes to the world…via social media!

 

Unlike the first-generation smartwatches that only provide one-way notifications, the Kreyos Meteor is the first and only interactive smartwatch to let you use voice and gestures to control your smartwatch.   Built into the operating system of the smartwatch itself, this technology is far beyond the capacities of the first-generation watches prepping for the market today.  In fact, voice and gesture control cannot be easily added to other watches because adding voice and gesture control requires hardware, rather than software, integration.

That means, quite simply, that the other “smartwatches” on the market won’t have full gesture and voice control capabilities for a long time --- if ever.

And that’s not all.  Because we already have our Kreyos Platform and proprietary operating system designed and developed, we are in the position of being able to get to market faster than anyone else.  In fact, we don’t need the money for development.  We need it for production.  And that means that as soon as we reach our target on Indiegogo, production begins.

And if you’re an early adopter now, you’ll be the first to hear about future upgrades to the Kreyos Smartwatch.  And you’ll be among the first to enjoy downloading new and exciting applications, programs and UI changes.  That’s right.  You won’t have to buy a new watch. You’ll update your watch online.  Simple.  Effective.  Powerful.

That’s the Kreyos Meteor.

UPDATE (28-JUNE-2013): Watch apps can be written in C. Also we will be creating an desktop emulator, making it easy for interested developers to create watch apps for the Kreyos Meteor.

If you're an app developer, click here to sign up for our developer's mailing list. We'll keep you in the loop for the latest SDK updates. 

Examples of potential apps that can be build using the Gyrometer.


Kreyos has tested, dropped, hit, dunked, tested again – and discovered that the Kreyos Meteor is ready for production.  A few of them are in the hands of select media for review, and we’re simply burning to turn on our production line. 

We expect to have our first batch ready for shipment in late November after we reach our Indiegogo goal. 

As a supporter, you will be among the first to receive your own Kreyos Meteor. So pledge today – and you’ll be enjoying the most advanced smartwatch on the market in time for the holidays.

 

Here are some actual sketches of the watch in the early phase. Also we have included some of the UI wireframe sketches of the watch. More to come...

We have completed most of our moulds required for injection parts. What you see in the pictures are ACTUAL injection samples, NOT PROTOTYPES made from 3D printers.  

To produce Kreyos Meteor we have chosen to work with one of the world's most respected factories in China. Our lead engineer, lives in Shanghai and travels back and forth to meet with our manufacturer. He is managing the project development with dedicated engineering resources supplied by our manufacturer.

Injection moulding tools at the manufacturing facilities below:

We need your help to finalize our software development and go into mass production.

Here is how we will invest the funding we receive:

1) Software Development: We have started the IOS, Android, WP8 software development but the majority of the funding requested will be applied to complete final software coding, testing and UI design.

2) Mass Production: We need your support to secure procurement of the long lead components and meet the minimum order quantities required by the EMS factories. 

With your support we expect to have the first production of Kreyos Meteor in your hands by late November, we want to get Kreyos Meteor to you before Christmas!. We are very excited about this project and hope you are too. We appreciate your support and please share Kreyos with your friends too!

The amount of funding we require to achieve the final milestones is $100,000. We hope you will find it in your heart to help us deliver this long sought after, valuable and useful technology. 

Kreyos is a truly international team. Founded in the United States, our team features experts in different fields, located in the USA, Singapore, Spain, China, Taiwan, and the Philippines. 

Over the years, our team has worked for world-class companies, including HP, Microsoft, Acer, Lenovo, Hitachi, Toshiba, Amazon, Best Buy, REI, among many others.  

We each have a real passion for electronics and consumer products – and we obviously enjoy a variety of sports.  

In short, we built the Kreyos smartwatch because we really want to use it ourselves, and some say that’s the best way to innovate. 

We consider it our mission to pool our talents and bring the Kreyos to the world. 

  • Ultra Low Power MCU
  • Ultra Low Power 1.26 Inch Memory LCD Screen 144 x 168 pixel 
  • 4 Waterproof Buttons
  • Vibrating motor
  • ANT/ANT+
  • Bluetooth 2.1+ EDR and 4.0 (Low Energy)
  • 3-Axis Gyrometer 
  • 3-Axis Accelerometer
  • Water Resistant Mini Speaker
  • Water Resistant MEMS Microphone with HIGH SNR and Flat Wide Band frequency response
  • Water resistant - Good for swimming and shower (ATMs: TBD)
  • 150 mah Lithium Rechargeable Battery (7 days battery life)
  • USB Interface for Charging and Watch OS Update

 

 

Stretch Goals

UPDATE (01-JULY-2013): Our 1st Stretch Goal of $300,000!

Stretch Goal #1: Gamification Platform

The great thing about the Kreyos Meteor is that it’s interactive. We wanted to extend that and also make sure its fun and enjoyable at the same time for our users.

With your support it became a reality for Kreyos. We're very excited to announce our partnership with Badgeville (www.Badgeville.com), the leader in gamification platform. This allow us to provide our users with the best gamification experience possible. With the integration our users would be able enjoy the following below in the members community area and also on the Kreyos App.

  • Social: Share your achievements with your friends
  • Motivation: Activities earn you points, badges and achievements!
  • Fun: Make fitness fun! Share & compete with your friends.
  • Tracking: Set goals! Track your progress with your Kreyos Meteor by simply syncing your stats wirelessly to your Kreyos app.

UPDATE (11-JULY-2013):  Our 2nd Stretch Goal of $600,000!

Stretch Goal #2: Two Free Screen Protectors

All Indiegogo backers will receive TWO FREE Screen Protectors with their purchase of the Kreyos Meteor. Yes, you’ve heard us correctly, not one but TWO! Even though our screen is already scratch resistant, it wouldn’t hurt having an extra layer of protective skin on it.

UPDATE (27-JULY-2013):  Our 3rd Stretch Goal of $1000,000!

Stretch Goal #3: Sleep Tracking


Stretch Goal #4: $1.5Million.... 

Announcing our new stretch goal at $1.5Million

Our team will build a new app for iOS, Android & WP8 which allow Meteor users to use gestures to control applications on Windows and Apple computers. Once the Meteor is connected via bluetooth to the computer, the user can use gestures to control applications such as Powerpoint during a presentation, i.e: previous slide, next slide and so on. More applications will be coming soon. If we do hit this goal, we will have this app ready 3-4months after we delivery the Kreyos Meteor.


 

Risks and challenges 

There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any electronics product at scale. Mass manufacturing isn't the same as prototype development with 3D printers; we have to make sure they are secure and reliable, and also most importantly that they can be manufactured efficiently at mass volumes.

BUT..............

Here's the GOOD NEWS:

a) We have completed MOST of our moulds required for injection parts. What you see in the pictures are ACTUAL injection samples, NOT PROTOTYPES made from 3D printers. This is a HUGE DIFFERENCE from other projects, which use prototypes made from 3D printers.  It is impossible to discover manufacturing issues when creating a prototype from a 3D printer. Injection moulds usually require long lead times up to 45 days. Of course, that doesn't include the unforeseen issues and edits that nees to be done to improve the mould.  Sometimes, that process can add 90 days to the original schedule.  But that's not in our "worry" equation now. it could take up to 90 days. But its all out of the "worry" equation now :)

b) Our team has more than 15 years of experience developing electronic and tech products. Kreyos Meteor is designed with mass production in mind.  Therefore, countless hours have been put into the ID design, PCB layouts, etc.  This ensures that we  won't have "unforeseen" issues during manufacturing and assembly.

c) EMS Manufacturing Partners - We partner with well-known EMS Factories (Electronics Manufacturing Service) to ensure we can manufacture the Kreyos Meteor on a mass scale. These EMS factories manufacture millions of electronic units monthly. With the Kreyos Meteor's layout, assembly and planning completed, any risk has also been decreased significantly.

Now here's the RISKS & CHALLENGES: 

a) Component lead times & availability

Lead times vary for different components.  Some take as long as three months just to deliver. We will be splitting our component orders based on manufacturing times.  Therefore, as soon as we have a good idea of estimated orders, we will immediately place orders for components that take longer to manufacture first. This will decrease our time to receive the components from suppliers.

b) Shipping Kreyos Meteor Worldwide

There are a number of unforeseen circumstances that can cause problems during the actual physical shipping of the Kreyos Meteor. Therefore, we will be working directly with world-class fulfillment companies that are extremely experienced in logistic. This will ensure that we are able to get your KREYOS Meteor Smartwatch into your hands in the least amount of time!

In Conclusion:

WOW! Thank you for reading this far. We will be doing OUR BEST, using all OUR RESOURCES, EFFORTS and ENERGY to deliver the best Kreyos Meteor Smartwatch to you. At Kreyos, we want to help you mobilize your world -- and we going to do whatever needs to be done to deliver your new Meteor to you on time!  We promise! :)

 

 

FAQs:

1) When can we choose the color of my watch, or the Men's/Women's?

A: Following the end of the project (AUG 12th), backers will be contacted to confirm color choices, men's/women's strap and also selections for accessory buyers. You will be required to fill in the survey to make sure we have all the correct information from you.

2) Am I suppose to manually add shipping if I'm not in the US?

A: Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. 

3) Help! What to do if I forget to pay for shipping?

A: No problem, just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the actual amount you need to pay. Select "No perk, I just want to contribute." Pay for it and done!

4) Is there a silent vibrating alarm?

A: YES! You can setup the alarm directly from the watch or via the Kreyos App.

5) Is there sleep tracking?

YES

6) Does it have a backlight?

A: YES! Kreyos Meteor has backlight inbuilt so you can view at night! With a shake it will activate the backlight.

7) What are the dimensions of the watch?

A: Height(47.5mm) x Wide (33.4mm) x Thickness (13.35mm)

8) How do I update my address?

A: Please contact us at the email below.

9) What are the 8 languages you currently support?

English, French, Spanish, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, and many more to come.

10) Are the bands interchangeable?

YES, its designed to fit most 22mm watch bands.

11) 2 watches to the same shipping address, how much does shipping cost?

A: You only need to pay shipping once for the same shipping address.

12) I'd like to buy 2 or more watches, can I pay extra using the same perk?

A: No, unless you choose the double or more perk options, you would have to place them in a separate order.

13) Will Kreyos have shipping issues with countries like Germany, Italy and the EU?

A: No, we will be working with world class logistic companies, also we will have all the necessary paperworks, CE, FCC. 

14) Will there be any VAT for EU countries

A: Clients in the EU will be responsible for any VAT that arises.

15) How do I upgrade my perk?

A: No problem, just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the difference you need to pay to upgrade. Select "No perk, I just want to contribute." Pay for it and email us at the below to inform us of the change.

16) I would like to buy the accessories too, can I do that in 1 contribution?

A: Unfortunately, you will have to pay in 2 separate contributions.

17) How long is the watchband.

A: It is 25cm in length.

18) If I have further questions where can I contact Kreyos. 

A: You can reach us at

Digital Display
Multi Silent Vibrating Alarms


UPDATE (28-JUNE-2013): We will be setting up a platform for developers to upload watch faces. Uploaded watch faces will then be available directly on the Kreyos App for downloading and pushing updates to the watch instantly.
Customizing your watchface is easy.  The Meteor includes more than 20 digital and analog watch faces.  Change the look and feel of your watch whenever you feel like it.  Of course, 20 is just the beginning!  More to come in the future!


No two humans are alike. So why should everyone have to wear their smartwatch on their wrist? That’s why we created a series of watchbands and accessories designed to fit your lifestyle.
All of our watchbands and accessories are designed using high-grade, durable silicone. As a result, they are waterproof, flexible and fun to wear – whether you’re a couch potato, a fashionista, or a professional athlete! 
This season, we’re offering our watchbands and accessories in a series of “hot” colors perfect for those who are fashion forward:







Because you can wear it as a watch, hang it from your belt, attach it to your bike or wear it around your neck, the Kreyos Meteor frees you up to do the things you need to do – without worrying about dropping or losing your smartphone.  And it gives you the freedom to communicate – via voice, text, or email – even when holding a phone or tablet is inconvenient.
Watch for more fun, flexible accessories and colors in the future!  You’ll want to collect them all!

UPDATE (28-JUNE-2013): Kreyos Meteor has a built-in accelerometer. Daily Activity “widgets” is built into the watch, so it tracks stats like steps, floor climbs, calories and distance taken daily. You will be able to sync them into your smartphone’s app. This is standalone, works totally fine without your smartphone with you. It automatically syncs the data to your app when its near the smartphone.
Kreyos Meteor WILL WORK directly with bluetooth or ANT+ sensors without being connected to the smartphone. Meteor WILL BE ABLE to receive data directly from the sensors WITHOUT a smartphone connected and populate it on the watch.
Kreyos Meteor itself has a sports mode for people who wants to track when they start and stop activities like, Walking, Running & Cycling. It has a 3,4,5 grid data option, CUSTOMIZABLE in any way you prefer . 
Grid Options include the below:
 a) Total Workout time b) Time of the day c) Total Distance d) Altitude e) Elevation Gain f) Speed g) Average Speed h) Top Speed i) Pace j) Average Pace k) Calories Burned l) Current Heart Rate m) Average Heart Rate n) Max Heart Rate o) Current Lap Time p) Average Lap Time q) Best Lap Time
Question 1: Is Kreyos Meteor able to show running speed data in sports mode?
A: Yes, when a smartphone is NOT available, Kreyos uses metrics from the accelerometer and gyrometer and calculates your speed. In the event of a smartphone being available it will receive data from smartphone's GPS.
Question 2: Is Kreyos Meteor able to show Cycling speed data in sports mode independently?
A: No, for cycling it will require either a smartphone GPS data available or a ANT+/Bluetooth Speed cadence sensor to show speed data on the watch.
Question 3: Is Kreyos Meteor able to show Heart rate data in sports mode independently?
A: No, you will require a ANT+/Bluetooth Heart rate sensor for the watch to display the heart rate data.




Whatever your sport, the Kreyos Meteor will work for you.  Ever try and ride a horse with a smartphone?  Or race a dirt bike across country without breaking that expensive glass screen on your smartphone?  How about swimming in the ocean?

Or snorkeling offshore?  No matter what you love to do, the Kreyos Meteor will help you maintain your fitness, share your progress with friends and teammates, and shout your successes to the world…via social media!
 




Unlike the first-generation smartwatches that only provide one-way notifications, the Kreyos Meteor is the first and only interactive smartwatch to let you use voice and gestures to control your smartwatch.   Built into the operating system of the smartwatch itself, this technology is far beyond the capacities of the first-generation watches prepping for the market today.  In fact, voice and gesture control cannot be easily added to other watches because adding voice and gesture control requires hardware, rather than software, integration.
That means, quite simply, that the other “smartwatches” on the market won’t have full gesture and voice control capabilities for a long time --- if ever.
And that’s not all.  Because we already have our Kreyos Platform and proprietary operating system designed and developed, we are in the position of being able to get to market faster than anyone else.  In fact, we don’t need the money for development.  We need it for production.  And that means that as soon as we reach our target on Indiegogo, production begins.

And if you’re an early adopter now, you’ll be the first to hear about future upgrades to the Kreyos Smartwatch.  And you’ll be among the first to enjoy downloading new and exciting applications, programs and UI changes.  That’s right.  You won’t have to buy a new watch. You’ll update your watch online.  Simple.  Effective.  Powerful.
That’s the Kreyos Meteor.

UPDATE (28-JUNE-2013): Watch apps can be written in C. Also we will be creating an desktop emulator, making it easy for interested developers to create watch apps for the Kreyos Meteor.
If you're an app developer, click here to sign up for our developer's mailing list. We'll keep you in the loop for the latest SDK updates. 


Examples of potential apps that can be build using the Gyrometer.




Kreyos has tested, dropped, hit, dunked, tested again – and discovered that the Kreyos Meteor is ready for production.  A few of them are in the hands of select media for review, and we’re simply burning to turn on our production line. 
We expect to have our first batch ready for shipment in late November after we reach our Indiegogo goal. 
As a supporter, you will be among the first to receive your own Kreyos Meteor. So pledge today – and you’ll be enjoying the most advanced smartwatch on the market in time for the holidays.
 


Here are some actual sketches of the watch in the early phase. Also we have included some of the UI wireframe sketches of the watch. More to come...







We have completed most of our moulds required for injection parts. What you see in the pictures are ACTUAL injection samples, NOT PROTOTYPES made from 3D printers.  



To produce Kreyos Meteor we have chosen to work with one of the world's most respected factories in China. Our lead engineer, lives in Shanghai and travels back and forth to meet with our manufacturer. He is managing the project development with dedicated engineering resources supplied by our manufacturer.



Injection moulding tools at the manufacturing facilities below:









We need your help to finalize our software development and go into mass production.



Here is how we will invest the funding we receive:



1) Software Development: We have started the IOS, Android, WP8 software development but the majority of the funding requested will be applied to complete final software coding, testing and UI design.



2) Mass Production: We need your support to secure procurement of the long lead components and meet the minimum order quantities required by the EMS factories. 



With your support we expect to have the first production of Kreyos Meteor in your hands by late November, we want to get Kreyos Meteor to you before Christmas!. We are very excited about this project and hope you are too. We appreciate your support and please share Kreyos with your friends too!
The amount of funding we require to achieve the final milestones is $100,000. We hope you will find it in your heart to help us deliver this long sought after, valuable and useful technology. 


Kreyos is a truly international team. Founded in the United States, our team features experts in different fields, located in the USA, Singapore, Spain, China, Taiwan, and the Philippines. 
Over the years, our team has worked for world-class companies, including HP, Microsoft, Acer, Lenovo, Hitachi, Toshiba, Amazon, Best Buy, REI, among many others.  
We each have a real passion for electronics and consumer products – and we obviously enjoy a variety of sports.  
In short, we built the Kreyos smartwatch because we really want to use it ourselves, and some say that’s the best way to innovate. 
We consider it our mission to pool our talents and bring the Kreyos to the world. 


Ultra Low Power MCU
Ultra Low Power 1.26 Inch Memory LCD Screen 144 x 168 pixel 
4 Waterproof Buttons
Vibrating motor
ANT/ANT+
Bluetooth 2.1+ EDR and 4.0 (Low Energy)
3-Axis Gyrometer 
3-Axis Accelerometer
Water Resistant Mini Speaker
Water Resistant MEMS Microphone with HIGH SNR and Flat Wide Band frequency response
Water resistant - Good for swimming and shower (ATMs: TBD)
150 mah Lithium Rechargeable Battery (7 days battery life)
USB Interface for Charging and Watch OS Update

 
 

Stretch Goals
UPDATE (01-JULY-2013): Our 1st Stretch Goal of $300,000!
Stretch Goal #1: Gamification Platform
The great thing about the Kreyos Meteor is that it’s interactive. We wanted to extend that and also make sure its fun and enjoyable at the same time for our users.
With your support it became a reality for Kreyos. We're very excited to announce our partnership with Badgeville (www.Badgeville.com), the leader in gamification platform. This allow us to provide our users with the best gamification experience possible. With the integration our users would be able enjoy the following below in the members community area and also on the Kreyos App.


Social: Share your achievements with your friends

Motivation: Activities earn you points, badges and achievements!

Fun: Make fitness fun! Share & compete with your friends.

Tracking: Set goals! Track your progress with your Kreyos Meteor by simply syncing your stats wirelessly to your Kreyos app.

UPDATE (11-JULY-2013):  Our 2nd Stretch Goal of $600,000!
Stretch Goal #2: Two Free Screen Protectors
All Indiegogo backers will receive TWO FREE Screen Protectors with their purchase of the Kreyos Meteor. Yes, you’ve heard us correctly, not one but TWO! Even though our screen is already scratch resistant, it wouldn’t hurt having an extra layer of protective skin on it.
UPDATE (27-JULY-2013):  Our 3rd Stretch Goal of $1000,000!
Stretch Goal #3: Sleep Tracking


Stretch Goal #4: $1.5Million.... 
Announcing our new stretch goal at $1.5Million
Our team will build a new app for iOS, Android & WP8 which allow Meteor users to use gestures to control applications on Windows and Apple computers. Once the Meteor is connected via bluetooth to the computer, the user can use gestures to control applications such as Powerpoint during a presentation, i.e: previous slide, next slide and so on. More applications will be coming soon. If we do hit this goal, we will have this app ready 3-4months after we delivery the Kreyos Meteor.

 

Risks and challenges 

There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any electronics product at scale. Mass manufacturing isn't the same as prototype development with 3D printers; we have to make sure they are secure and reliable, and also most importantly that they can be manufactured efficiently at mass volumes.
BUT..............
Here's the GOOD NEWS:
a) We have completed MOST of our moulds required for injection parts. What you see in the pictures are ACTUAL injection samples, NOT PROTOTYPES made from 3D printers. This is a HUGE DIFFERENCE from other projects, which use prototypes made from 3D printers.  It is impossible to discover manufacturing issues when creating a prototype from a 3D printer. Injection moulds usually require long lead times up to 45 days. Of course, that doesn't include the unforeseen issues and edits that nees to be done to improve the mould.  Sometimes, that process can add 90 days to the original schedule.  But that's not in our "worry" equation now. it could take up to 90 days. But its all out of the "worry" equation now :)
b) Our team has more than 15 years of experience developing electronic and tech products. Kreyos Meteor is designed with mass production in mind.  Therefore, countless hours have been put into the ID design, PCB layouts, etc.  This ensures that we  won't have "unforeseen" issues during manufacturing and assembly.
c) EMS Manufacturing Partners - We partner with well-known EMS Factories (Electronics Manufacturing Service) to ensure we can manufacture the Kreyos Meteor on a mass scale. These EMS factories manufacture millions of electronic units monthly. With the Kreyos Meteor's layout, assembly and planning completed, any risk has also been decreased significantly.
Now here's the RISKS & CHALLENGES: 
a) Component lead times & availability
Lead times vary for different components.  Some take as long as three months just to deliver. We will be splitting our component orders based on manufacturing times.  Therefore, as soon as we have a good idea of estimated orders, we will immediately place orders for components that take longer to manufacture first. This will decrease our time to receive the components from suppliers.
b) Shipping Kreyos Meteor Worldwide
There are a number of unforeseen circumstances that can cause problems during the actual physical shipping of the Kreyos Meteor. Therefore, we will be working directly with world-class fulfillment companies that are extremely experienced in logistic. This will ensure that we are able to get your KREYOS Meteor Smartwatch into your hands in the least amount of time!
In Conclusion:
WOW! Thank you for reading this far. We will be doing OUR BEST, using all OUR RESOURCES, EFFORTS and ENERGY to deliver the best Kreyos Meteor Smartwatch to you. At Kreyos, we want to help you mobilize your world -- and we going to do whatever needs to be done to deliver your new Meteor to you on time!  We promise! :)

 
 
FAQs:
1) When can we choose the color of my watch, or the Men's/Women's?
A: Following the end of the project (AUG 12th), backers will be contacted to confirm color choices, men's/women's strap and also selections for accessory buyers. You will be required to fill in the survey to make sure we have all the correct information from you.
2) Am I suppose to manually add shipping if I'm not in the US?
A: Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. 
3) Help! What to do if I forget to pay for shipping?
A: No problem, just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the actual amount you need to pay. Select "No perk, I just want to contribute." Pay for it and done!
4) Is there a silent vibrating alarm?
A: YES! You can setup the alarm directly from the watch or via the Kreyos App.
5) Is there sleep tracking?
YES
6) Does it have a backlight?
A: YES! Kreyos Meteor has backlight inbuilt so you can view at night! With a shake it will activate the backlight.
7) What are the dimensions of the watch?
A: Height(47.5mm) x Wide (33.4mm) x Thickness (13.35mm)
8) How do I update my address?
A: Please contact us at the email below.
9) What are the 8 languages you currently support?
English, French, Spanish, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, and many more to come.
10) Are the bands interchangeable?
YES, its designed to fit most 22mm watch bands.
11) 2 watches to the same shipping address, how much does shipping cost?
A: You only need to pay shipping once for the same shipping address.
12) I'd like to buy 2 or more watches, can I pay extra using the same perk?
A: No, unless you choose the double or more perk options, you would have to place them in a separate order.
13) Will Kreyos have shipping issues with countries like Germany, Italy and the EU?
A: No, we will be working with world class logistic companies, also we will have all the necessary paperworks, CE, FCC. 
14) Will there be any VAT for EU countries
A: Clients in the EU will be responsible for any VAT that arises.
15) How do I upgrade my perk?
A: No problem, just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the difference you need to pay to upgrade. Select "No perk, I just want to contribute." Pay for it and email us at the below to inform us of the change.
16) I would like to buy the accessories too, can I do that in 1 contribution?
A: Unfortunately, you will have to pay in 2 separate contributions.
17) How long is the watchband.
A: It is 25cm in length.
18) If I have further questions where can I contact Kreyos. 
A: You can reach us at

story:
We're introducing our Spring 2018 collection of hemp, vegan and sustainable shoes. They're super comfortable, lightweight and breathable. They help keep your feet dry and smelling fresh by wicking away moisture and preventing the growth of odor-causing organisms. They're a responsible choice for people who want to minimize the impact their fashion makes on the environment.

At Bohempia, our mission is to reintroduce hemp to the world and highlight how using it can help heal our planet. 

After years of working with both textile and shoes, we're combining our passions with the belief that the right way to run a company is to produce goods responsibly. We also make sure that all the people working with Bohempia get the fair and respectful treatment they deserve.

 

Help change how fashion goods are made, one pair of shoes at a time.

 

Collection

The classic court low-top sneaker from the way back is back, powered by hemp. A variety of colors to match any mood or occasion make it a likely candidate as your go-to shoe.

 

Inspired by SoCal surf sneakers, this sustainable slip-on is stylish in a laid-back kinda way. Who needs laces?

Famous as a boat shoe, this plimsole sneaker combines a nautical flair with casual fashion. A great match with pin rolled pants in colors to match anything.

The Holata's grown up sibling. The Orasa is a hi-top sneaker that was performance gear back when the NBA had 8-teams. Can be worn while strolling an exhibition or jumping off stages.

Great for expeditions of an urban variety, the Milek is our take on a classic boot style. Enjoy the looks of a boot with the comfort of a sneaker.

 

Why hemp?

Hemp is one of the world's oldest cultivated crops; it's been grown for almost 10,000 years. For centuries our ancestors used this versatile plant to make rope, oil, paper, and food. Today hemp is also used to make plastic, building materials, medicine and, now, footwear.

For many years governments demonized and often criminalized hemp. It stopped being used and was largely forgotten. Today both attitudes and laws have changed. More and more people realize the macro and micro benefits of this super plant. We advocate for the return of hemp to mainstream use as one of humankind's most beneficial and multipurpose crops.

Design

We're inspired by classic footwear silhouettes. From court inspired casual sneakers to rugged urban adventure boots. Timeless styles that are simple, yet refined. Shoes that can be worn with almost any outfit and on any occasion. Footwear classics that we think will become your favorite pair.

 

Construction & Comfort

We make shoes using vulcanized construction which means they don't need glue or stitching to bond the upper to the outsole. Heat and pressure firmly fuse the upper and the outsole together.

Comfort is very important to us. To make sure you have a great experience we use a blended cork-rubber insole that provides excellent cushioning and shock absorption. A special arch cookie gives extra support. 

 

Production

Great shoes and comfort go hand-in-hand. We strive to offer high-quality shoes. We produce our shoes in an independent factory located in Zlin, Czech Republic, a historic shoe-making city. It was once one of Europe's largest footwear centers and the many years of shoemaking experience and tradition live on in our factory partner.

 

People

Treating people with respect is core to BOHEMPIA'S belief system. We think it's the only way to run a business. It also means a fair 'living wage' for everyone from our team members to factory employees. We cooperate with Fashion Revolution in their work to bring attention to conditions of fashion industry workers.

 

Footwear Sizing

 

Hemp Apparel

Hemp apparel was supposed to be our next step from the beginning of our journey. Our hemp t-shirts are sustainable, eco-friendly, and made in the heart of Europe. They’re also antiseptic and thermoregulatory, which are great attributes for such a basic part of everyone‘s wardrobe. If you wonder, which size will suit you best, use our size chart.

 

Our Team

 

Gallery

Risks and challenges

Although we have spent the last 12 months perfecting our product assortment and working with suppliers to ensure we can deliver our high-quality rewards on time, challenges can sometimes arise.

We have made two previous production runs to test our supply chain-they passed with flying colors- and we do not anticipate any major problems. As happens occasionally with production we can have slight delays. Our team of footwear professionals is ready to take up the challenge and we're super stoked to share BOHEMPIA shoes with you!

story:
Hello!

My name is Farid Rahmani and I want to bring to you the best fashion forward site the internet will provide. 


What if you were in control of what companies put on the internet?

We will help you get to this answer.  You vote and we listen.  Every week and soon everyday we will put forth to you,  some of the most beautiful and jaw dropping dresses from around the world that YOU vote for.  The dress with the most vote will then be available on our site.  

With your help we can help bestdressawards.com become more than a dream,  but a competitive marketplace where your voice will be heard.  

If you decide to help us today,  all money will go to us funding a better site,  having a more competitive edge on acquiring high-end designer items. If we do not reach our goal, all money will be going  to the site.  We will not let anything deter us from our goal of making bestdressawards.com, your one stop shop for the hottest trends and dresses from around the world!

Even if you may not be able to contribute today,  We would love for you to get the word out on Twitter,  Facebook and Instagram.  We will offer some great perks for those who contribute and can't wait to be able to share our dream with you so not only will you get something out of it we will be able to put forth the most amazing site known to the community.

story:
I wish to attain the look of myself as I picture in my head. The only thing left I need to get me there are Juvederm lip injections. I love the look and feel of them once completed, and I absolutely will be using them for my work.

I aim to only get 4 syringes injected and they are 1ml each, costing 400-500 dollars a piece. It is extremely difficult to set aside funds for this procedure, as my income only is enough for bills, rent, and living expenses. With your help, we all can enjoy the outcome of this simple procedure. I do not aim to get a cartoon-ish look, just wanting fuller, plumper, and more useful lips. Which will help my work and life endeavors.

story:
LotusMudra - clothes and more!   -  a short introduction...

We design clothes for Yoga, Qi Gong, Meditation and other practices in high quality pure organic cotton of an individual design. Up to this point we have found partners with the same awareness to produce clothes in an ecological and sustainable way + which we would like to support in exchange! 
Our 'two-way' - project is ready to launch! 
We would like to be able to make our first order at the manufacturers in a minimum quantity required and therefore ask you to support us in sharing this project or backing our order list!
Our e-shop is ready but not active yet!!
See more details under: http://www.lotusmudra.com or
                                       http://www.facebook.com/LotusMudra

 

more details about the project:

is my label for clothes for workout or exercise like Yoga, Qi Gong, Tai Ji or Meditation or any other practice, but also for every day use. Our clothes are made of pure cotton and 100% ecological and with an ethical correct production line. Let me tell you in a few words how this project was born. I am a stage- and costume designer and in 2010 I finishes my TT as a Yoga teacher in China. I found out quiet quickly that wearing these t-shirt jogging clothes while exercising was not comfortable enough, I did not like the cloth sticking on my skin and the deformation of the clothes either. I wanted something with a loose fitting, simple classical cuts but still individual so that I could even step out of the Yoga center and have a cup of something without hoping anyone to see me…. We Yogis do also like pure white clothes with no logos, stripes or anything else on it, pure white as it stands for purity, divinity, spirituality….. So as a costume designer I started to design my own clothes and soon people asked me where I had bought these clothes. The idea to confectionate was born! I made a big research where and how to produce my fabrics, I searched in France, Germany, China and India… walked on cotton fields, through villages, manufactories and finally found the partners with the same ethical consciousness than my brand. Last winter I spent in Amritsar accompanying the realization of the samples which are done now, I designed 26 different models for both man and women and in two colors. So far I was supported by my friends and the money I had still on my account. I created an e-shop, realized by a webmaster of course, a photographer which worked for free and many friends which supported me, but now I am at the point of the first order and therefore I need your help!
On this way I met many interesting people and projects which I would like to work with and support in exchange. I'll introduce 2 of them to you a bit further down in the text!
 
 
 

 

 

 

who we are:

I am a 45 year old stage- and costume designer and also a Kundalini Yoga Teacher.   I was born in Munich, Germany, but for 6 years I have lived in a small village in southern France. LotusMudra is my first Label and the white and indigo cotton garments my first collection.

My second collection, made from cashmere, is in preparation!

Of course all this is not possible to realize alone, so we became a small team of photographers, web-designer, teachers, travel guides, weavers, tailors etc who will all have a 'portrait' and will be introduced on my website!!

Eco design begins when designing, but we also take our ethical and social responsibility very seriously. Therefore we try to make all working processes and conditions transparent and work together with manufacturers who work with the same awareness to make ecological and sustainable products.

where the money goes:

If you want an idea come alive it needs more than a good idea, energy and friends who help you! If you want constant quality of your product you can not just ask your tailor around the corner. Fabrics woven and stitched after your ideas need a minimum order-quantity, otherwise it is not possible for manufacturers to produce effectivly. I found a middle sized company in India which does only organic cotton and started some 10 years ago like me with a dream! They offered me a first very small minimum order-quantity, because they believe in this collection!

Weaving, stichting, shipping costs and taxes is where the money, your money would be invested in - and for every Euro more we could afford to launch a publicity campaign and make work more people on the presentation of LotusMudra!

See where else the money goes.....

projects we support:

During my research into who really works with organic cotton, I came across some really special people and projects!

With 2 of them I would like to continue to work together and so support each other.

The first project is the "Women Weave Charitable Trust" situated in Maheshwar, India. This is a project founded in 2003, supporting the role of women in handloom weaving and working towards making handloom a profitable, fulfilling, sustainable and dignified income-earning activity.

http://www.womenweave.org/

You will be able to see their work and their products will be available in our e-shop...

 

The second project we would like to support directly, is the creation of a Yoga-School with attached Niwas (accommodation) in Amritsar. They have already bought the ground and the construction plans are ready, so the project is ready for take-off! From every item we sell, 5% will go directly into the trust of Parvinder Singh Khalsa from "SikhKaras", who is already supporting weavers, schools and many small projects in and around Amritsar. You will be able to follow the project on our blog!
http://www.sikhkaras.com/
I've been there myself and saw how much they have achieved....

You can find some pics on my blog under: www.lotusmudrafollow.wordpress.com

 

 

Thank you:

We thank you for your pledge or for just spreading the word!

For a perk of minimum 5 € we would like to offer you a beautiful photo & text of the LotusMudra-Meditation taken during the shooting of our first collection!

This comes to you by e-mail...

 

 

For a perk of minimum 10 € we will send you a wooden Mala, 108 beads to your inner self! This Mala comes from Amritsar, India - the home of the Golden Temple and the spiritual home of LotusMudra!

Wahe Guru!

For a perk of minimum 20 € we will offer you exclusively our LotusMudra Lanyard! They are in quality cotton with a stitched logo and 60cm long. (This is just a sample as the real LotusMudra-Lanyards haven't arrived yet!)

For a perk of minimum 50 € we will offer you exclusively one of our first edition of the LotusMudra - Flipbooks! Each of it contains an Asana, an exercise shown picture by picture and one meditation with explanation at the end of each book!

 

For a perk of minimum 100 € we will offer you exclusively a printout of your personal Yoga-Serie. You tell us on what you would like to work on (stress, confidence, sleep, nervous-system, body pain in certain regions....) and we will find a Kriya/Serie of excercises which will support you!

This comes as a printout to you by post...

For a perk of minimum 200 € we will offer you exclusively a 20 % reduction on your first order (for personal use, please no omnibus orders) in our online-store!

Have a peek on: www.lotusmudra.com

 

For a perk of minimum 500 € we will offer you exclusively a free 2-days Yoga workshop in the south of France! We offer you the course-fees, you take care of the travel expenses, and we will of course help you in finding a place to stay if you need to...

For a perk of minimum 1000 € we will offer you exclusively one of the rare places in our small group Yogatravels to India! You pay for the travel, we offer you the course fees and a unique  12 day experience!

Have a look on www.lotusmudratravels.com

 

The perks will be send out to you after this campaign has ended and/or our online shop is open!
 
But also without wanting or being able to pledge you can help us! Tell your friends and colleagues about this project if you like it. 'Like it' in your social networks, talk about it and share it!!!
Thank you, Danke, grazie & merci!
 
Here the link to our campaign if you want to pass it to your friends or colleagues by mail or net:
http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/lotusmudra-cl...
story_txt:
LotusMudra - clothes and more!   -  a short introduction...
We design clothes for Yoga, Qi Gong, Meditation and other practices in high quality pure organic cotton of an individual design. Up to this point we have found partners with the same awareness to produce clothes in an ecological and sustainable way + which we would like to support in exchange! 
Our 'two-way' - project is ready to launch! 
We would like to be able to make our first order at the manufacturers in a minimum quantity required and therefore ask you to support us in sharing this project or backing our order list!Our e-shop is ready but not active yet!!See more details under: http://www.lotusmudra.com or
                                       http://www.facebook.com/LotusMudra 
more details about the project:
is my label for clothes for workout or exercise like Yoga, Qi Gong, Tai Ji or Meditation or any other practice, but also for every day use. Our clothes are made of pure cotton and 100% ecological and with an ethical correct production line. Let me tell you in a few words how this project was born. I am a stage- and costume designer and in 2010 I finishes my TT as a Yoga teacher in China. I found out quiet quickly that wearing these t-shirt jogging clothes while exercising was not comfortable enough, I did not like the cloth sticking on my skin and the deformation of the clothes either. I wanted something with a loose fitting, simple classical cuts but still individual so that I could even step out of the Yoga center and have a cup of something without hoping anyone to see me…. We Yogis do also like pure white clothes with no logos, stripes or anything else on it, pure white as it stands for purity, divinity, spirituality….. So as a costume designer I started to design my own clothes and soon people asked me where I had bought these clothes. The idea to confectionate was born! I made a big research where and how to produce my fabrics, I searched in France, Germany, China and India… walked on cotton fields, through villages, manufactories and finally found the partners with the same ethical consciousness than my brand. Last winter I spent in Amritsar accompanying the realization of the samples which are done now, I designed 26 different models for both man and women and in two colors. So far I was supported by my friends and the money I had still on my account. I created an e-shop, realized by a webmaster of course, a photographer which worked for free and many friends which supported me, but now I am at the point of the first order and therefore I need your help!On this way I met many interesting people and projects which I would like to work with and support in exchange. I'll introduce 2 of them to you a bit further down in the text!
 
 

 

 
 

 
who we are:
I am a 45 year old stage- and costume designer and also a Kundalini Yoga Teacher.   I was born in Munich, Germany, but for 6 years I have lived in a small village in southern France. LotusMudra is my first Label and the white and indigo cotton garments my first collection.

story:
About Us

Infinitude Clothing™ is revolutionizing the world of medical apparel.  We will bring our customers “Premium medical apparel with a Purpose™.”  We will “Bring the White Coat Back,™” and we are dedicated to providing the healthcare industry with the medical apparel it has long deserved.

Infinitude Clothing is taking professional medical apparel to the next level of wearable technology. The line will be a perfect blend of trend-setting style, quality and comfort that will cater to customers who desire finer quality apparel and the polished look it produces. Soft, durable, and functional, Infinitude Clothing will surround the wearer with chic, all-over comfort. The brand will offer distinctive scrubs in both off the shelf designs in an array of colors as well as a wide range of custom made-to-order individualized designs. These will positively impact hospitals, medical centers, doctors' and dentists' offices in creating a more professional, productive and most importantly, a healthier environment for everyone. The soft and flexible fabric has been specially selected to complement the subtle details of the design and deliver a flawless fit.

INFINITUDE powered by X-Static®

Infinitude Clothing has partnered with Noble Biomaterials to power its fabrics with clinically-proven X-STATIC® antimicrobial technology. Proven to extremes by Olympic athletes, US Special Forces and luxury athletic brands like LULULEMON®, X-STATIC® delivers unmatched protection and performance. Made with 99.9% pure silver, X-STATIC® enhances these products with permanent anti-odor and antimicrobial performance. X-STATIC® also has natural temperature regulating properties to keep you performing at your best, which also means being the most comfortable while still looking fabulous. Fabrics powered by X-STATIC® inhibit the growth of bacteria directly on the surface of the fabric. Through the continuous release of silver ions, it offers permanent protection that lasts for the life of the product. Continuous protection is provided for patients and staff between launderings and since it's inherent in the fabric, does not require modification in staff behavior. This leading-edge technology offers extensive appeal for Infinitude Clothing since it provides customers with the benefit of empowering them to fight and prevent bacterial contamination of medical apparel. We believe our complete line including premium medical scrubs, surgical hats/caps, white coats and stethoscope covers will serve as the first-of-its-kind in the battle against healthcare associated infections (HAIs).

X-STATIC® is registered as an antimicrobial with the US EPA, is Oeko-Tex Standard 100 certified and is used in dozens of FDA approved products.*

Healthcare associated infections are the fourth leading cause of death in the United States. Approximately 1 out of every 20 hospitalized patients will contract an HAI causing approximately 99,000 deaths and costing the healthcare system billions of dollars annually.1

Dr. Gil Ortega, a board-certified orthopedic trauma surgeon and serial entrepreneur, founded Infinitude Clothing. Throughout his career in healthcare, Dr. Ortega has developed an in-depth and intimate knowledge of the healthcare industry. Dr. Ortega has a passion for improving healthcare in every way he can to ensure patients always receive the best and most efficient healthcare. Infinitude Clothing is excited to begin the revolution in upgrading the standard of medical apparel.

1http://www.cdc.gov/HAI/burden.html

What Stage are we at now?

We have all our designs, our website is ready, our cutter and sewers are ready, our distribution line is ready, our social media campaign is ready, and we are ready.  So why do we need a Indiegogo project?  We want to launch our product line with all the awesome fabrics, designs, and coolness that the healthcare field deserves.  We need funding to help us buy all the Silver. Well, not quite the silver, but the power behind our fabrics of X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology that will protect patients, hospitals, and healthcare workers from the bacterial badness that led to way too many HAIs.  

Seriously though, we do need the money to help cover the production costs of the fabrics (we want to include as many colors as we can to help our customers have more color choices), as well as the fixed and variable costs of having our product line cut and sewn in the USA.   Did we mention that we are very proud to cut and sew our medical apparel line right here in the USA!  We want our company to help bring more jobs back to our great country.

Our Cool Perks (please combine at will; give as Gifts, also review our packages)

$7 Perk

Stethoscope Cover with Silver stripes of X-Static® power
Stethoscope Cover with Silver stripes of X-Static® power

One of our cool and unique stethoscope covers powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology that helps protect you and your patients against cross contamination with bacteria. Yup, it helps kill bacterial badness. Pick your color of black or white. Tweet of thanks and appreciation. (Retail cost $9.99)

Estimated delivery: Mar 2013
Add $20 to ship outside the US
 

$20 Perk

Surgical Cap
Surgical Cap

One of our cool and unique Surgical Caps powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology that helps protect you and your patients against cross contamination with bacteria. Yup, it helps kill bacterial badness. Pick your color of black or white. One size fits all. Tweet of thanks and appreciation. (Retail cost $24.99)

Estimated delivery: Mar 2013
Add $20 to ship outside the US

$22 Perk

Surgical Hat
Surgical Hat

One of very cool Surgical Hats powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology that helps protect you and your patients against cross contamination with bacteria. Yup, it helps kill bacterial badness. Pick your color of black or white. One size fits all. Tweet of thanks and appreciation. (Retail cost $27.99)

Estimated delivery: Mar 2013
Add $20 to ship outside the US

$30 Perk

V-Neck Performance/Undershirt

One of our cool performance shirts that wicks away moisture, feels awesome, and helps protect you and your patients against cross contamination with bacteria as powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology. Yup, it helps kill bacterial badness. Pick your size and color: black or white. For Men and Women. Tweet of thanks and appreciation. (Retail cost $42.99)

Estimated delivery: Mar 2013
Add $20 to ship outside the US

$37 Perk

Men's V-Neck Surgical Scrub Top
Men's V-Neck Surgical Scrub Top

One very cool Men's surgical V-Neck scrub tops that wicks away moisture, feels awesome, helps protect you and your patients against cross contamination with bacteria as powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology. Yup, it helps kill bacterial badness. Pick your size and color combination: black with black or white collar and inner pockets, dark navy blue with blue or white collar and inner pockets. Tweet of thanks and appreciation. (Retail cost $44.99)

Estimated delivery: Mar 2013
Add $20 to ship outside the US

$37 Perk

Women's Surgical Scrub Top

One of our cool Women's surgical V-Neck scrub tops that wicks away moisture, feels awesome, and helps protect you and your patients against cross contamination with bacteria as powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology. Yup, it helps kill bacterial badness. Pick your size and color combination: black with black or white collar and inner pockets, dark navy blue with blue or white collar and inner pockets. Tweet of thanks and appreciation. (Retail cost $44.99)

Estimated delivery: Mar 2013
Add $20 to ship outside the US

$67 Perk

Men's V-Neck Surgical Scrub Top
Men's Surgical Scrub Bottom

Men's Combo Package: combo of men's surgical V-Neck scrub top and scrub bottom that wick away moisture, feel awesome, and help protect you and your patients against cross contamination with bacteria as powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology. Yup, they help kill bacterial badness. Pick your sizes and color combination: black with black or white collar and inner pockets, dark navy blue with blue or white collar and inner pockets. Tweet of thanks and appreciation. (Retail cost $84.98)

Estimated delivery: Mar 2013
Add $20 to ship outside the US

$67 Perk

Women's V-Neck Surgical Scrub Top
Women's Surgical Scrub Bottom

Women's Combo Package: combo of our women's surgical V-Neck scrub top and scrub bottom that wick away moisture, feel awesome, and help protect you and your patients against cross contamination with bacteria as powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology. Yup, they help kill bacterial badness. Pick your sizes and color combination: black with black or white collar and inner pockets, dark navy blue with blue or white collar and inner pockets (if reached, our stretch goal will include Pink and silver colors!).  Tweet of thanks and appreciation. (Retail cost $84.98)

Estimated delivery: Mar 2013
Add $20 to ship outside the US

$67 Perk

The White Coat with Silver stripes of X-Static® power
The White Coat with Silver stripes of X-Static® power

We are bringing the White Coat back and now it has silver in it as being powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology. It helps fight bacterial badness while also feeling cool and awesome. We like being cool and awesome. Pick your size. Color is white with silver stripes of X-Static® power. Your iPad® will fit in the front pockets. Tweet of course. (Retail cost $84.99)

Estimated delivery: Mar 2013

Add $20 to ship outside the US

$147 Perk

Full Coverage Package (Performance shirt not shown here but it is included)

Complete Package: stethoscope cover, performance shirt, scrub top and bottom, and the White Coat. Oh yeah all our products help fight bacterial badness or infections to be technical as being powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology. You pick your sizes and color combinations. Tweet of course. (Retail cost $179.96)

Estimated delivery: Mar 2013
Add $25 to ship outside the US

$1,250 Perk

Physician group package

Office practice package. Yes you will be one of the first offices to have our practice package, and we will let the world know that on our website, on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Pinterest. It includes 10 complete packages: stethoscope cover, performance shirt, scrub top and bottom, and the white coat. Oh yeah all our products help fight bacterial badness or infections to be technical as being powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology. You pick your sizes and color combinations. Tweet of course, office like, follow, and Pin. (Retail cost $1,799.60)

Estimated delivery: Mar 2013
Add $150 to ship outside the US

$10,000 Perk

First Hospital or Surgery Center Package

Our First Hospital or Surgery Center Trend Setter Package.  Our First Hospital or Surgery Center Trend Setter Package. Yes, you recognize how significant it is to protect your patients and physicians against cross contamination with bacteria as our medical apparel line is powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology. Your center is the Trend Setter of all hospitals or surgery centers. Your center's name and picture will be displayed on our website and in our newswire as being the first hospital or surgery center in the United States to be fit with our medical apparel line with improved protection against cross contamination with bacterial badness. You can contact us on the specifics of this package. The biggest Tweet, Like, Follow, and Pin we can offer. (Retail cost: Priceless)

Estimated delivery: Apr 2013

Ships within the US only

What will happen after your contribution?

First of all, thank you for your support.  Second, in March, you will receive an email from us that will ask you for your size and/or color choices depending on what perks you order.  If you order multiple products, you will be able to tell us what colors and/or sizes you want for each product depending on the perk you ordered.  Third, this project involves over a year and a half of research and development. We spent a lot of time just choosing the right partner for our antimicrobial fabric. Noble Biomaterials is an international leader in bacterial management solutions. With their help, we have spent a lot of time choosing the best fitting fabrics that will take professional medical apparel to the next level of wearable technology. We have also traveled and met several manufacturers and distributors, and we are confident we have chosen the best of the best to help us bring our customers the best and most Premium medical apparel with a Purpose™.  Therefore, we are confident you will be pleased with your Perks!

Finally, thank you for all your support and checking us out. 

Stretch Goals

We have had several requests for information on additional colors and/or designs.  Our answer is YES.  We will have additional colors and designs available for our perks if we reach our Stretch Goals in our campaign funding.  For example, we have plans for having our covers in not only black or white but also pink, silver, and navy blue.  Our Men's scrub tops have another design available in addition to our V Neck, which is an Open Neck design.  We are planning on making this available if we meet our stretch goals and/or in the second to third quarter of this year.  Also we will have our women's scrub top available in pink and white combinations if we meet our stretch goals and/or in the second to third quarter of this year.  We are excited about what we have available and what else is in our pipeline.  The medical apparel world has not seen anything yet as we have several other designs, colors, and unique products in our pipeline, so please stay tuned.  We will also allow our customers options on customizing their own scrubs!  Soon.

First Hospital or Surgery Center Package

Our First Hospital or Surgery Center Trend Setter Package.  Our First Hospital or Surgery Center Trend Setter Package. Yes, you recognize how significant it is to protect your patients and physicians against cross contamination with bacteria as our medical apparel line is powered with X-Static® Antimicrobial Technology. Your center is the Trend Setter of all hospitals or surgery centers. Your center's name and picture will be displayed on our website and in our newswire as being the first hospital or surgery center in the United States to be fit with our medical apparel line with improved protection against cross contamination with bacterial badness. You can contact us on the specifics of this package. The biggest Tweet, Like, Follow, and Pin we can offer. (Retail cost: Priceless)

Estimated delivery: Apr 2013

Ships within the US only
What will happen after your contribution?
First of all, thank you for your support.  Second, in March, you will receive an email from us that will ask you for your size and/or color choices depending on what perks you order.  If you order multiple products, you will be able to tell us what colors and/or sizes you want for each product depending on the perk you ordered.  Third, this project involves over a year and a half of research and development. We spent a lot of time just choosing the right partner for our antimicrobial fabric. Noble Biomaterials is an international leader in bacterial management solutions. With their help, we have spent a lot of time choosing the best fitting fabrics that will take professional medical apparel to the next level of wearable technology. We have also traveled and met several manufacturers and distributors, and we are confident we have chosen the best of the best to help us bring our customers the best and most Premium medical apparel with a Purpose™.  Therefore, we are confident you will be pleased with your Perks!
Finally, thank you for all your support and checking us out. 
Stretch Goals
We have had several requests for information on additional colors and/or designs.  Our answer is YES.  We will have additional colors and designs available for our perks if we reach our Stretch Goals in our campaign funding.  For example, we have plans for having our covers in not only black or white but also pink, silver, and navy blue.  Our Men's scrub tops have another design available in addition to our V Neck, which is an Open Neck design.  We are planning on making this available if we meet our stretch goals and/or in the second to third quarter of this year.  Also we will have our women's scrub top available in pink and white combinations if we meet our stretch goals and/or in the second to third quarter of this year.  We are excited about what we have available and what else is in our pipeline.  The medical apparel world has not seen anything yet as we have several other designs, colors, and unique products in our pipeline, so please stay tuned.  We will also allow our customers options on customizing their own scrubs!  Soon.

story:
Our MEN IN BLUE deserve a more comfortable, secure option for concealing back-up weapons on their ankles.

Law enforcement officials in the line of duty will typically prefer to carry a back-up weapon that would be smaller, lighter and more concealed than the department issued main weapon.The concealment of such back-up weapons would either require a vest which would be worn under the uniform shirt thus requiring the shirt to be opened before effectively retrieving the weapon or as a holster worn on the ankle, either around a boot or sock. The ankle holsters on the market today are typically comprised of a fabric holster and Velcro straps requiring the straps to be tightened and re-tightened several times in order to ensure the security of the weapon. Additionally, the currently available ankle holsters are typically bulky and uncomfortable for the officers, resulting in the choice to not carry back-up weapons at all. In order to properly secure the holster to the boot and avoid slippage, it is more effective to have the holster lace directly onto the existing boot as an overlay making it as one with the upper of the boot. Along with the benefit to police officers, as many states are adopting Right to Carry Laws, this ankle holster would enable citizens with a CHL (Concealed Handgun License) to exercise their right carry, for their personal protection, while effectively concealing from public view.

This unique and exceptional design of this holster securely laces the base to the upper ankle portion of the boot by the eyelets that match up with the eyelets of the wearers boot and with a gap that matches up with the gap of the boot, essentially making it one complete piece.  The base also supports changeable, custom formed holders for additional items such as telescoping batons, pepper spray, flares, cell phones and other items.  Each base/holster is custom made based upon specific boot model/style and the back-up weapon carried.

We have an option for boots with side zippers too!  At the end of the day when your feet are tired and the first thing you want to do is kick your boots off, just unsnap and unzip, no need to unlace or alter the boot in any way.  A security strap can also be added upon request. 

Extensive research has been conducted in securing the most efficient and cost effective way to create the Kydex mold and leather base. Up to now, all design work (trial and error) has been done out of the garage.  We have a designated space on site that will need a few small tweaks as we ramp up production.  Prototypes have already been completed and user tests are being conducted with outstanding feedback.  The funds raised will enable dies to be produced and molds to be made to ensure faster, more efficient production of the Mulligator. This will allow for mass production enabling it to hit the market sooner. By helping fund our project, you will be pre-ordering the Mulligator and kickstarting our first production run of units.

 All backers will be invited to provide us with real-time feedback on the security and comfort of the design of your custom made holster.  This has been a labor of love with the desire to help keep police officers, and ultimately the public, more safe and secure.  We have a patent pending so all we need now is you to help launch The Mulligator into a reality.

Any amount is appreciated but if a financial contribution isn't possible we would still appreciate your feedback.  And please tell everyone you know about the Mulligator!!!

story:
Our Mission

The founders and owners of Crossfit Tavros had a dream that began in a garage. The dream grew and a few more people caught the vision and it moved to a bigger location to house those people.

  • Cody, Eric, Jen and Martha are the purveyors of the Tavros Mission and Dream.
  • We desire to reach as many people as possible with the true Crossfit vision and methodology: that everyone can be fit, everywhere. 
  • With your help, we can reach more people in Ventura, and offer them a more complete health and fitness experience that they will want to continue their whole lives,


What do we need to make the vision real?

  • We will be putting the funds raised towards marketing, building improvements, equipment,coach education and member appreciation.

Perks

1.  $10 Donation – Our undying gratitude

2.  $25 Donation – Your name on the wall at our Grand Re Opening

3.  $50 Donation – T shirt, Your name on the wall at our Grand Re Opening

4.  $75 Donation – All of the above plus 3 private training sessions

5.  $100 Donation – T Shirt, name on wall, 5 Private Training sessions

6.  $200 Donation – All of the $100 donation items, plus Free entry to an upcoming Crossfit Tavros competition

7.  $250 Donation - T shirt, Your name on the wall at our Grand Re Opening, 1 Free month of Group Classes (For you or a friend), 10% discount all merchandise for 1 year

8.  $500 Donation - T shirt, Your name on the wall at our Grand Re Opening, 2 Free months of group classes (For you or a friend) 10% discount all merchandise for 1 year

9.  $1000 Donation T shirt, Your name on the wall at our Grand Re Opening, 3 months free group classes (For you or a friend) 10% discount all merchandise for 1 year

10.  $5000 Donation- T shirt and Sweatshirt, Your name on the wall at our Grand Re Opening, 1 Year free classes, 5 private training sessions (for you or a friend), 10% discount all merchandise for 1 year

Risks & Challenges

We have taken a big leap by moving to a larger location and gone out on a limb because we believe our vision will make a difference in the Ventura community.

  • Our deep love and passion for fitness and creating a community that desires to spur each other towards greatness makes us the perfect candidiates to have the biggest and BEST gym in Ventura.
  • Your help in this campaign will pave the way to making this happen, WE cannot do this alone.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can't contribute?  That's OK!

  • Share this campaign with your family and friends.

story: It's my dream to go to Camp Woodward this summer. I've been working on saving money but I have a long way to go. I know that Camp Woodward will help me as a skater and as a person. If you can, will you please consider making a contribution towards my dream? Thank you in advance for your help.
