story:
IronCloud is engineered to make life easier and to help you exceed your goals. Intuitive A.I. training technologies built into this robust and stylish watch keep you on track while providing you with instant health metrics, weather and GPS updates, and keeps you in touch with the outside world.

 

 

Competition is the key to breaking records. The IronCloud features an innovative Virtual Opponent to help motivate you to run faster and keep pace. Set the speed you want it to run alongside you, and you're off to the races!  

 

The IronCloud features a variety of sport modes for your favorite indoor or outdoor activities. Included with the IronCloud:

  • Outdoor Running
  • Treadmill Running
  • Hiking
  • Climbing
  • Pool Swimming
  • Open Water Swimming
  • Biking
  • MTB

With each of these sports modes you can monitor and track various metrics including physiological metrics, running dynamics, and fitness tracking features to ensure you’re staying on top of your goals.

 

We are hard at work integrating new sport modes that will be available via software updates in the future.

 

Your heartbeat can tell a lot about your activity levels. The IronCloud features a wrist-based Valencell heart rate sensor allowing you to track your day-to-day heart rate along with your activity levels during exercise.

 

An intelligent watch requires an intelligent app. The IronCloud pairs seamlessly with the Geekery Fitmix iOS and Android app to allow users to monitor their performance, watch workout tutorials, connect with other users and even listen to music.

Using the app is easy, and allows for a hassle-free way to change the IronCloud’s settings, check progress reports, and create customized training programs.

 

To get the most out of your workout, elevating your heart beat at a consistent pace is essential. The Training Zone will allow you to maximize your results by carefully matching your personal goals to the appropriate Training Zone.

There are five different Training Zones:

Whatever your goals are for any given workout, ensure that your heart rate is up to speed.

 

 

 

Stay on top of your daily performance and goals with the IronCloud. The IronCloud will track and monitor your:

Additionally, you can set Target Steps and Target Calories and receive a notification whenever you meet your goal.

The IronCloud also sends an alert every 45 minutes to remind wearers to stand up and stretch and walk around to help combat the adverse effects of prolonged sitting.

Energy Saver Mode:  Up to 50 Days.

Time Mode:  Up to 30 Days.

Sports/GPS Mode:  Up to 30 Hours.

In a world of smartwatches that continuously need to be recharged, the IronCloud offers a solution. What good is a watch that drains the battery even when just displaying the time? It defeats the purpose. That's why the IronCloud sports a 480mah lithium battery that provides 50 days of battery life in time mode. Additionally, we integrated intelligent power-saving technology into both the hardware and software to help save power automatically.

 

The IronCloud is meant for all sports—even the wet ones. The IronCloud is water resistant up to 100 meters (10 ATM) which makes it safe for most water sports including swimming, snorkeling, and boat racing. Additionally, you can lock the touch screen while in the water, so you don't run into any accidental taps or swipes.

If you aren't into water sports, no problem—the IronCloud is still safe for regular use including handwashing, rain, and accidental spills.

Must-haves for all of your outdoor adventures, the IronCloud features state-of-the-art tools to help you better understand the world around you. Built into the IronCloud are a compass, barometer, and altimeter. The watch also features a highly-accurate stopwatch for timing your next run or workout down to the millisecond.

 


Always know where you are in the world with the built-in Triple Navigation System. This system is comprised of BDS from China, GPS from the U.S. and GLONASS from Russia. 

 

Always stay ready for any weather changes that may come your way. Via the Bluetooth connection to your smartphone, the IronCloud allows users to check local weather forecasts to stay in the know.

Stronger than traditional glass and used in premium watches for years, the IronCloud's sapphire crystal screen is built to withstand harsh environments and common everyday bumps and scratches. The sapphire crystal is stronger than traditional glass, making it the least prone to shattering and scratching of all materials used in watches.

 

The IronCloud's bezel is made of the same TC4 titanium they use to build rockets. If it's tough enough for the harsh conditions of space, it’s more than durable enough for your even most intense workouts outdoors, in the ocean, or harsh environments. TC4 is also hyper-allergenic and is suitable for prolonged exposure to the skin.

 

Say goodbye to glare! Transflective displays like the one found in the IronCloud both transmit and reflect light, which virtually eliminates the need for a backlight under sunny conditions which in turn saves tremendous amounts of energy.

 

Quickly check the time, track your progress, or view notifications under even the brightest conditions such as direct sunlight.

 

IronCloud comes with the TPU band which is perfect for everyday wear and can withstand water and harsh UV rays. It’s super comfortable, made with lightweight, silky smooth material, and perfect for exercising.

Want another band? Just upgrade your perk to the Elite Edition and you will get both a TPU band and a stainless-still band.

The stainless-steel band is more professional and is made of robust components to stay looking sharp and clean for years.

Both bands are easily interchangeable in seconds to adjust to your look on the fly.  Screwdrivers are also included in the Elite Edition.

 

  

Pair the IronCloud with your compatible smartphone, and you'll be able to see all of your notifications right on your wrist! Whenever someone texts, calls, or emails you, stay updated instantly! The watch will also notify you of any weather reports or upcoming events on your calendar as well.

While some companies think that one watch face fits all, the IronCloud allows users to customize the watch face to match their unique style and aesthetic. From flashy to minimal designs, everyone is bound to find a watch face that fits their needs.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We will announce the color based on the result of the survey by next Friday. If you have not fill out the color survey, please enter it here: https://goo.gl/forms/JmVnV5H2K7w8ZNN42

 

IronCloud is the newest product from Geekery. Geekery specializes in the development and production of wearable smart devices for a variety of applications. Most notably, our mobile app Fitmix is used by over 3 million people in China to track and manage their fitness data, create workout routines and connect with each other. We have a diverse team made of people from a variety of tech and non-tech backgrounds including a former Chairman of Samsung China tablets, a DJ, band manager, and many professional software and hardware engineers that bring decades of valuable knowledge and expertise.

 

Q&A:

1. Do you have prototype video?

Yes.  In the video, the watch is attached to the charging base so it is much thicker than itself. The thickness is 17.6mm and 75g. You can find those spec in details under spec section.

Also, in the video, you might have a question about why there is a lack of data for heart rate in the APP when you click on the record. It is because that route is monitored without watch, only by APP. We want to show you that you can still track your route without your watch if you have the app. For the backer who is interested in what will it look like when you wear the watch and track the heart rate page, here is a picture we took to show you the heart rate monitor page when wearing the watch.

2. Do you have a picture of a man wearing IronCloud on hand?

If you have not fill out the color survey, please enter it here: https://goo.gl/forms/JmVnV5H2K7w8ZNN42 IronCloud is the newest product from Geekery. Geekery specializes in the development and production of wearable smart devices for a variety of applications. Most notably, our mobile app Fitmix is used by over 3 million people in China to track and manage their fitness data, create workout routines and connect with each other. We have a diverse team made of people from a variety of tech and non-tech backgrounds including a former Chairman of Samsung China tablets, a DJ, band manager, and many professional software and hardware engineers that bring decades of valuable knowledge and expertise. Q&A:1. Do you have prototype video?Yes.  In the video, the watch is attached to the charging base so it is much thicker than itself. The thickness is 17.6mm and 75g. You can find those spec in details under spec section.Also, in the video, you might have a question about why there is a lack of data for heart rate in the APP when you click on the record. It is because that route is monitored without watch, only by APP. We want to show you that you can still track your route without your watch if you have the app. For the backer who is interested in what will it look like when you wear the watch and track the heart rate page, here is a picture we took to show you the heart rate monitor page when wearing the watch.2. Do you have a picture of a man wearing IronCloud on hand?

story:
These are the ONLY pairs of underwear with 75% thread- and stitch-free construction, which combats chafing and ride-ups. Lightweight Italian-made microfiber nylon jersey stretch fabric keeps you cool and dry, while simultaneously defining and supporting your body without tight compression.

Designed by Michael Berkowitz, craftsman of the most iconic men’s underwear brands like Calvin Klein and Nike, this line of Teamkit underwear will add the top-notch quality, versatility and breathability that your underwear drawer needs.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Inspired by high-end cycling apparel, our team developed a new way of constructing underwear: space-age thermo-bonding.

This patent-pending process replaces stitched hems, which can irritate skin and cause poor fit, with clean-bonded BondX hems, which are then fused together without thread. This process eliminates 75% of the total threads on the garment’s seams and hems, so the underwear fits like a glove and keeps its shape.

As a result, this unique technology supports your natural range of motion, lets you move without constraints and creates chafe-free comfort. It also provides recovery fit, which means the material will naturally snap back into place and it won’t bunch up.

This technology, coupled with the most luxurious super fine knitted Microfiber Nylon and Lycra, this material is nothing short of elite.

 

 

 

Experience game-changing support with the patent-pending ClubHouse Pouch.

We created our 3-D pouch for one purpose: to be the perfect, no-bounce solution that keeps your goods in place and close to your body at all times. Its ergonomic make is fused to the garment without any stitching and engineered to fit like a glove.

Get locked-in stability for every activity, every time.

 

 

 

Teamkit underwear offers a clean, modern style for every occasion. This is the only line of underwear that will stay put no matter what — even the super soft waistband won’t pinch or roll. Not only does this elite material deliver a long-lasting, unparallelled look, but it also accentuates your body while remaining secure.

With Teamkit, cutting out your scratchy boardshort linings is also a thing of the past. Simply slip your stretchy boxer briefs or trunks on and off, and wear them like a rash guard.

 

 

 

This silky material dries faster than your cotton underwear. Now, you can take on your toughest, sweatiest pursuits with ease. Embedded with quick-dry technology and a body moisture system, this Italian microfiber nylon jersey material will keep you sweat-free and focused on your game.

Forgot to pack your swimsuit? That’s OK. Our underwear is perfect to chill in by the pool or in the ocean. It's chlorine and saltwater resistant, and even protect you from the sun up to UV +50!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Michael Berkowitz has spent more than 25 years designing some of the most iconic men’s underwear brands, such as Calvin Klein, Nike, GapBody and more. Some of his consulting clients include big stars like Tom Ford and Jay Z. It’s safe to say that he’s reputable… and he’s bringing his expertise to Teamkit.

With almost three decades of designing under his belt, Berkowitz can guarantee that this underwear provides luxurious comfort, precise fit, plus support and agility for the modern man and his active life.

 

 

 

[EP BADGES]

 

 

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Teamkit Boxer Briefs a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a pair, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
Hi folks! We are Catherine & Angtak from the social enterprise We are KAL.
We met through our shared passion for wool from the nomadic region Kharnak in the Himalayas, in Ladakh, India.

For 5 years we have been working on this unique wool from the land where Angtak spent his childhood and his family still keeps animals. Yak wool, sheep wool and lambswool which grow on the animals at altitudes of 4000m – 5000m!

Since 2014 we have created a global community around our wool with our characteristic hand-spun and handwoven accessories, home textiles, yarn and garments.  
Every summer we source yak wool, sheep wool and lambswool from the small community of Angtak's native place.  

However, in order to process the wool we have been travelling across the Himalayas for many days to bring our wool for professional carding to the neighbouring state Himachal Pradesh. This extra effort is due to the lack of suitable machines in the isolated region Ladakh. 

We would now like to step up our game and set up our own wool unit in Ladakh, India and are raising 15000€ for this goal.

The processing is an important step in the making of finest woollen textiles as it removes the coarse hair of the animals. Our focus is and will always be on hand-spun and handwoven textiles. With these machines we are not replacing any of the precious hand-craft of this region. We dearly appreciate this aesthetic and it is the essence of our work.

These machines are of great help to improve the quality of our hand-selected, unique wool. 



 

Our wool unit is made up of a carding machine for sheep wool, a dehairing machine for yak wool and a wool opener. Each machine has its own function. In order to create the highest quality wool from Ladakh it is essential to have a machine for each raw material rather than mixing both wools in the same machine.

Carding machine for sheep wool and lambs wool 

 

Dehairing Machine for yak wool
 

We already have a wonderful property surrounded by lush green close to the region’s capital Leh, with enough space for a machine room and a studio for our team. So space-wise we are all set!


Here is an overview of our expenses:

Of course, we would like you to experience our new wool, freshly carded with the new machines. With each of our textiles, the handwork matters – here the hand-spinning and hand-weaving as well as the creation of timeless essentials, with the focus on the precious wool. For this reason all our processing is without any addition of chemical substances.

Here is an overview of our unique rewards for your support!

 

 

By introducing machine processing prior to the actual handwork we are creating impact for:

  • the overall quality of the raw, processed wool: here this means very precise removal of hair and other bits of organic matter, combing the wool and avoiding “balls”. This makes the wool easy to spin by hand as the spinner does not constantly need to remove organic matter or balls.

Spinning the yak wool by hand - the better the material, the easier the spinning and the more regular the yarn
 

  • ease for the spinner means better yarn which again, is of great advantage for the knitter and weaver: threads are less likely to break, are more even and the feel of the finished textile is finer

Weaver Vishwanath testing the freshly carded wool on his loom

 

  • When a textile is less likely to break, is fine and soft the wearer will use it more often

In our situation this means a big relief for the weavers as well.
Dehairing the yak wool by hand is a tedious job, takes endless hours for only a little amount of wool and hurts the eyes.

By facilitating this step, we can directly provide our team clean and fine wool and they can fully focus on the art of handspinning and handweaving / knitting.

Padma Angmo & Tashi Yangchen checking the wool

 

Moreover, by having machines in-house we are also able to buy a larger amount of wool as we can process it in time. This is beneficial to the nomads. We save on the transport to Himachal Pradesh which always took more than one entire week. Therefore also us, we can focus on the processing of our wool here in Ladakh.

It is also important to note that this nomadic community has experienced a huge wave of migration. Since the 1990s more than 80% of its population have left the nomadic life and settled close to Ladakh's capital city Leh with the hope for a better and easier future. 

However, the majority of the settled nomads, especially women, now work on construction sites as labourers. With our wool work we connect the community of nomads and settled nomads. Also, we can offer the settled women work by continuing their heritage textile art instead of tough daily labor. 

Paljor Tundup, Urgyen, Dolma Angmo and Tsering Angchok selling us their wool.

 

 

Risks & Challenges:

  • maintenance of machines – here our supplier is in Punjab, India so in case we need repairs, they are not far
  • wool: sometimes there is a limit on a certain shade of wool. This also depends on each year.

 

Please spread the word on our campaign and on the beautiful wool of Kharnak and this nomadic lifestyle. We are always very happy about receiving feedback and new ideas.

We would be really grateful if you could share the campaign on your social media, this would be a great support for us! If you have any questions about the rewards please check the FAQs!

Thank you and lots of love from Ladakh, 

Catherine + Angtak + the rest of the team!

story:
*The Townie Flat by OESH is now available on oeshshoes.com *

 

THE WORLD'S MOST COMFORTABLE SOLE

Encapsulated within the Townie are over 2,000 stacked honeycomb spring units that are 3D printed into the sole with our patent pending 3D print process. This unique sole structure, that cannot be made with any other manufacturing method, gives you a healthy spring in your step like you've never before experienced.

OESH IS ALREADY SHIPPING THE TOWNIES…

AND THIS IS WHAT OESHERS ARE SAYING!

 

"They're sexy!”

-Mary in Minneapolis, MN

 

"THEY STAY ON!"

-Lucie in Albemarle County, VA

 

"The new flat I just received is exceptionally comfortable. The thicker sole is so goooddd for my feet and they stay on and no slippage. Wanting you to know this new design is like no other flat I have had with your exquisite sole."

-Linda in Boys Town, NE 

 

2,000 STACKED HONEYCOMB SPRINGS

 

DELIVER THE TOWNIE'S HEALTHY BOUNCE  

STAYS SECURE AND MOVES WITH YOU

A unique grippy soft-touch 3D printed heel piece keeps the Townie secure on your foot.

Unlike a typical d'Orsay dress flat, the stretchy knit upper and the grippy flexible heel piece work together to keep the flat secure on your foot.

EASY SLIP-ON 

All you have to do to get going in your Townies is step right in.

GET TO KNOW THE TOWNIE FLAT

The Townie flat by OESH combines an impossibly springy 3D printed sole with unbeatable traction, a grippy soft-touch 3D printed heel piece that stays put, a breathable stretchy cotton knit upper that molds naturally to the shape of your foot, and a beautiful hand crochet finish. 

MADE DIFFERENTLY IN CHARLOTTESVILLE

Not only are the Townies you receive 100% made in Charlottesville, so are the 3D printers used to manufacture them. With your support, we are creating exciting new opportunities in STEM as we build additional 3D printers, purchase and program additional computerized knitting machines, and build out clean, high tech factory space as OESH keeps growing. 

THE CROCHET STITCHING IS MORE THAN JUST BEAUTIFUL

Footwear manufacturing is typically done overseas predominantly by factory workers who are exposed to toxic chemicals and heavy VOC emissions, especially as the footwear upper is attached to the sole. The unique patent pending sole design of the Townie bypasses the need for these toxic processes and allows that the upper parts of the shoe can be attached with hand crochet.

Looking at this crochet attachment step as a way to help empower women with this skill who cannot easily work outside the home, we're excited to partner with the International Rescue Committee (IRC) of Charlottesville, an organization that does extraordinary work for our community:

"The IRC of Charlottesville looks for opportunities for refugees and other immigrants to thrive in the community. Many refugee women face barriers to more traditional employment opportunities outside the home, including limited English language skills, and limited access to transportation and affordable child care. OESH’s model of employing refugee women to crochet together the Townie flat not only removes these barriers but also empowers these women by enabling them to contribute to their families’ economic self-sufficiency in a way that balances their families’ needs."

CLEAN SUSTAINABLE MANUFACTURING

At OESH, we're committed to long-term Health and Wellness - of the OESHer's who wear our shoes, of our team members who create our shoes, and of our planet. Our local 3D printing, machine knitting, and on demand manufacturing combine to minimize waste and utilize an attachment process that - unlike most all of the footwear industry - does not use glues and heat tunnels activating toxic VOCs. Your beautiful OESH Townie, with its hand finished crochet stitching, will be setting an entirely new standard for sustainability in shoe manufacturing.  

 

Natural Cotton Yarn + 100% Recyclable Rubber Pellets  =  The Townie

MEET OTHERS* ON THE TEAM

Introducing the OESH robots working on your shoes: 

TIMELINE

The Townie has been long in development, supported first by grants from the National Science Foundation to develop the 3D printing process to create it and then with matching funds from the state of Virginia and most recently from the city of Charlottesville. With your support we can now make that leap from development to production.

Our fulfillment timeline is conservative because unlike typical shoes that are molded in mass quantities overseas, your Townie flats will be made just for you, assembled and crocheted by hand. On demand manufacturing allows us to have more efficient stock of sizes and patterns, eliminating the tremendous waste that occurs in typical shoe manufacturing. 

TESTIMONIALS 

A few women in town wore our first prototypes, and here is what they told us afterward:  

"These are the prettiest comfortable shoes I've ever worn."

-Joan, Trainer 

"I wear them every day, everywhere, with everything."

-Cathy, Teacher

"All my friends love the look. And I love how they stay on my feet."

-Marianna, Student

CONNECT WITH US

If you have any questions about the Campaign or more general inquiry regarding OESH Shoes, please email indiegogo@oeshshoes.com

Find OESH on social media! We would love for you to share the Townie Flat with your followers, and tag us on Instagram, Facebook, or Twitter,

Leave a comment on the campaign by clicking the comments tab above.

TESTIMONIALS 
A few women in town wore our first prototypes, and here is what they told us afterward:

-Joan, Trainer 
"I wear them every day, everywhere, with everything."
-Cathy, Teacher
"All my friends love the look. And I love how they stay on my feet."
-Marianna, Student
CONNECT WITH US
If you have any questions about the Campaign or more general inquiry regarding OESH Shoes, please email indiegogo@oeshshoes.com
Find OESH on social media! We would love for you to share the Townie Flat with your followers, and tag us on Instagram, Facebook, or Twitter,
Leave a comment on the campaign by clicking the comments tab above.

story:
Holding PomaBrush feels right. Its soft all-silicone body is gentle to the touch. Its lightweight, perfectly balanced.

Press its single button, and feel the most powerful silicone electric toothbrush spring to life.

 

Charge Just 3x Per Year

PomaBrush is built for your on-the-go lifestyle.

Whether it's for an overseas trip or a last-minute office meeting, this cool toothbrush powers your confidence for 4 months on a single charge. 

 

PomaBrush has no stand or bulky attachments. Instead, it comes with the wireless charging PomaCase.

The compact travel-friendly case protects and keeps your cool toothbrush clean, wherever you go.  
 


The cool toothbrush holds 1 month of charge, and its compact wireless case extends this for an additional 3 months.

Never worry about running out of charge.

 

Full Silicone Head & Body

Its soft antimicrobial silicone bristles won’t hurt your gums or enamel, as they gently massage and strengthen them.

And as silicone is naturally antimicrobial, the bristles stay clean for longer. This means you only need to change them once every 6 months.    

 

 

 

A New Standard For Electric Toothbrushes  

 

 


Use it with Your Favorite Toothpaste

Everybody’s teeth and palate are different, and using PomaBrush doesn’t mean you need to change your favorite toothpaste!

Whether you like strawberry flavored Colgate or fresh and minty Sensodyne, PomaBrush’s vibrations will clean thoroughly and evenly. 
 

 
Certified By 

PomaBrush's factory has been reviewed and approved by all relevant agencies, including the FDA, and the European Union’s RoHS and CE.

The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is the USA’s government agency responsible for protecting public health. They regulate a variety of consumer products, including food, medications, vaccines, and medical devices. And they have approved PomaBrush for your oral hygiene.

The RoHS is a product-level compliance based on the European Union’s 2002/95/EC Directive. It certifies that electrical and electronic equipment is safe for use. PomaBrush is RoHS-approved.

The CE marking indicates conformity with health, safety, and environmental protection standards for products sold within the European Economic Area. The CE marking is also found on products sold outside the EEA that have been manufactured to EEA standards. PomaBrush has CE approval.
 

 

Form Follows Function   

 

PomaBrush captures the essence of minimalist toothbrush design — less is more. 
 

No Wi-Fi. No AI. No Bluetooth. And none of those extra bells and whistles you’ll never use.

This means it’s 5x lighter, and 20% smaller than its competitors. And not even 3x heavier than a non-electric toothbrush! 
 

 

Enjoy Painless Deep Cleaning  

 


PomaBrush has 15,000 brush strokes per minute to gently pulse water between your teeth, breaking up plaque and sweeping it away. Thanks to its consistent power delivery the brush removes more plaque and tartar from the teeth and gums. And is effective to reduce the gingivitis.

PomaBrush provides a comprehensive cleaning with its silicone bristles and is gentle enough for even sensitive teeth and gums. And thanks to its soft silicone bristles you don’t need to worry about hurting your gums, even if you brush more than 2 times a day.

PomaBrush automatically buzzes every 30 seconds to let you know you should switch to the next quarter. And turns off after the recommended 2 minutes.

 

Use Your Silicone Brush For Longer   

 

 

Silicone is far more durable than nylon, meaning your brush head wears out much slower. 

 

Thanks to this conscious toothbrush design, you only need to change your brush heads once every 6 months.

And at this time, you’ll know your PomaBrush is always clean. With silicone’s naturally antimicrobial properties, germs don’t accumulate on the brush head or brush.   

 

Clean Better with PomaBrush

 

PomaBrush’s powerful sonic vibrations dislodge plaque that builds on and between your teeth. And stimulate the salivary glands, which assists with cleaning.

PomaBrush’s silicone bristles clean gently yet thoroughly. Thanks to this, they offer extra protection against gingivitis while massaging and activating your gums.

With its in-built 2-minute timer and 30-second reminders to change brushing areas, PomaBrush promotes the correct tooth brushing habits recommended by dentists worldwide.

This helps decrease the chances of oral health conditions, including plaque and gum diseases.
 

Built To Get Wet  

 


Use it in the shower, or even in the tub! PomaBrush is 100% waterproof, certified to IPX7.

 

Take it with you wherever you go  

 

 

 


Review from Co-founder Taras Polishchuk

 
 

Media About Us 
 


Warranties 

We know you’ll love the PomaBrush experience. But if you’re still not convinced, don’t worry. You have a full 7 days to try it out, and if you’re not convinced that this is the brush for you, just send it back for a full refund!

 

Use your PomaBrush with confidence! We’re proud to offer a 2-year warranty, that automatically protects your PomaBrush for a full two years. If there are any manufacturing defects that affect its use, just send it back for repair or replacement. No questions asked!

 

 


PomaBrush Delivers Perfect Market Solution    

 


Unlocked Stretch Goals

hanks to all of your combined efforts, you all have the option to get the Premium Carbon Edition PomaBrush for an exclusive £89.00 ($99) price. 

This exclusive edition takes the sleekness of the Black Mist PomaBrush and continues it outwards, wrapping your PomaCase in a futuristic black sheen.

Level-up your toothbrushing experience with the Premium Carbon Edition PomaBrush.
Get yours here!


When we crossed the $200K milestone, our 2nd stretch goal was officially unlocked. The PomaClip!
 


This sleek magnetic surface is the perfect home for your PomaBrush. Just hold it up to its shiny surface, and your PomaBrush will stick — its silicone body seemingly floating in the air, decluttering your sink and making your bathroom look even more like a minimalist’s dream home!

Get the PomaClip as an add-on HERE for only $19 (£15).


After crossing $400K, you're now able to add a Silicone Cover to your PomaCase.

The PomaCase is already a durable wireless charging case, but for those extreme travelers amongst you, the Silicone Cover adds a little more protection. And it lets you bring the style of your unique PomaBrush color to the PomaCase exterior.

Get your PomaCase Silicone Cover now for just $19 (£15) HERE.

We’re still unlocking a color at $500K, but while we wait, we thought we’d unlock an extra color…

So, we tallied the votes so far, and the top color is Forest Green!

 


 

After listening to your multiple requests and extensive research, we’re setting another stretch goal which will unlock the brush head you’ve been wanting—the one with charcoal-infused nylon and silicone bristles!

This brush head is ideal for removing heavier plaque buildup leaving you with a confident smile. And its bristles remain gentle on your gums, offering a tender and pleasant massage.

Get as many extra silicone and nylon brush heads as you like, starting at $11 (£9). 

Get yours here. 
 

The Perfect Gift

 

With its 4 colors, minimalist design, and effective cleaning — PomaBrush is a great gift. With people changing their toothbrushes every 3 months, gifting PomaBrush is never too late or early, and it will last them years of enjoyable use.

 

Rewards    

Add-ons

 

 

Pick Your Style

Your PomaBrush is an extension of you, in whatever color you choose.   


Premium Carbon Edition PomaBrush

The exclusive edition that takes the sleekness of the Black Mist PomaBrush and continues it outwards, wrapping your PomaCase in a futuristic black sheen. 

Product Specificifications   

Designing the Ultimate PomaBrush


We spent years wading through the market looking for the best electric toothbrush that would meet our lifestyle and dental routine. One you could use with ease, then slide in your backpack, handbag or luggage, and carry with you everywhere. 
 

 All we found instead were $200 giant electric toothbrushes with 5 different buttons and brush heads oscillating at impressive 50,000 pulses that literally cut my sensitive gums.  

So we created PomaBrush. A product of collaboration between the best-in-class American engineering and premium Italian design that focused on the core — creating the best electric toothbrush.   


 


Team  

Andrei Majewski, Product 

Andrei is a serial entrepreneur, corporate executive and ex-frequent traveller. After a few years of red-eye flights (60+ flights per year) and hyper-miling around the globe with his startup, he found himself working at the airport. The story of ideal toothbrush was born in-between packaging in some hotel in Singapore in late 2018 and never left his thoughts since then. Next morning he texted Taras and PomaBrush history began. 

Taras Polischuk, Vision 

Taras is a serial tech entrepreneur. Taras is a former COO of Sweatcoin, the fastest growing health and fitness app with over 45 million users and partner at Talent Equity Ventures, a HR and EdTech focused VC fund. He’s also a co-founder in Dorm, an audio learning app. He was the first person to hear about the ideal silicone electric toothbrush and the first supporter of the product.

Andrew Granovski, Technology 

Andrei has degrees in Physics — computer methods in physics and quantum mechanics — and International Business. During university, he created a model for selection and growing startups by venture funds. Fascinated in technology since early childhood, Andrei built an online marketplace with over 500,000 customers and 50+ employees.

Kegan McDaniel, Design 

Kegan brings a decade of experience in industrial design of electronic gadgets and personal care devices. He has worked for major fast-moving consumer goods and personal care brands like Koss Corporation, Procter & Gamble, etc.  

 

Timeline 

PomBrush is fully managed by The Crowdfunding Formula (TCF), the biggest digital marketing team responsible for the top crowdfunding campaigns. Join our campaigns in raising an average of $1.2M.

 

 

More than $30,000,000 has been raised with Sprint's support.

story:
Beautiful, Eco-Friendly Parasols for All!

We create uniquely designed and eco-friendly parasols made from paper & bamboo, working in collaboration with Mexican artists and inspired by the world around us. 

 

Our Story 

Whether walking around the city or strolling on the sandy beaches, we have seen people from all walks of life carrying umbrellas to protect themselves from the sun. While your standard umbrella may protect you from the sun, it also traps heat, which is where our parasol idea came into being. What if someone offered parasols that not only served their purpose but were also beautiful and told a story, and what if that story was modernized to reflect the rich past and present of Mexico. We sprang into action and through collaboration with Mexican artist Ariadna Narvaez, ParaSol was born. 

We will begin our focus on wholesale distribution in high-impact touristic areas: Heritage sites, Playa del Carmen, Cancun, Mexico City and Cabo San Lucas. 

We Believe

​1. Style

In the last decade, Mexico has established itself as a fostering environment and stage for innovative artists, designers and fashion entrepreneurs . Today's Mexico is on the cutting-edge and many have uniquely blended their art into a new brand of traditional Mexican culture and the Millennial. However, globally, the narrative has not changed, especially in areas where tourists frequent most, and are still limited to an array of cacti and sombreros. We believe in pushing the narrative into the future by utilizing that blend and offering it in a new, unique product for visitors to Mexico and Mexicans alike! 

2. Low Environmental Impact

It's just plain silly that we would even have to explain, so we're not going to. 

3. Social Responsibility

In a country where there is just as much disadvantage as advantage, it is important to give back and support the community. Many organizations here are focused on helping bring change and equal opportunities to all, but they need help. That is why we are working with Weavers for Justice, a volunteer-based NGO working with Mayan weaving women's cooperatives in Chiapas. In addition to philanthropy, we are supporting their efforts by raising awareness, fundraising and much more! 

The Campaign

We would like to raise $6,000 in capital which would go to:

  1. Production of 1,000 units in 4 designs 
  2. Shipping Costs:
    • Importation fees
    • Customs processing & Admin. 
    • Registration 
    • Handling
  3. Distribution
  4. Wholesale promotional & sales materials

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate you just visiting our page and learning more about ParaSol! Even if you can't contribute, you can still help by using the Indiegogo tools and sharing our page! 

Thanks for visiting!

story:
You can now order FreeBelts directly from our website. Click the button blow to shop now!   

             

 

 

 

 

 


Need a belt but don't want that awkward buckle bulge? Find it annoying having to buckle and unbuckle your belt? Don't like that uncomfortable pressure when wearing belts?  

No more hassle with buckles, try FreeBelts. Snap on once and forget about your belt all day —that’s one less thing to deal with in your day.  Also, look sleek and feel comfortable. 

Goodbye, all the troubles with regular belts. Hello, buckle-free life. :)

 

 

 

   ▶ Easy snap closure 

   ▶ High quality elastic weave for great support

   ▶ Wide-range adjustability for the proper length and fit you want
 

        

        Boom! That's FreeBelt, for your buckle-free perfect fit.
 


If you’re a size larger than 50”. If you want to rock that half-tuck style without showing the belt. Try snapping FreeBelt on the second belt loops. The model is wearing pants 1 inch larger than his size—still holds them up. :)

You can also easily cut and shorten FreeBelts like you do with belts with a slide-buckle.  
 

 

 

We created FreeBelts to assure that no matter who you are, and what beautiful style you choose to wear, it will always be easy, fit properly and feel comfortable. 
 

 

Just choose how many FreeBelts you want here. Once you pledge, please visit our survey page to pick your belts. Select any from the entire collection—kids/adult, color & size. 

 

*Please note these are just samples. The final products you’ll receive will have a much nicer finish!

 

We now have Kids line! More surprises on the way. Please share the word with everyone you know, so at the end of the campaign, we can all have fun choosing from more variety!

  1. $3,000 funded: Freebelts Kids launches!  We did it! :)

  2. $7,000 funded: Blue Grey (Adult)  Yes! One more down :)

  3. $10,000 funded: More cute designs for FreeBelts Kids   Hooray!

 

 

 How do I choose my belts?

Once you pledge, please use our Indiegogo Survey page to choose your FreeBelts. www.freebelt.co/indiegogo-guide

 The width? 

The widths of the belts are:  
 - FreeBelts (adult) : 35mm / 1.4 inch
 - FreeBelts Kids - Olive Green : 29mm/1.15 inch
 - FreeBelts Kids -Red/Blue, Pink, Lilac: 25mm / 1 inch

 Yes

We now have FreeBelts For Kids! We'll keep adding more cool designs for both kids and adult lines as we raise more fund. :)     

 Yes

FreeBelts  do the job belts are supposed to do—they really hold your pants up. 

 Yes

FreeBelts fit all sizes—it's one-size-fits-all in principle. Can’t believe it? Trust us, our magic is real :)

But for the greatest fit we have 2 sizes of adult belts, and Kids line for toddlers through teens. The sizes are specified on the survey page to chose your belts.

 Yes

FreeBelts are ethically and sustainably manufactured, with high-quality, durable materials and legitimate labor. 

 Yes

All 1st generation FreeBelts are vegan. We wanted to create something ANYBODY can wear and feel good about it.

 Yes

We have applied for a patent, and currently have 'patent pending' status.

 Why support this campaign? 

To bring this cool idea to life, so far we've tested multiple prototypes with different structure designs, dimensions, parts, and materials. We finally landed on what works great and are aiming to bring this to the mass market with your help.

 Still have a question?

Ask in the comment section or reach us at hi@freebelt.co. :)
 

 

Follow Us

story:
Hello, world! Today we're introducing to you the project of our lives – the CONTEMPUS watch series!

"CONTEMPUS" is a name derived from two words which sum up the idea perfectly - "contemporary" and "tempus", which is the Latin word for its majesty, Time itself.

We create aesthetically-designed timepieces in a contemporary manner, drawing inspiration from the works of the most prominent modern craftsmen of our time.

We find the idea of combining various wristwatch designs with some details which define popular design styles and features to be more interesting.

Summing it up, we decided to create a watch series inspired by famous cultural architecture and design phenomena, icons, and standards, so here's our first try. Hope you'll like it! 


 

Du Stalo is a special limited edition of our main series. Here are some of its features:

  • Stylish monochrome coloration with an ashen leather strap 
  • Shiny new dial made of brushed stainless steel 
  • Special edition for KS backers with a serial number on each piece
  • 100 pcs. only available

Please note that Super Early Bird offers don't include this watch, it's available only in DU STALO REWARD, but it can be included in packages with 2, 3, 4 or more watches.

The main concept of our design is a neat, contemporary outlook stripped of unnecessary visual garbage. Our project is an ode to the masters of the past, present and future: those, who move the industry of aesthetic objective beauty to new heights.

In each series, every watch will be developed under the influence of the jewels of contemporary design which surrounds us all over the world. You can always be sure you'll be wearing a trendy watch, because we rely on standards that are eternal.

The source of inspiration for the first CONTEMPUS series design lies in modern Eastern architecture, Asian and European product design and postmodernist art of the second half of the XX century.

There are two models in the first series, each with the option of a single or the more convenient two-hand format, underlining the universality of the concept and out-of-time longevity of the inspirational objects. All you need to do is choose what is more suitable for you and CONTEMPUS will do the rest. Decorating your wrist in the best way possible!

As we mentioned earlier, while developing the initial CONTEMPUS series, we drew inspiration from the different objects of product design, modern architecture, postmodernist art.

We found a lot of aesthetic beauty in the works of architects who defined the contemporary look of modern Asia in the XX century. This found a reflection in the design of a convex dial of our watch. We adore the simple, yet dynamic outlines, elegant, thin shapes, and weird outlook of the buildings that serve as landmarks in big Eastern cities and referred to in the ergonomic and slim design of our case.

We were touched by the works of craftsmen such as Zaha Hadid, Shigeru Ban, Zhu Pei, Masahiro Mori, and Yanagi Satori. Their signature ideas are expressed in our design.

We also worship the classic product design of the XX century and the people who influenced it the most. There are a lot of historically significant objects which define the industry in the second half of the XX century. We reflected homage to these masterpieces in CONTEMPUS shape and design as well.

The most influential designers who affected us are Dieter Rams, Issey Miyake, Arne Jacobsen, and Paul Henning, as well as the abstract works of Gerrit Richards, Ettore Sottsass, and Roger Talon, and the minimalist beauty of the legendary Sodra Angby, Stockholm district.

Another thing that we found interesting and touching is the philosophy of post-modern art with its ability to shake simplicity with a small touch of abstraction and color work. It's reflected in the whimsical design of the hands and a tiny injection of contrasting colors in it.

We're proud that we've managed to create an interesting and outstanding timepiece with a lot of attention to details. It was a hard task to recreate the most distinctive features of the concept and turn them into an attractive stylish wristwatch with a unique touch.

The strong concept was a vital matter for us all the way here. We wanted to add a touch of uniqueness even for aesthetic details. That's why all models are named in Esperanto language which is a fusion of several different languages. "Du" and "Unu" particles define the quantity of hands, while "Nokte" (Night) and "Neĝo" (Snow) define the dial's color. The same goes for the watch straps: we decided to make them different for each model in gradations of a brown palette. Also, each strap has slightly different texture from another color. 

This kind of shape refers to the modern masterpieces of Asian architecture style with its mesmerizing curves and aerodynamic smoothness. The case also refers to the concept with its soft, rounded shape and transitions.

We decided to pick a neat, simple, and clean face outlook in order to underline the simplicity and minimalism of Scandinavian designs and architecture with its strictness in small details which can be seen in its dial layout.

The hands have a whimsical shape and contrast color, being a reference to the straightforwardness of post-modern art. The hands are curved and follow the shape of a dial, mesmerizingly crawling to the outer ring. It's also reflected in the layout, which has several colored indexes in its monochrome look. 

The idea to create CONTEMPUS was born from the sympathy and study of the history of design and architecture. Our team assembled on the basis of common interests and later decided to manifest our passion in a solid object. That's how we began to work on the wristwatch.

We wanted to create a series of timepieces that praises design, art, and architecture through their history, commemorating their most interesting and distinctive features and stages in each watch collection. The first series relies on shapes of Eastern architecture, an Asian and European product design and retrospective post-modern art. We've gone through hundreds of appropriate inspirational objects before we picked those which inspire us more than any other. The final result of this brainstorm is what you see now :)

Our primary goal in forming the final price was to make our dream come true in the first place, and share our vision and idea with you and then with the whole world. There are several factors related to our US$ 89 / CA$ 111 price, which includes the lack of intermediaries and retail markup.

Our comparative graph shows the difference in the pricing policy between CONTEMPUS and any other typical watch in our price range. With your help, we'll have the opportunity to offer you the best price possible, avoiding any distribution and retail markups and cutting our own profit. That gives you an attractive raw price of only US$ 115.

We appreciate your participation and realize your desire to get your watch in due time. That's why we separated the production into several stages and coordinated each with our manufacturer. Our production plan considers the possibility of little delays, so graphic table reflects the maximum possible terms. In fact, we predict shorter periods for each production stage, so we hope to be able to deliver the watches even earlier!

Please note that the price here is much lower than the future retail price. So you'll be able to save 40% ordering your CONTEMPUS now. Multiple items will result in even higher discounts! The more watches you order, the more affordable they get, which can result in more convenient rewards! All rewards have limited offers, so hurry to reserve a spot. 

Each timepiece is made of lightweight 316L stainless steel — one of the best and universal solutions in the watch market. The black model has a durable and awesome-looking PVD black coating. The lightweight case is protected with solid crystal mineral glass and has X ATM water resistance. Watch movement is accurate and reliable Japanese Miyota GL20 Slim. Nokte models are PVD-coated in black, while all Neĝo watches have a gunmetal case.

Case Diameter: 39 mm 
Case Thickness: 8 mm 
Band Material: Genuine Leather 
Band Width: 20 mm narrowing to 18 mm 
Total Weight: 35 gram 
Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel 
Buckle: 316L Stainless Steel 
Glass: Crystal Mineral Glass 
Movement: Miyota Slim 2 hands movement GL20 
Water Resistant: 5 ATM

Your support is a huge guiding force for us and only with your help will we be able to make our project happen! However, even if you can't fund our project right now, we will be grateful if you'll tell your friends and followers about us. Share our project on Twitter or on Facebook and follow us on Instagram! 

INSTAGRAM: instagram.com/contemp.us/

FACEBOOK: facebook.com/contempus.watches/

TWITTER: twitter.com/contemp_us

Are you a journalist or a blogger? Or do you simply want these images for yourself? Any way, you can download high-resolution images of CONTEMPUS from Dropbox. And if you have any other inquiries please send us an e-mail to: info@contemp.us
story_txt:

Today we're introducing to you the project of our lives – the CONTEMPUS watch series!"CONTEMPUS" is a name derived from two words which sum up the idea perfectly - "contemporary" and "tempus", which is the Latin word for its majesty, Time itself.We create aesthetically-designed timepieces in a contemporary manner, drawing inspiration from the works of the most prominent modern craftsmen of our time.We find the idea of combining various wristwatch designs with some details which define popular design styles and features to be more interesting.Summing it up, we decided to create a watch series inspired by famous cultural architecture and design phenomena, icons, and standards, so here's our first try. Hope you'll like it!  Du Stalo is a special limited edition of our main series. Here are some of its features:
Stylish monochrome coloration with an ashen leather strap 
Shiny new dial made of brushed stainless steel 
Special edition for KS backers with a serial number on each piece
100 pcs. only available
Please note that Super Early Bird offers don't include this watch, it's available only in DU STALO REWARD, but it can be included in packages with 2, 3, 4 or more watches.The main concept of our design is a neat, contemporary outlook stripped of unnecessary visual garbage. story:
I am an ex US Army Military Policeman, and Paratrooper.  Born in Syracuse, NY.  I currently live in Weeki Wachee, FL with my wife Robyn, my dog Gizmo, and our future twins (they deliver in September).

 

Jeffrey ’69 is a clothing company that makes One-of-a-Kind designer shirts, made up of 10 different pieces of 100% imported cotton. In designing the shirts I wanted to ensure that no two shirts are exactly alike.

Owning a One-of-a-Kind shirt by Jeffrey ’69 is not a decision, it’s a destiny.

A man’s dress shirt is made of ten different parts. Our 100% cotton shirt is going to have a different design on each part of the shirt.  No two shirts have the same design pattern. It will allow you to own a shirt that no one else in the world owns.

 

The reason why we are trying to get pledges is so that our company can launch NATIONWIDE.  Right now I have sold almost 100 shirt in 7 weeks, by word of mouth.  I want to be able to advertise in larger markets and need the capitol to do so.

 

Check out our gallery to see pictures of our company.

 

Also check our Shark Tank application video out at:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jGbHXiN_Okg

story:
MOST UNDERWEAR IS BORING | UNCOMFORTABLE | POORLY-MADE

NOT OURS.

 

***

THE PROBLEM

Mens' underwear has long been a product that simply "does the bare minimum". Men have grown to accept that poorly-made, boring, uncomfortable undies are the norm. 

I'm Asher, I live in London. But this story starts way down in the southern hemisphere, in my home country, Aotearoa New Zealand. I was back Downunder for a month in 2016, and the underwear I'd packed were starting to look like they needed replacing. And when a man admits they need replacing, you know the situation is quite dire.

I headed out shopping, and I was not impressed with what I found. Thick chunky stitching (chafe!), middle seams that ride up, fabrics that irritate and patterns so dull they looked like they'd been designed by Eeyore using Microsoft Word.

This wasn't a new problem, but I'd finally had enough. I just knew I could create something better. So I did just that.

I'm not a fashion designer, I'm not a quick-talking serial entrepreneur. I'm just a guy who was sick and tired of chafe, of sweaty cotton, of underwear that climbed up my backside. I was sick of paying for a product that I knew was rubbish. I was a guy with nothing to lose. 

 

***

AS A GIFT

During the last eighteen months, I've had so many people ask me when they'll be able to buy a pair as a gift, for the man in their life. It seems our Significant Others care more about the state of our underwear than we do! Hardly surprising.

Recognising that Christmas is just around the corner, every pair of Deadly Yarns sold in this campaign will come with a gift certificate for you to print and put in a card. We expect to ship the finished product in March 2018.

***

OUR FABRIC

Our fabric is called Modal. Its the high-tech, low-impact alternative to cotton. Its fantastically soft, it breaths beautifully, it wicks away sweat to keep you dry and... it doesn't smell!

Modal is made in Austria by a company called Lenzing. They use sustainably-sourced beech timber to produce cellulose, which is then processed into fibres, and spun into thread. The result is a carbon-neutral, biodegradable wonder-cloth.

The best part is that the production of modal uses about half the amount of water that cotton does. And with clean water fast becoming the most valuable and scarce resource on our plant, that's got to be a good thing.

***

OUR FIT

I knew that finding the perfect fabric was only half the battle. The product needed to be designed with clever seam placement and a great fit. 

We went through many, many prototypes before we got it right. 

But once we settled on our full-panel bum design with triple-needle flat-lock seams, I knew we'd found the winning combination. Finally, underwear that was really, truly, comfortable. No matter how long you sat down for, or how far you ran.

***

OUR DESIGNS

Taking their cues from the natural world, our unique designs are punchy and vibrant. These are not the Eeyore-designed yawn-fests of yesteryear. 

I've always been interested in conservation and the natural world. The story of the giant iridescent blue butterfly making a comeback to rural south England really struck a chord with me. The Adonis Blue only feeds on one type of plant, called the Horseshoe Vetch. The small shrub thrives where sheep are grazed, but cattle wipe it out. By understanding this delicate relationship, and through clever grazing programs, these spectacular butterflies are coming back in force. 

Our other launch print features the bright autumn leaves of the beech tree, the raw material for our fantastic fabric. This tree flourishes across central Europe, covering vast wilderness areas, soaking up carbon dioxide and generally being excellent. Rest assured the beech in our underwear is collected in sustainable manner, in accordance with the EU's strict forestry regulations.

 

***

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

This is an all-or-nothing campaign. I don't hit my target (£7,500), nobody gets charged a cent. And if I do hit the target, I'll have the funds to place the necessary orders. 

I expect to start shipping in March 2018. There is a risk of delay caused by problems in the supply chain, the shipping process, or with tax and customs requirements at the EU border. 

If any unexpected problems rear up, you'll be the first to know.

story:
This magazine was born from a dream of RebeccaMarie’s motivation to produce a beautiful high-end bridal magazine. Together with her team of editors, writers and a many amazing designers and wedding industry people, the first online issue was published on July 24. To our surprise, the magazine had 9,000 readers within 24 hours and by July 26, we had 22,000 readers. All of the NB staff were blown away at the response. We are currently at over 24,000 readers and that keeps rising!

Daalarna Pearl Collection


What We Need & What You Get

We have a few goals we would like to see reached through printing the magazine. 

  • One part of our goal is to continue this magazine trend and offer just as great of quality and better as we publish each new bi-annual issue and hopefully move to a monthly magazine in the future.
  • The other part of our goal is why we’re on Indiegogo. We want to get the magazine in print so brides can enjoy and be inspired by the magazine at home, in the salon or in boutiques.
  • We also want to use the printing to give us momentum to gain shelf space in a brick and mortar U.S. bookstore. Our sales and statistics with readers, this campaign and the response on social media will help us get there. 

Printing is the most expensive step in our process so far. We have multiple quotes from many printers throughout the U.S. and the one quote we’ve settled on is the cheapest so far for the best quality. None of the staff has taken a salary. We’ve started this as a labor of love. We are passionate about putting out a stunning magazine each and every issue and getting it into more people's hands so they can enjoy it.

Novelty Bride's first issue is currently available for presale on the website, NoveltyBride.com. We also have perks for donors that include receiving a copy of the magazine at certain levels of donation. We are working to keep our budget low, so many of the perks include getting shout outs on social media, on location at photo shoots for the next magazine, or receiving thoughtful thank you's directly from RebeccaMarie. (Check out our perks!)

The Impact

So far, we have partnered with big name designers, stylists and photographers from around the world, including:

  • David Tutera, designer/host of My Fair Wedding/wedding planner.
  • Australian photographer to the Hollywood stars and U.S. Nikon ambassador, Jerry Ghionis was in the first issue and will be featured on the cover for the second issue. 
  • Berta was featured in the first magazine and we look forward to continuing to work with the amazing designer again.
  • Dress designer Liz Martinez,
  • Dress designer YolanCris,
  • Shoe designer Bella Belle,
  • Photographer Lindsay Adler,
  • Many more wonderful people from Colorado, the U.S. and around the world.
Novelty Bride isn't a magazine for Colorado brides because it's started in Colorado. It's a magazine for brides around the world.

Photo credit Carmen & Ingo Photography


Risks & Challenges

Risks and challenges are always present when starting a new project and businesses, like this. Our goal is to get magazine shelf space in a major retailer, so getting exposure and sales is key. We realize this is a big goal to reach, but we're willing to do the hard work to get there.

  • We currently are not funded through advertising, but we are seeking advertisers for our Winter 2016 issue. (See the submissions tab at NoveltyBride.com for details.) Many advertisers won't pay for advertising space until it's proven to be seen.
  • The connections RebeccaMarie has made and is continuing to make are worldwide. We want to keep the magazine going by offering those contributing with copies of the magazine for their personal portfolios. Printing is one of the ways we can do that. Should this campaign not get fully funded, we will have to seek out more expensive means for getting the magazine printed. What this means for any business is that the growth will slow. We would like to keep the momentum going and you can help by donating.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are plenty of ways you can help Novelty Bride reach our goals, both with the fundraising for this campaign and in the goal of getting the magazine into the mainstream. Whether you can give or not, please share the word.

  • Share the link for the campaign via email or your social media sites of choice.
  • Indiegogo has plenty of ways for you to share the magazine, our website and our community through the share tools!

(Check out our perks!)  The Impact So far, we have partnered with big name designers, stylists and photographers from around the world, including:  David Tutera, designer/host of My Fair Wedding/wedding planner. Australian photographer to the Hollywood stars and U.S. Nikon ambassador, Jerry Ghionis was in the first issue and will be featured on the cover for the second issue.  Berta was featured in the first magazine and we look forward to continuing to work with the amazing designer again.
Dress designer Liz Martinez,
Dress designer YolanCris,
Shoe designer Bella Belle,
Photographer Lindsay Adler,
Many more wonderful people from Colorado, the U.S. and around the world. 
Novelty Bride isn't a magazine for Colorado brides because it's started in Colorado. It's a magazine for brides around the world.

Photo credit Carmen & Ingo Photography

   Risks & Challenges Risks and challenges are always present when starting a new project and businesses, like this. Our goal is to get magazine shelf space in a major retailer, so getting exposure and sales is key. We realize this is a big goal to reach, but we're willing to do the hard work to get there.  We currently are not funded through advertising, but we are seeking advertisers for our Winter 2016 issue. (See the submissions tab at NoveltyBride.com for details.) Many advertisers won't pay for advertising space until it's proven to be seen. The connections RebeccaMarie has made and is continuing to make are worldwide. We want to keep the magazine going by offering those contributing with copies of the magazine for their personal portfolios. Printing is one of the ways we can do that. Should this campaign not get fully funded, we will have to seek out more expensive means for getting the magazine printed. What this means for any business is that the growth will slow. We would like to keep the momentum going and you can help by donating.    Other Ways You Can Help There are plenty of ways you can help Novelty Bride reach our goals, both with the fundraising for this campaign and in the goal of getting the magazine into the mainstream. Whether you can give or not, please share the word.  Share the link for the campaign via email or your social media sites of choice. Indiegogo has plenty of ways for you to share the magazine, our website and our community through the share tools!

story:
Hi There!

My name is Henry Weisel. I'm a 20 year old college Junior currently studying Theater at Columbia College Chicago. I'm from a small town in southern Vermont, so the past three years of living in a new area (nonetheless a major city) has triggered a huge wave of inspiration. One of the strongest inspirations I've had is to start a clothing line. I have no background in fashion. I have no idea what to expect.

Perfect!

My interest started in Freshman year, playing around on Photoshop and creating basic designs. These designs were simple photo edits, and on an impulse, I ordered a t-shirt with one of my images across the chest. To this day, that shirt is my favorite piece of clothing I own. I decided to do this on a whim, and ever since, there's been a huge urge to take it further. Now, I finally have the resources and courage to pursue it.

But I need your help! In order to hit the ground running, I need to raise $500. And to this starving art student, that's a lot.  

Creator Clothing (クリエイター) will start as a t-shirt line, based from my apartment. Using online t-shirt printing, I will be creating custom made shirts right from my home. Through website and social media, I will be constantly putting my work into the open and gaining exposure from there. This is the initial plan in its simplest form. Depending on the success, I will plan to start working with sweatshirts, hats, and socks. 


The Grocery List

Here's a summary of what I need and for what:

  1. 20 T-Shirts - $350 This is the heart and soul of the fundraising. Some shirts will be used for photos and advertising purposes. The remaining shirts will serve as the initial stock of Creator Clothing.
  2. Photo Shoot/Catalogue - $100 In order for advertising and exposure to be strong, there needs to be strong pictures. With this money, there will not only be photographs available for digital use, but a physical catalogue showcasing Creator Clothing - like a Zine, but for t-shirts.
  3. Website Fees - $25 Domain name and design help.
  4. Additional Fees - $25 Indiegogo's cut and funds for other networking tools, like business cards.

These items are integral for starting. Without shirts, there are no photos. Without photos, there is no site. Without a site, there is no exposure. While this list may seem needless, it is important to note that I am starting with nothing but an idea. It is only through funding that I can actualize this dream and begin something that is extremely fun and means a lot to me. 


Perks

There are a variety of perks available when you donate! What, you think I'm just going to beg you for money and leave you out to dry? Never! You scratch my back, I scratch yours. Here are some examples of doodles and shirts you could get (more information on the side of this page):


That's About It!

No, I'm not raising money for a new invention that can cure blindness through special contacts. Nor am I raising funds for a special type of cream you can rub into your skin to cure hangovers. I'm asking you to help me start pursue a passion of mine. I'm asking you to give me a small push so I can get started. If you want to donate $1, thats amazing! If you want to share this link, you're incredible! I never knew the value of these words until I started this campagin, but truly: every bit counts. Are these t-shirts going to cause social reform? Probably not. But they are going to make me, and I imagine a bunch of other weirdos out there, feel unique, proud, and unabashedly happy. 


Thank you so much for your time and generosity, 

Henry

story:
It's time to GiVE more:

We built this brand on the principle that quality does not have to be expensive. That passion to make a better product is more important than costly marketing and inflated popular name brands. We wanted to make a luxury watch but without the middleman, fancy branding, and costly marketing schemes. After hundreds of hours researching which features you want in a watch, what design was going to be the most meaningful, and more efficient manufacturing techniques; the GiVE watch was born. What resulted was a simple, elegant watch that replaces the ludicrously expensive name brand watches in both quality and price. 

Buying from GiVE vs. Others:


Why Watches?

Sometimes something is more than it appears. This watch, for example, is more than just a watch. It is the means to a much larger end. It isn’t just something you wear, but a goal to improve the lives of all those with whom you come in contact. It is meant to be a reminder, a symbol of the power of charitable thought. Building a watch was an intentional choice because it is so visible. Other people will admire your watch and ask you about it, and we hope that each time you will look down and remember that you helped someone. If you are running late, going to a meeting, or rushing to get to a movie on time you will check your watch, and each time you see your GiVE watch we hope you will in turn remember to think how you can "GiVE your time" to the people around you despite your busy schedule.


Not just a pretty face: 

Wherever life takes you, whether it is a fancy dinner or backpacking in the mountains, you can be confident your GiVE watch won’t let you down. GiVE watches are a perfect blend of elegance and durability .



See the bottom of the page for more detailed specs.



Our "AHA" moment:

The innovative idea behind our GiVING back program is unique. It's different than how most companies give back. You've heard of the phrase, "Buy one of our shoes, and we'll give one of our shoes." Or, "Buy a pair glasses, and we'll give someone in need a pair of glasses." But what if you're not particularly passionate about giving glasses to someone? What if you had a family member that had cancer?

So instead of making the decision for you, we want to empower you to determine which charity you want to support with your purchase. We have teamed up with some of the most well known charities throughout the world to ensure our profits reach the most amount of people. When you have picked which watch design you love the most, you select which of the 5 movements you would like to give back to. We then donate proceeds from your watch purchase the movement of your choice.


So tell me, how do the charities work?  

So instead of making the decision for you, we are asking you to make the decision and designate which charity receives the donation from your purchase. 

Water: When you buy a GiVE watch and choose Water, your purchase will GiVE twelve people clean water through charitywater.org. One watch can help 12 people!


Hunger: If you choose Hunger at checkout your purchase will GiVE to Actionagainsthunger.org to provide five people with a warm meal.


Cancer: We have teamed up with Livestrong to provide support for cancer patients, survivors, and families. This will help their members receive financial support in providing cheaper screenings, treatment, and relief.


Education: When you choose education at checkout you will GiVE five children new study materials, technology, or improved classroom environment.


Animals: Each time you select Animals at checkout it will GiVE two abused or neglected animals a second chance. Animals are just as deserving of our attention as people and working with American Humane will make sure we help as many animals as possible. 


The Perks



After the first 200 watches are sold the discount will move to 15% off.

Stretch goal definition: A stretch goal is an additional goal set for our campaign when we exceed our initial funding goal. As we reach these stretch goals we will release the following products for our current backers, or new customers to buy. 

Team

We are a collection of like minded people. We are creative both in our pursuits of affordable fashion as well as our approaches to raise awareness of those in need. Our desire to help those in need comes from direct experience in 3rd world countries. We have witnessed firsthand not only the suffering that comes from immense poverty, but also the huge difference that even a small amount of resources can make. We realize how fortunate we are to live where we do and have what we have, but also how much work there is to do. Rather than dwell on the negative, we are hopeful and excited at the prospect of making a difference wherever we can. 


Our team has our manufacturers ready to create as many watches as are purchased. We have high hopes for this campaign. We want to make a difference in the lives of as many people as humanly possible, but we cannot do it alone. It is only through your support that we can make GiVE become a reality. 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Like our campaign? GiVE your friends a heads up by sharing this with them by clicking one of the social media buttons up top.

As a way to GiVE back to our awesome supporters, we created a referral program! For every 3 people you refer that contribute to our campaign, we'll GiVE you a watch of your choice on for free on us! We will reach out to you once you've hit 3 referrals.

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account (required for tracking referrals)
  2. On the left side of the screen, go to the Indiegogo share tools
  3. Click the "Link" Icon to get your personalized URL
  4. Copy the URL and send it to 3 people you have in mind
*For best results, personal mediums like email & text are most effective.


Styled Simplicity:


Design is in the details:



Timeline:




FAQ

Q: Where do I select which Charity Movement I want to support at checkout?
A: At the time of purchase please use the notes section to specify which Charity Movement you would like to support. If no Charity Movement is listed, we will reach out to you at the end of our campaign to get which Charity you'd like to GiVE Back to.

Q: How did you decide which charities?

A: We conducted a Facebook poll to 3,000 people and found the 5 most common charities movements people wanted to support were - water, hunger, cancer, education, and animal relief.

Q: Will you be supporting more charities in the future?

A: Absolutely. After we are funded we will ask our backers for suggested Charities and look into where our profits can help the most amount of people.

Q: How long after it funds should it take to get my watch 

A: Our team is ready to create as many watches as possible. Our manufacturers are set, and we are excited to make an impact in the world. After we are funded by the end of May, we will be busy producing your watches and you should receive them in August.

story:
Enough of functional, but plain backpacks. From now on, there is no need to choose between having a stylish bag and a practical backpack because you can have it both at the same time. While having one Indigo Design backpack, you have six different bags. One moment, single pull on the straps and you can easily convert your bag into a different backpack and vice versa. Extend it and carry your laptop to work, groceries home or make it compact and head to a fancy dinner party having all essentials at hand. Easy as that! Plus, you will get a brand new pochette as a GIFT! Special for Indiegogo!

 

 

3 TEXTURES + 10 COLORS

Choose the texture + color you love and enjoy this stunning accessory in your daily life!

 

 

The backpacks are made from highest level faux leather (vinyl). The lining is made from cotton. Inside you’ll also find 2 pockets. One of them is a zipped one. The bottom of a backpack is enhanced so you could carry even heavy stuff with you.

Backpack measurements: height 42 cm / length 40 cm / width 8 cm

Indigo Design is formed by two Lithuanian designers - Elze Sakalinskaite and Milita Balcaityte - and offers contemporary, sophisticated and bold accessories, design objects and custom-made textile designs. 

Founded in 2014, the company has expanded the scope of products with multiple design collections and broadened clientèle which now includes private, business and public sector customers. After winning multiple awards for the collections, Indigo continues creating innovative, multifunctional and exciting designs of the highest quality, like this one!  

 

 

Risks and challenges

We’ve started to produce our transforming bags more than 2 years ago. During that time we fixed all the possible issues that might occur. Now we are more than confident there won’t be anything standing between you and your amazing functional bag.

We calculated all creation and delivery time estimates as realistic as possible. 

If you will have any concerns or problem with the bag feel free to contact us anytime: indigotextile@yahoo.com and we will do our best to help you. We will replace any part that arrived damaged for free. We offer a full refund if you decide to cancel your order before it has been made and shipped to you.
