If you know how to install solar energy, help with that. Whatever your forte is, feel free to jump on board the build team! The easiest way, is to financially contribute and spread the word using the share tools on the indie-go-go page! Thank you for taking time to check out this project! I am very excited to show you the process and final product!

story:
1. When will I receive my GLITZCÛBE™?
    Glitzcube will shipped to all backers by March 2018.
     
  2. What is my Glitzcube made of?
    An aluminium body with rust-resistant stainless steel bearing, all non-toxic, non-hazardous.  
     
  3. I am a wholesaler or public icon, who should I speak to if we want to distribute the Glitzcube?
    Send us an email on glitzcube@gmail.com. We look forward to teaming up!
     
  4. Is it safe for children?
    Yes, though we’d recommend letting children older than five play with it. GLITZCÛBE™  is CE certified and all safety tests have been passed.
     
  5. How much is shipping?
    $9 Worldwide shipping per item. But the more you order, the cheaper your shipping will be.

 

The Story behind

Ten months ago, fidget spinners were everywhere. It seemed like everybody had one. I played around with a few myself, but I was always put-off by how plain they were. No design was truly original, no spinner had aesthetic appeal.

Then, I learned about the cubic spinner. I was in awe – you don’t really imagine a cube spinning, do you? – and thought there had to be a way to make its design more beautiful. I wanted something I could carry to the office, in the plane, on the tube without feeling ashamed. 

After hours and hours of obsessive research, of testing materials and traveling the world, My team came up with something stunning. An elegant device, gorgeous and hypnotic. A piece of jewelry that you can spin anytime, anywhere. Something that looks good on your desk, something that feels good in your pocket, like a lucky charm.

 

Here at GLITZCÛBE LTD Mauritius, we are very proud to introduce the World's most stunning spinner cube. The development of this project has been incredible, a very fruitful collaboration with a group of talented friends and different collaborators from around the world. And above all, the satisfaction of transforming an idea into a unique creation. 

I believe we’ve produced the world’s most beautiful cubic spinner, and we can’t wait for you to have one in your hands.

From Philips Wei - Founder GLITZCÛBE™

Special Thanks to: 

iLuvTrading (USA Review) 

 

UNCUT Reviews (German Review)

 

Fulfillment

Once the campaign ends, SWAROVSKI® Crystals from Austria will be delivered to our workshops. Production begins! You'll be contacted for shipping information and confirmation of your order. Your GLITZCÛBE™  will arrive at your door in March 2018.

From the bottom of our hearts, thank you again for your support. 

For exciting news & updates

&

story:
Hello,

My name is Misha Sylver, and I am a graduate student in Arts Administration at the Savannah College of Arts and Design. As part of my final project objective, I chose to combine my interests in fashion and art to organize and execute a fashion exhibition titled, B4 The Runway. 

The "B4 The Runway" fashion exhibition is a two - day event held on February 25 & 26 in New York City. The exhibition will have the opportunity to display the fashion designs of  students and emerging designers.  The purpose of the fashion exhibition is an event hosted and created by students and emerging designers trying to further their experience in their future careers and gain recognition for their craft. 

With the donors help, the success of the exhibition could lead to a thriving and inspiring career for the young participating designers. While providing them, a path as the fashion world's next big designer.

Funding Details

  • Funding Goal - $600
  • All donation proceeds will go towards exhibition expenses such as; marketing efforts, exhibition decor, supplies, and refreshments.

As the organizer of the event, I have evaluated the potentials challenges towards hosting the show successfully. However, as an art administration graduate student, I have developed skills in project management and planned accordingly with a marketing and fundraising plan to overcome future obstacles.

All amounts of donations are welcome and appreciated. Other ways everyone can help in reaching the B4 The Runway's funding goal is through spreading the word about the exhibition and campaign.

With your great help, this will be an exhibition to remember.

Sincerely,

Misha Sylver

Event Details

Title - B4 The Runway 

Location - Mount Sinai St. Luke's Hospital - 1111 W 113 St. New York, NY 10025

Date - February 25 & 26

Times - 3 - 7:30pm

Tickets - Free (RSVP @ Eventbrite.com)

story:
Welcome to The Innovation of The Future!

Plastic is one of the most common man-made substances on Earth. We use it for everything and when it's not useful anymore what do we do? We throw it away to be put into landfill, this is a bad idea. With your help I want to change the way we use plastic the second time around. 


What I need

I need your help to get a step in the right direction with my career. The funding I receive from you goes towards these items:

  • cintiq 27QHD by Wacom ($3699)
  • Apple 27" iMac with 5k Retina Display ($3199)
  • Apple 12" Macbook ($2199)


 Why The Expensive Gear?

I need this specific gear to harness the full potential of my designing and creativity. With a 5k retina iMac with 27 inch screen I will be able to see the slightest of imperfections in my designs. A Cintiq 27QHD bridges the gap between paper and computer, combining the two and making designing the next garment or accessory easier. The macbook will give me access to my designs whenever, wherever and most importantly, on the go, making it impossible to loose any ideas.


What happens if I don't get fully funded?

I'll be sad of course, but depending on how far I fall short of my goal, I will prioritise my needs in this order,
1. iMac
2. Macbook
3. Cintiq 27QHD
I'm putting it in this order because I need an iMac to create my designs, that is my highest priority. Without that I cannot create correctly and I will have many many problems leading to the eventual finishing of what could have been a great success.


What Happens If Funds Go Beyond What I need?

Well, If you and your friends fund my campaign past my goal, I will start adding things to the perks you have already purchased, the more you fund me, the better the perks get, this doesn't mean that just the highest perks get bonuses, no, that would be unfair. Instead, the more you fund, the more I give. 
Also, as an added bonus. The highest paying contributor will receive a once in a life time gift pack. ON TOP of the perk they purchase (We are basically saying we will shower you in gifts because you are so incredibly awesome)
This gift could be any of the following:
A personalised plastic suit fitted to your measurements.
A chance to meet me, all expenses paid where ever you are, so I can personally thank you for your contribution with more gifts.
Or maybe something else...


Feeling Sketchy or Unsure?

If you are feeling sketchy about funding us that is totally ok, anyone can feel free to email me and we will get back to you ASAP to answer any questions or enquiries that you have. Please don't hesitate to ask, we promise we don't bite... much :P



Risks & Challenges

Everything you do in life consists of a certain amount of risk and making plastic products is no exception to that. The following is the highest risks of our process.

There could be a fire: lets face it, ok so its not a high, high risk but the risk is still there and it could be fatal.

The sewing machine could break: Things happen and things break, if this happens it will set us back a few weeks but it will not stop us from reaching our goal.

Are you getting the idea? It is unlikely for something to go terribly wrong and the chances of something bad happening are very low .

We promise to keep all our contributors up to date with all of our highs and lows during our process. 



Other Ways You Can Help

If for any reason you aren't able to contribute to my campaign that is ok, I won't hate you, there are still lots of other ways for you to contribute and help us reach our goal.

You can:

Get the Word Out: Tell your mum, tell your brothers, sisters, dad, uncles, aunts, grandmas and granddads, Tell your pet!, Share on Facebook, twitter, instagram, pinterest. Tell your friends so they can tell their friends. Tell your boss or your work colleagues. scream it at the top of your lungs from the top of a building. Everything helps us reach our goal. When you do tell the world, send us an email, we love hearing from all our contributors to know what they think.

Donate Plastic Bags: This might seem odd but I need the bags to complete the perks, Although I have thousands, the more bags I have, the more perks (and bonus perks) I can make. Email us for more details on what kind of bags and where to send them.

Thank you for taking the time to read my campaign.


 My Awesome Contributors

1. o.cahill1
2. Anonymous Donation

The macbook will give me access to my designs whenever, wherever and most importantly, on the go, making it impossible to loose any ideas.

I'll be sad of course, but depending on how far I fall short of my goal, I will prioritise my needs in this order,
1. iMac
2. Macbook
3. Cintiq 27QHD
I'm putting it in this order because I need an iMac to create my designs, that is my highest priority. Without that I cannot create correctly and I will have many many problems leading to the eventual finishing of what could have been a great success.


What Happens If Funds Go Beyond What I need?
Well, If you and your friends fund my campaign past my goal, I will start adding things to the perks you have already purchased, the more you fund me, the better the perks get, this doesn't mean that just the highest perks get bonuses, no, that would be unfair. Instead, the more you fund, the more I give. 
Also, as an added bonus. The highest paying contributor will receive a once in a life time gift pack. ON TOP of the perk they purchase (We are basically saying we will shower you in gifts because you are so incredibly awesome)
This gift could be any of the following:
A personalised plastic suit fitted to your measurements.
A chance to meet me, all expenses paid where ever you are, so I can personally thank you for your contribution with more gifts.
Or maybe something else...



    Feeling Sketchy or Unsure? If you are feeling sketchy about funding us that is totally ok, anyone can feel free to email me and we will get back to you ASAP to answer any questions or enquiries that you have. Please don't hesitate to ask, we promise we don't bite... much :P


    Risks & Challenges Everything you do in life consists of a certain amount of risk and making plastic products is no exception to that. The following is the highest risks of our process.
There could be a fire: lets face it, ok so its not a high, high risk but the risk is still there and it could be fatal.
The sewing machine could break: Things happen and things break, if this happens it will set us back a few weeks but it will not stop us from reaching our goal.
Are you getting the idea? It is unlikely for something to go terribly wrong and the chances of something bad happening are very low .
We promise to keep all our contributors up to date with all of our highs and lows during our process. 


    Other Ways You Can Help If for any reason you aren't able to contribute to my campaign that is ok, I won't hate you, there are still lots of other ways for you to contribute and help us reach our goal.
You can:
Get the Word Out: Tell your mum, tell your brothers, sisters, dad, uncles, aunts, grandmas and granddads, Tell your pet!, Share on Facebook, twitter, instagram, pinterest. Tell your friends so they can tell their friends. Tell your boss or your work colleagues. scream it at the top of your lungs from the top of a building. Everything helps us reach our goal. When you do tell the world, send us an email, we love hearing from all our contributors to know what they think.
Donate Plastic Bags: This might seem odd but I need the bags to complete the perks, Although I have thousands, the more bags I have, the more perks (and bonus perks) I can make. Email us for more details on what kind of bags and where to send them.
Thank you for taking the time to read my campaign.


 My Awesome Contributors
1. o.cahill1
2. Anonymous Donation

story:
Our mission is to prove that there is a smarter and more sustainable way to consume goods. We want to show that we can create objects with innovative design and very high quality, while still limiting our environmental impact as much as possible. And give people the opportunity to make a difference. 

 

We see our customers as ambassadors for change, who reject disposable products and planned obsolescence, and who are eager to preserve the planet for future generations. Our watch will acccompany them everywhere, and will testify to these shared values.

 

Sustainability is at the core of everything we do. From initial design to production, every decision we made was driven by the desire to minimize the environmental impact, by reusing existing materials and using the cleanest technologies, while limiting transport to the maximum.   

We've created an all new process. The fabric we use for the strap is made from plastic waste, which has been collected from South East Asian seas and Japan. We turn the plastic into pellets, and then into nylon yarn. We create our straps directly from rolls of this material, which is made using no chemical dyes, and is certified by the Global Recycled Standard label. This strap has a story to tell, and that is why we called it "Phoenix".  

 

Vegetable tanned leather strap  

Because we wanted to avoid chemicals, we opted for a vegetable tanning process. This means the leather looks more natural, and has no (useless) chemical protection, but rather guarantees the development of a nice and unique patina, over time. Our leather straps are made by a French company with the finest Italian leather.

 

Natural rubber strap  

Made from 100% natural rubber, it is strong, flexible and completely waterproof. Natural rubber can have a "rubbery" smell, so we mix a light vanilla scent into the rubber mixture to keep it smelling good. Made to withstand the elements, natural rubbers offer unmatched durability and comfort for the active wearer and is perfect for any adventure.

 

316L recycled stainless steel Mesh strap  

A metal bracelet for a watch is a must, we have worked with our partners to come up with a fantastic bracelet for these watches. It is made of 316L stainless steel. It has pins all the way to make it super flexible and highly adjustable. The clasp locking mechanisms is a double button system with pin adjustment, for a greater range of sizes. This strap is very resistant, comfortable, and gives the watch an awesome vintage look.

 

Quick release system  

All our straps have a quick release system to allow you to change the strap in less than 10 seconds. Smart and easy.

 

Our goal to create the most sustainable watch ever doesn’t mean we had to fall into the caricature. Our inspiration comes from natural forms, shapes and textures, and the sustainability is reflected through our industrial processes.  

 

The hardest part has been the dial, as we wanted it to be pure, but not boring. Designed with a 3D shape inspired by ocean seabed and mountain terrain, its texture is a reminder of the organic side of our design. We made a large number of tests to get the final colors : navy blue (limited edition), electric blue, khaki green, sequoia brown and grey-to-black. Their reflections are just beautiful, going from something very discrete to something much more vivid, depending on the light and the angle.  

 

Adapted to watches, solar technology provides unbeatable performances on many aspects.   

It’s powered by nature. Light is a free, natural and unlimited energy. Our movement absorbs this energy from everywhere, outside or inside, and brings life to our watches, just as the sun does for humans. 

It’s easy going. Three hours wear on your wrist will provide up to six months of power reserve, without any light. In simple words: it’s perpetual energy on your wrist.

It’s sustainable. No disposable battery, so minimal impact. 

It’s service-free, which means no extra cost.

Our solar movement is made in Japan by company owned by Seiko. Which means a perfect accuracy, and à 99,5% reliability rate. 

What else could we expect?

 

Our watch definitely focuses on accentuating emotional expression and natural impression. In the end, we’ve made a watch that highlights the successful combination of design and sustainability. And above all, made to last.  

 

Water Resistance to 100M  

This means you can live with your watch on. You’ll never have to ask yourself if you should take it off not. Totally life-proof.

 

K1 Dome glass  

The K1 is a premium material which offers increased durability and scratch resistance compared to standard mineral or plastic glass. It is also easier to recycle than saphir crystal. We applied an anti-reflective coating to the inner side of the crystal to minimize glare.

 

SuperLuminova ®  

Hands and hour markers has been coated withC1 SuperLuminova ®, a luminescent paint which increases the visibility when the light comes down while giving a beautiful look in the dark.

 

For us, just as for most people, the experience of a product starts with the box: we wanted it to transmit our values at first glance. 100% recycled and recyclable FSC paper, even though you won't want to throw it away. It's 15% lighter than a standard box, with the same volume, and this allows us to optimize our carbon impact.

 

We like people who are deeply involved in making our planet a cleaner world. This is how we met the Trash Hero guys, who are doing a fantastic job across the world to create sustainable, community-based projects that remove existing waste, and reduce future waste by inspiring long-term behavior change. Their action is just amazing, as they’ve already removed 408 tons of trash with the help of 63 000 volunteers.   

As we share the same values, we wanted to give them our support to develop their organization and increase their impact. It will result 160 beach clean-up that will allow to remove more than 17 tons of trash from oceans.

Trash heroes from Trash Hero

Hi Guys, this is Lilian and Fred, Awake founders. We started this journey 2 years ago after we met while we were travelling in Asia. From this encounter was born a strong friendship. Among other common interests, sustainability was something that brought us to more serious conversations. "Why is there so much pollution everywhere, threatening the places we love? Can we do something about it ?"  

Low quality goods and planned obsolescence have created more products than we ever needed. Over the past ten years, we've produced more plastic than during all of the last century. With more than 22 000 tons of plastic waste entering our oceans every day, this issue isn't going away any time soon. There must be a better way to produce and consume goods! We decided to take a stance at it and tackle the problem. This is why we put sustainability and ethics at the core of everything we do. Being both watch enthusiasts was the opportunity to start with a product we love, but also an object that could become a sign of recognition for a community of people sharing the same sustainable values.

story:
HELLO

First of all we would like to thank you for taking the time to read our page, we are proud to finally announce that this campaign has officially been launched! We're always open to feedback and suggestions, so don't hesitate to ask away in the comments section!

THE IDEA

We wanted to create a card wallet truly inspired by Simplicity x Carbon fiber - so we have spent the last 3 months designing a unique card wallet that is:

  • Simple & Versatile
  • Minimalist inspired
  • RFID Secured
  • High Quality
  • Sleek & Stylish


Introducing Zero. - With Carbon Fiber and Simplicity at the top of our mind, this card wallet had to offer both modern style and elegant sophistication wherever you are, wherever you go. Integrated with RFID shielding technology, we believe it's one of the most secure card wallets out there today (with your help of course!).

Originally we only had the Carbon Fiber finish in mind, but after some good feedback and positive reviews, everyone wanted to see them in classic leather too! So we now have 3 stylish options available to suit your everyday look, wherever you go!

THE DESIGN PROCESS

Building on the initial idea we got into the studio and started sketching concepts. Sketch #16 was the the chosen one - so it was from here that we knew we created something beautiful, the very first card wallet - Zero.

After receiving the samples - we've been using it daily, to test for defects and further improvements. All so that we can ensure that the finished product will be rigid enough to withstand your busy schedules.

ZERO FEATURES

A Picture is Worth a Thousand words.

What is RFID? Zero is RFID shielded.

Radio-frequency identification (RFID) is the wireless use of electromagnetic fields to transfer data, for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects. The tags contain electronically stored information commonly in transport cards, library cards and credit cards.

With security in mind - we also implemented the latest in RFID shielding technology to our card wallets. So anything and everything in the card wallet will be protected from scanners in all directions! But wait, we left a handy slot un-shielded for a TruTap experience to work with transport/bank cards on demand!

RFID Shielded Lining - 100% Secure for RFID enabled cards

Inverse Slot Orientation - For quicker reverse access to cards

finished product will be rigid enough to withstand your busy schedules.

ZERO FEATURESA Picture is Worth a Thousand words.




What is RFID? Zero is RFID shielded.

Radio-frequency 
identification (RFID) is the wireless use of electromagnetic fields to 
transfer data, for the purposes of automatically identifying and 
tracking tags attached to objects. The tags contain electronically 
stored information commonly in transport cards, library cards and credit
 cards.
With security in mind - we also implemented the latest in 
RFID shielding technology to our card wallets. So anything and 
everything in the card wallet will be protected from scanners in all 
directions! But wait, we left a handy slot un-shielded for a TruTap 
experience to work with transport/bank cards on demand!


RFID Shielded Lining - 100% Secure for RFID enabled cards



Inverse Slot Orientation - For quicker reverse access to cards


Quick Band Elastic - For Instant Access of cards/cash/receipts

TruTap RFID Enabled Slot - For easy use of transport/paywave cards*
 (Due to complexity of RFID signals/quality we cannot guarantee that all your cards will work in this slot!)
 100% Genuine Leather for all options (yup, including the Carbon Fiber!) Naturally molds durably to your everyday use!
















THE COLLECTION










PRODUCTION SCHEDULE
IN-STOCK AND READY TO SHIP!WHO ARE WE? WE ARE RIVAL COLLECTIVERIVAL is made up of three friends who loves the simplicity and 
sophistication of Carbon Fiber. We would love to bring out a line of 
sleek everyday lifestyle products that cannot be found anywhere else. 
Carbon Fiber inspires us and we've taken that inspiration and poured it 
into our upcoming projects! Keep a lookout!
RIVAL won't be possible without you. We need to fulfill a minimum 
order with our manufacturers and that's where you come in. In return for
 your support you will be one of the first in the world to own a RIVAL 
card wallet! 

You can also help others have the opportunity to become part of the 
RIVAL journey. Liking us on Facebook/Instagram or sending a few quick 
emails to friends and family telling them about RIVAL can go a long way 
towards making sure this project is a success!
WITH YOUR SUPPORT

Like our Facebook Page or Share it
Follow us on our Instagram Page
Sign up to our website newsletter - www.rival-collective.com 
Copyright © 2015. All rights reserved.
Credits to www.bensounds.com for the music
Contact us hello@rival-collective.com for media requests

Thank you so much for checking us out and for helping RIVAL come into the world!
*Due to the many variables to RFID technology, not all RFID cards are guaranteed to work in the TruTap slot. We did alot of testing, and it worked well enough for our bank cards and some transport cards. Please consider this before contributing.



Risks and challenges
Our main concern after the project is successfully funded will be 
making sure everyone gets their wallets on time. We will be doing all 
post-production in house and have all the help needed to get these 
wallets out. Even though we have everything planned and ready to go, 
there are still things that are out of our control. So if we do run into
 any hiccups, please be patient - we will endevour to make the 
production process as smooth as possible!
Customer service is very important to us and we want to keep everyone
 as happy as we can, from the time you pledge to the time you receive 
and your wallet and use it for years. We promise to respond to comments 
and concerns as quickly as possible.

story:
"I used to work in finance and had to wear slacks every single day, and I was always uncomfortable. But some of you guys, you're in tech, laying network cables or doing programming, and you work for a Fortune 500 or you're in banking so you have to stick to the dress code while your other coder friends are wearing shorts and sweatpants to work. I created these pants for you. Now you can wear pants that look just like dress slacks, but are as comfortable as sweatpants."

-- Cesario Tam, Founder

Read more:

  • Inc.: Hacks for the Entrepreneurially Minded
  • The Huffington Post: 10 Projects That Make 2017 Better Than 2016
  • BuzzFeed: All the Presidents' Pants
  • Forbes: 7 Ways To Generate PR For Your Crowdfunding Campaign
  • Entrepreneur: How to Include Politics in Your Marketing Without Turning Anyone Off

 

The Stealth Pant’s high-tech performance fabric is lightweight and smooth. These slacks will never leave you feeling weighed down or irritated by heavy, itchy fabrics. The secret is our special blend of nylon, rayon, and lycra, which is breathable and flexible, unlike stuffy and stiff wool or polyester. It also gives the Stealth Pant great moisture wicking capabilities. If you live in an area with hot and humid summers you won’t have to worry about your pants being damp all day, because they dry out in no time. 

Unlike the materials used to make most office slacks, the Stealth Pant’s machine washable fabric blend was chosen for easy, at-home care. No more expensive, time-consuming trips to the dry cleaners are necessary. If they get dirty, just throw them in the washing machine, dry them on a line or in a dryer, and they’re ready to be worn again.

Because of the Stealth Pant’s wrinkle resistant properties, you won’t have to worry about doing any ironing--your pants will be completely free of wrinkles after a wash and dry. Even if you stuff them into a gym bag, any wrinkles will fade after a few minutes of wear.

Yeah, us too. But you gotta look nice at the office, right? That's why we created the Stealth Pant, made from our own customized yoga pant material that will make you feel like you're wearing sweatpants, while looking as professional as the CEO. Trust us, no one will know how comfortable you are.

We got tired of things falling out of our pockets, so we designed the Stealth Pant with bigger ones. With extra deep pockets, you’ll never have to to worry about your wallet, keys, or phone falling out and getting lost.

Plus, we added a hidden inner pocket for your mobile phone that makes it super easy to access. It also prevents your phone from turning sideways in your pocket.

The Blackbird Stealth Pant was created to solve one simple problem: normal office slacks are really uncomfortable, but comfortable alternatives don’t fit the business style dress that many employers expect at the office. We’ve worked for the past year to design a pair of pants that has the best of both worlds: extreme comfort and classic style. The results are obvious, but only if you’re the one wearing them. To everyone else, you’re just wearing a pair of nice, normal slacks, but you’ll feel like you woke up in the morning and put on your favorite pair of sweatpants.

Material Used:

We use 63% Rayon, 33% Nylon, 4% Lycar and "0%" polyester. The result is an ultra comfortable fabric that feels soft and smooth. The composition of the fabric is identical to activewear (ie. yoga pants). But of course, Blackbird's Stealth Pant has the traditional straight leg cut so they do not look like not tights.

story:
A MESSAGE FROM AL MACINNES



WHAT WE NEED
AND WHAT YOU GET

We are a small and brand new company and  this campaign determines whether we can continue working on StiQit or not. We need at least $50,000 to pay for the cost of everything that's needed to produce StiQit. The donations you give us will be used to fund the molding, casting, production, packaging and shipping of the product. Every penny will be used to pay for making StiQit into a reality.

In return, you’ll be the first to receive StiQit as soon as it comes off the production line. With your generous help, we'll be able to make StiQit available very soon and allow everybody to enjoy their wine sulfite free.

The money raised from this campaign will be used for the following initiatives.


INTRODUCING
StiQit: LIVE SULFITE FREE

StiQit is an easy to use, 100% recyclable, single use device that allows you to remove all sulfites from any wine in just seconds without affecting taste, appearance or aroma.


StiQit IN THE NEWS


WHAT’S THE DEAL 
WITH SULFITES?

Sulfur dioxide (SO2), commonly know as Sulfites, is a chemical compound added to wine, to preserve it for shipment and to prolong the shelf life for retail. 

Sulfites do nothing to enhance the products taste or appearance, but is necessary in order for winemakers to ship and commercialize their products for consumers. Sulfites are added to prevent oxidation and keep the wine from going bad.

Seems ok right? Well, not exactly.

Sulfites are currently regarded as one of the top food allergens affecting the general population today.  

In 1986, after the identification of numerous sulfite related instances, the FDA prohibited the use of sulfites on fruits and vegetables intended to be served raw or presented as fresh. This sulfite regulation carried over to alcoholic beverages where the Tax and Trade Bureau (TTB) of the U.S. Department of Treasury, currently demands that the presence of sulfites in wine be declared in plain view on the product label. 

Sulfites are one of the only ingredients within alcoholic beverages that must be declared clearly on the label.

Why is that? As we all know, just because we are “allowed” to consume something doesn't mean that you should. For many people, consuming sulfites can cause serious issues.

Sulfite sensitivity affects millions of people today, many of whom are unaware of their own sensitivity to this preservative. Sulfite sensitivity reactions can vary from mild to life threatening in some cases.

Reactions can include some of the following:

  • Headaches
  • Blotchy skin, redness, rash or flushing of the face
  • Respiratory issues, stuffiness and nasal congestion
  • Upset stomach, diarrhea and vomiting
  • Drop in blood pressure and dizziness

If you have experienced any of these negative reactions during or after drinking wine, you may be one of the millions who suffer from sulfite sensitivity or allergy.


BUT I DON’T HAVE A
SULFITE SENSITIVITY, WHY SHOULD I CARE?

While you may not be sensitive to sulfites or experienced any of the symptoms of sulfite sensitivity, you are still consuming an added preservative each time you drink wine. As mentioned, preservatives are added to foods and beverages to fight against the growth of microorganisms that cause them to go bad, they do not carry any additional health or flavor benefits. 

The consumption of these added preservatives has always just been “part of the deal” when eating and drinking most packaged retail products but this is because you have never been able to remove these added preservatives prior to consumption…until now.  StiQit gives you freedom of choice.

You take care of yourself. You exercise. You maintain a healthy diet of natural and organic foods and avoid processed products. You read labels and are aware of what you are putting in your body. If this sounds like you then why would you just accept and consume added preservatives in your wine?  Especially when now, you don't have to.

We all have heard the health benefits of drinking wine, StiQit just makes it healthier. You gotta love that.


WE ARE HERE TO HELP YOU

Currently, the only way an individual can prevent a sulfite reaction from occurring is to avoid consuming items that contain sulfites, severely restricting the available choices of beverages that can be enjoyed.

For these sulfite sensitive individuals...this means no wine…ever!

In addition to those who are sensitive to sulfites, there is a growing population of individuals that choose to enjoy sulfite and preservative free lifestyles. If you don't have to consume preservatives with your beverages, why would you? 

Whether you choose to avoid sulfites in search of a healthier lifestyle, or you avoid sulfites to manage your sulfite sensitivity…millions are forced to pass on wine. 

Living without wine is not really living at all, so we created StiQit and restored the freedom of choice for all individuals to enjoy any wine they choose, sulfite free.


TESTIMONIAL



WATCH IT WORK

Do you need proof that StiQit actually works? Well, here you go. Ron Hiebsch, Senior Research Scientist and Laboratory Director, demonstrates just how easy it is to remove all sulfites from any wine.


HOW IT WORKS

StiQit is an easy to use, single use device that allows you to remove all sulfites from any wine in just seconds without affecting the appearance, aroma and most importantly the taste. The StiQit is 100% recyclable, BPA free and environmentally friendly.  

With StiQit, it’s simple:


A LOOK AT SULFITES IN WINE

As previously mentioned, sulfites added to wine are used as a preservative and can be added during several stages in the winemaking process. 

Sulfites are measured in parts per million “ppm”. Different style of wines contain different allowable amounts. When we say allowable, we mean the FDA regulates the levels of sulfites contained in wine. Can you say “red flag”?

By using StiQit, you now have the ability to remove all sulfites from ANY wine. With StiQit, No more “allowable maximum amounts”, you can finally have sulfite free wine, champagne or cider.


THE PAST YEAR AND HALF

We have spent the past year and half creating the perfect formulation that allows StiQit to remove all sulfites from any wine, champagne or cider. We have spent countless hours in the lab, testing our proprietary ingredients against the majority of options available at retail today. 

  • We have finalized our proprietary active ingredients.
  • We have discovered the exact measured amount that must be used in order to achieve a successful single use device. Just a few stirs and you are done.
  • We have tested and retested our device against numerous classes and variations of wine. All with great success.
  • We have tested StiQit with sulfite sensitive individuals for real world reaction (or lack there of), again with great success.
  • We have identified our manufacturer, warehouse and shipper.
  • We have chosen our final prototypes to ensure maximum ease of use. Including our innovative “Q Clip” to identify your glass of sulfite free wine in a group setting.


PERKS


SHIPPING

To those supporters residing the UNITED STATES (USA), all perks include FREE SHIPPING.

Those outside the United States are considered INTERNATIONAL, and International Shipping Fees will need to be added to your $75.00 - 36x StiQit + 2 Glasses perk purchase only.   

Please see the StiQit SHIPPING GUIDE below.


HOW TO: Add Shipping to International Perks

  1. Choose the Perk you want to pledge / purchase, ( e.g. $75.00 - 36x StiQit + 2 Wine Glasses )
  2. Check our StiQit Shipping Guide for costs to your country for your Perk
  3. Add an "Additional Gift > Custom Amount" below ( e.g. $20 for England )


HOW TO: Adding Shipping to Existing Perks

  1. Choose the big pink CONTRIBUTE NOW button (near the top right of this page)
  2. Check our StiQit Shipping Guide for costs to your country for your Perk
  3. Add an "Additional Gift > Custom Amount" below ( e.g. $20 for England )



VIDEOS



MEET THE TEAM

Entrepreneur in Residence at BioGenerator with experience starting and growing early stage technology, bioscience and device companies. Alan also brings 20 years' pharmaceutical experience with Pfizer Inc. leading and managing multi-disciplinary R&D teams across multiple global locations, developing the strategy and securing an internal budget to successfully deliver 10 new drug candidates into human clinical development in alignment with the commercial business units' strategic goals.

An entrepreneurial professional with 20+ years’ experience in marketing and brand development within the highly competitive adult beverage industry. Past experience includes Senior management roles  within organizations such as Wirtz, Diageo, Pure Holdings and Anheuser-Busch. Most recently leading New Products and Innovation for ABInBev. Currently holds position of Managing Partner for MJ Bevolution Consulting, providing brands with strategy, innovation and marketing guidance.

An entrepreneurial professional with 20 years’ experience as a member of the Executive Development Board at Anheuser-Busch Companies supporting new product and innovation development, and implementation of brands, products and new package experience in the competitive adult beverage industry both in the US and with international breweries in Europe and China.

Faculty member at Washington University School of Medicine for 37 years currently holding appointments in the Departments of Biochemistry and Molecular Biophysics, Cell Biology and Biomedical Engineering. Has published over 140 papers in scientific journals and holds several patents. In 2006 he founded Vasculox, Inc. which has attracted $2.7 million in funding.

A research pharmacologist with extensive experience in the pharmaceutical industry with Monsanto, Searle, Pharmacia, Pfizer and most recently in the biotech sector, leading the research effort at Vasculox. She has participated in developing drug candidates through IND-enabling studies and into Phase 1/2 studies. Most importantly, she is a gluten intolerant subject with great hopes of one day drinking beer of any brand.

Molecular biologist/biochemist with extensive experience in cell culture, protein purification and numerous analytical assays and methodologies. He brings 30 years of drug research and development experience with Pharmacia and Pfizer including collaborations understanding yeast genetics with Labatt Brewing Co.

CLICK TO DOWNLOAD MEDIA KIT

FAQ's

How does StiQit work?

StiQit works by introducing a scientifically proven and precise quantity of our proprietary developed ingredients into the wine, that neutralize the sulfites in any
8 oz. or less glass of wine.

Can I reuse my StiQit device?
The StiQit can only be used once to treat a single 8 oz. or less glass serving of wine. It cannot be used to treat a second glass of wine.

Will my StiQit work on a full bottle of wine?
StiQit will not remove the sulfites from a full bottle of wine. StiQit is currently designed to remove all sulfites from any single 8 oz. or less glass of wine. A single StiQit can only be used once with a single glass of wine.

Will StiQit prevent “hangovers”?
StiQit will not prevent hangovers. StiQit will remove all of the sulfites from a single glass of wine and thereby allow those that suffer from sulfite sensitivity to once again drink their favorite wine without potentially suffering the negative consequences associated with their sulfite sensitivity.

What are some reactions to sulfites?
Some of the most common reaction to sulfites include nasal congestion, flushing, breathing difficulties, skin rashes, hives, itchiness, upset stomach, diarrhea, vomiting, trouble swallowing, low blood pressure, headaches.

Can’t I just buy “Organic” wine?
All wine contains sulfites. They occur naturally as a by-product of the fermentation process and are additionally artificially added at various stages of the wine production process as a preservative. Organic wine does not mean there are no sulfites present. It could mean that the grapes have simply been grown organically without the use of fertilizers or pesticides. Many organic wines still have sulfites added as a preservative. Organic could also mean that no additional sulfites have been added during the production process. In this case there are still sulfites present in the wine as a result of the fermentation process.

I found a wine that says “No Sulfites Added”, what does that mean?
It simply means that no artificially added sulfites were used during the wine production process. It does not, however, mean that the wine does not contain naturally produced sulfites. All wines have some level of sulfites due to those that are formed during the fermentation process.

Which has more sulfites? Red wine or white wine?
Both red and white wine contains sulfites. It is reported that white wine contains more sulfites than red wine. Our own laboratory data has confirmed that on average there are more sulfites in white wine than red wine.

How much sulfite is in wine?
The amount of sulfites in wine varies widely depending on how much are artificially added by each individual winery. According to the Food & Drug Administration (FDA) the maximum allowed amount of sulfites in wine is 350 ppm.

How are sulfites measured?
Measuring sulfites in wine is not simple. We purchased and validated a sulfite meter to measure the sulfites in wine in our company laboratory. The method requires the use of laboratory equipment to be able to accurately and reproducibly measure the sulfites in the wine. The presence of sulfites can also be assessed with the use of sulfite test strips, such as the ones we used in our video that demonstrated how the StiQit works. Because these test strips indicate the presence of sulfites by a change in color, they can only ideally be used for white wine rather than red wine.

What does “PPM” mean?
PPM is an abbreviation that means ‘Parts Per Million’ and refers to the unit of concentration used to describe how much sulfites are present in wine.

Why are sulfites in wine?
Sulfites are added to wine during the wine production process as a preservative and to prevent the wine from ‘going bad’ and continuing to ferment in the bottle. The sulfites allow the wine to be shipped and stored for longer periods of time than would be possible if sulfites were not in the wine. Sulfites are also present in wine because they are formed as part of the fermentation process. The sulfites are not required to be in wine for any other reason.

What is the difference between FREE sulfites and BOUND sulfites?
Sulfites in wine exist in two forms; free and bound. The bound sulfites are irreversibly bound to other components found in wine such as proteins and carbohydrates. Once they are bound they remain bound. The free sulfites are the remaining sulfites that circulate freely within the wine in an unbound state. It is only the free sulfites found in wine that are capable of triggering an adverse allergic reaction in people. Because the bound sulfites remain bound, they are not capable of triggering a reaction1.

Can I smell sulfites in wine?
No you cannot smell sulfites in wine at the concentrations that they are present.

Should I be concerned about sulfites in wine?
Sulfites are considered to be one of the ten priority food allergens known today2. If you do not suffer from sulfite sensitivity, StiQit provides the option for everyone to enjoy any wine WITHOUT the sulfite preservative. We believe that part of living a healthy life-style includes reducing the consumption of additives and preservatives like sulfites. StiQit allows you to simply and quickly achieve this goal with wine.

Is the material used to make StiQit safe?
Yes, absolutely. The StiQit device is made of FDA approved food-safe, high grade plastic that is nontoxic and completely recyclable. The proprietary ingredients in StiQit have been listed and approved as a safe substance by the FDA.

What is the Q for at the end of the StiQit?
The Q can be detached from the StiQit after treatment of the wine and placed around the stem of your wine glass or on the rim of a stemless wine glass to indicate that the wine has been treated with StiQit and the sulfites have been removed.

References:

1.  Department of Food Science and Technology, University of Nebraska.

2.  Government of Canada in consultation with Allergy/Asthma Information Association, Anaphylaxis Canada, Association québécoise des allergies alimentaires, Canadian Society of Allergy and Clinical Immunology and Health Canada.

We are a small and brand new company and  this campaign determines whether we can continue working on StiQit or not. We need at least $50,000 to pay for the cost of everything that's needed to produce StiQit. The donations you give us will be used to fund the molding, casting, production, packaging and shipping of the product. Every penny will be used to pay for making StiQit into a reality.
In return, you’ll be the first to receive StiQit as soon as it comes off the production line. With your generous help, we'll be able to make StiQit available very soon and allow everybody to enjoy their wine sulfite free.

story:
The campaign has ended. 

 

Visit our official website : IngeniousBros Official Online Shop

 

Introducing : CLYH Wallet  

 

  Our objective was simple : design a wood wallet that is durable, super-slim AND that looks beautiful. Each and every CLYH wood wallet is handcrafted, making it a pleasure to handle all-day everyday.

 

  

BestSlimWallet.com : "IngeniousBros hit the nail right on the head as the CLYH Wallet looks absolutely gorgeous" 

GadgetFlow : "...the earthly smell of aromatic wood which pairs up well with the soft luxury feel of leather"

TrendHunter : "The CLYH Wood Wallet by IngeniousBros will age with time   and use to make it all your own"

 

Wood X Leather

 Wood and leather, each material has its advantages and disadvantages as a natural material. We set out to design a totally new wallet where two materials created a harmony. A wallet with aromatic wood along with the soft feeling of leather...                  We pursued the best wallet encompassing both functionality and aesthetics without compromising any.

 

Design

  We asked ourselves how we could make a wood wallet that is simple, beautiful and also durable. The biggest challenge was wood itself. Everyone knows wood is lovely but also easily breakable in many situations. After months of prototyping and testing different designs, we've created the perfect wood wallet that everybody loves to carry without worrying about breaking.

 - 3D Modeling  -

 

 

-  Prototypes  -
 

CLYH Wallet Demo

 

 

 

Wood

  CLYH Wallet is made of three different types of wood. Bubinga, Purpleheart and Cherry.

· Bubinga :

  We use special figured bubinga called ‘Waterfall’ with its random swirls  and shadings, which make this wood truly unique. Bubinga is an incredibly strong  wood by any measure, exceeding nearly every other wood species.

· Purpleheart : 

  Purpleheart is named after the vibrant color of its wood which, when it is cut, quickly turns from a light brown to a rich purple color. It is also rated as being very durable, and able to resist both water and decay.

 

Leather, Tannery

  CLYH Wallet is made with Vegetable-tanned Leather which is considered the highest grade of leather. Located in Santa Croce sull’Arno(PI), Italy, La Perla Azzurra is one of the greatest Vegetable Tannery In Italy. Its leather is used in a number of products including sporting goods, casual footwear as well as small leather goods.

More information about La Perla Azzurra.
 
 

Saddle Stitch

 

  
  Leather stitch is very important in product durability. The type of stitch we are using is called Saddle stitch(Hand-Stitch). It’s much stronger than a machine made stitch, costs more, and also time consuming.  

 

 

Durability

  CLYH Wallet is made of Wood. So we spent several months focusing on durability. The direction of wood grain is important when making a product with wood. Let's take one example. 
 When you split wood with the grain, you can break it easily. But when you break across the grain, it becomes much harder to break. To take full advantage of a wood’s strength, we glued woods together with the cross grain at 90°.
 

  We spent lots of time field testing the product and of course, our Wood Wallets still look beautiful and work perfectly.
 

Feature

 

- Art.Dakota Wine -

- Art.Dakota Navy - 

- Art.Dakota Olive -

*Custom Engraving*

 

 

 

 For Earlybird Special, Engraving Special backers, We provide custom engraving of 1 line of text. (Maximum 15 characters.)
 We’ll send out a backer survey including engraving option at the end of the campaign.

 

Stretch Goals

 

$20K - CLYH Wallet Brass Ver.

 
  We'll add a new perk that offers Brass Ver. Wallet for a special price. Two wood parts are replaced with CNC machined brass. It has incredible strength and looks unique. Keep support us!
 

 

 

Delivery

  We are committed to make a high quality product and to deliver in a timely manner. 100% of the work will be done in house as we have all tools and equipments. This will allow us to have control over the processes involved and also deliver on time.
 

Our Team

  We are a maker team. Our team consists of three designers specialized in woodcraft and leatherwork. We’ve worked hard to design a wood wallet that is  durable, functional and also beautiful. As a result, CLYH wallet has become a simple, pleasure to handle and Environmentally friendly wallet that you’ve never seen before.

 

Gallery

 

 

 

One click share to Facebook

One click share to Twitter

One click share to Google

 

FAQ

 
Q : How many cards can I fit into the wallet?

   Up to 6 cards is recommended. 1 card into Front(Wood side) , up to 5 into            Back(Leather side).

Q : Do things fall out of it?

   Of course NOT. CLYH Wallet is tight enough to keep your cards safe :)  

Q : What are the dimensions of the wallet?

    The measurements of the wallet are:

  · Length: 3.89” (99mm), Width : 2.55” (65 mm),  Thickness : from 0.23'' (6 mm)

Q : When can I choose the leather color of my Wallet?

    We'll send out a survey at the end of the campaign. If you've purchased more than  one, you can choose different colors!

Q : What are the shipping costs?

   Shipping costs change depending on your location and the chosen perk. Select      your country in the check out process and the shipping costs will be shown  instantly.

Q : When will you ship?

  The estimated shipping date of the Earlybirds Special Perks is October 2016.  Indiegogo Special and Engraving Special Perks would ship 4 weeks after that. 

Q: I’m having trouble claiming a perk. Who should I reach out to?

    Email : support@ingeniousbros.com

 

Q:  How do I get in touch with your team?  

   Email : hello@ingeniousbros.com
story_txt:
The campaign has ended.  Visit our official website : IngeniousBros Official Online Shop Introducing : CLYH Wallet     Our objective was simple : design a wood wallet that is durable, super-slim AND that looks beautiful. Each and every CLYH wood wallet is handcrafted, making it a pleasure to handle all-day everyday.   BestSlimWallet.com : "IngeniousBros hit the nail right on the head as the CLYH Wallet looks absolutely gorgeous" GadgetFlow : "...the earthly smell of aromatic wood which pairs up well with the soft luxury feel of leather"TrendHunter : "The CLYH Wood Wallet by IngeniousBros will age with time   and use to make it all your own" Wood X Leather Wood and leather, each material has its advantages and disadvantages as a natural material. We set out to design a totally new wallet where two materials created a harmony. A wallet with aromatic wood along with the soft feeling of leather...                  We pursued the best wallet encompassing both functionality and aesthetics without compromising any. 
Design

  We asked ourselves how we could make a wood wallet that is simple, beautiful and also durable. The biggest challenge was wood itself. Everyone knows wood is lovely but also easily breakable in many situations. After months of prototyping and testing different designs, we've created the perfect wood wallet that everybody loves to carry without worrying about breaking.



 - 3D Modeling  -
 
 

-  Prototypes  -

 
CLYH Wallet Demo
 



 
 
Wood

  CLYH Wallet is made of three different types of wood. Bubinga, Purpleheart and Cherry.
· Bubinga :
  We use special figured bubinga called ‘Waterfall’ with its random swirls  and shadings, which make this wood truly unique. Bubinga is an incredibly strong  wood by any measure, exceeding nearly every other wood species.
· Purpleheart : 

  Purpleheart is named after the vibrant color of its wood which, when it is cut, quickly turns from a light brown to a rich purple color. It is also rated as being very durable, and able to resist both water and decay.
 


Leather, Tannery
  CLYH Wallet is made with Vegetable-tanned Leather which is considered the highest grade of leather. Located in Santa Croce sull’Arno(PI), Italy, La Perla Azzurra is one of the greatest Vegetable Tannery In Italy. Its leather is used in a number of products including sporting goods, casual footwear as well as small leather goods.



More information about La Perla Azzurra.
  Saddle Stitch     Leather stitch is very important in product durability. The type of stitch we are using is called Saddle stitch(Hand-Stitch). It’s much stronger than a machine made stitch, costs more, and also time consuming.  
 

 
Durability
  CLYH Wallet is made of Wood. So we spent several months focusing on durability. The direction of wood grain is important when making a product with wood. Let's take one example.  When you split wood with the grain, you can break it easily. But when you break across the grain, it becomes much harder to break. To take full advantage of a wood’s strength, we glued woods together with the cross grain at 90°. 

  We spent lots of time field testing the product and of course, our Wood Wallets still look beautiful and work perfectly.

story:
100% waterproof and breathable shoes designed to protect your feet while looking good!

Stepping in puddles = no worries 

VIA’s Nano-Tech membrane means dirt and water rolls right off the shoe.

There’s nothing worse than wet or soggy socks and smelly feet. VIA’s are made with Nano-Tech membranes. They keep your feet dry and fresh for up to TWO hours!

A single plastic bottle can kill over 100 marine lives. Marine life often eats plastic. This starves and kills them. Plastic litter may not decompose for 500 years. It will continue to find affect oceanic ecosystems. Small decisions like choosing an eco-friendly product or saying no to single-use plastic makes a huge difference for the future of our planet. One pair of VIA shoes can help recycling approximately 30 gram of ocean plastic.

The shoes’ foldable high-top flaps fit snug around the ankle and stop things from getting into your shoe. This means, no more wet socks and clunky rain boots. VIA’s can be customized to your own style. Change them from high-top and low-top.

VIA shoes are integrated with 3 layers which creates extremely lightweight and comfortable wear. Our patented technology packs many benefits into the everyday shoe you never knew you needed.

story:
Mask Off: Masque transparent avec ventilation & purification UV-C active

 

 

NB : Il est maintenant possible de commander directement Mask Off sur notre site internet, pour le lancement de notre site, nous vous offrons les frais de ports et un prix spécial !

 

 

Respirable et transparent, Mask Off est la nouvelle génération de masque facial qui s'appuie sur une technologie révolutionnaire de purification à double filtre et de ventilation active. 

Ce masque transparent vous permet de rester en sécurité, montrer votre sourire et faciliter la communication. Il est conçu pour pouvoir respirer sans être étouffé grâce à un flux d'air pur créé par deux petits ventilateurs silencieux.

Ce masque léger et respirable est idéal par tout type de temps (Chaud et Froid) grâce à sa ventilation active et sera également une solution parfaite pour les heures de travail au bureau, les conventions, les réunions commerciales, etc.

Les matériaux bio-compatibles utilisés dans Mask Off vous permettent d'être à l'aise pendant de nombreuses heures sans restreindre la circulation de l'air. Nous utilisons les informations de l'AFNOR sur les données anthropométriques de l'ISO/TS 16976-2 pour nous assurer que le masque est confortable pour tous les utilisateurs.

Filtration & Purification en entrée et sortie du masque

Le ventilateur actif crée un flux à travers un filtre homologué pour être respiré par l'utilisateur, puis un second ventilateur rejette l'air respiré à travers un second filtre. 

Mask Off en quelques mots   

 

Mask Off, une solution économique comparé aux masques chirurgicaux jetables

Comparatif    

Cout consommable annuel : représente le cout des filtres pour l'utilisation journalière du masque pendant un an pour un utilisateur.

C'est là que Mask Off intervient !   

Filtre de Qualité Certifiée à faible Coût 

 

Mask Off utilise des petits filtres à air, très abordables et à haut rendement, certifiés par le ministère français des Armées et la DGA. Chaque pack Mask Off est livré avec 4 mois de filtres, vous disposez de 4 mois d'utilisation quotidienne du masque. Vous pouvez acheter des filtres supplémentaires pour 15€ (transport inclus) pour un nouveau pack de 4 mois de filtres. Notre technologie utilise 100 fois moins de surface de filtres que les masques chirurgicaux et permet de faire d'énormes économies de transport et de déchets.

Pour une utilisation quotidienne 

Fini les Lunettes Embuées 

Mask Off dispose d'un traitement antibuée : il s'agit du même procédé que celui utilisé dans les casques de motards, qui permet de voir à travers l'équipement pour plus de sécurité. De plus, la double ventilation active permet également d'éviter la buée. 

Protection en plus avec la version Ultraviolets

À l'intérieur des Pods Ultraviolets, une LED UV-C purifie le filtre. 

 

Les Pods Ultraviolets n'émettent pas de lumière UV-C en dehors du boitier. Ainsi, le masque ne subit pas de fuite d'UV-C pendant le processus de purification du filtre, il n'y a donc aucun risque pour l'utilisateur. Cette fonctionnalité est proposée en option à Mask Off.

Nous proposons trois versions différentes, Mask Off Ultraviolet, et Mask Off, sans UV-C. Nous proposons également une version entièrement noire appelée « Mask Off Carbon ». 

Choisissez la Couleur de Votre Lanière

Les lanières du masque sont fournies en trois coloris différents : Noir, Blanc, Gris. Plus de confusion car chaque membre de la famille peut facilement différencier son masque grâce à la lanière facilement interchangeable ! 

 

Pods Modulaires pour une autonomie infinie

Les pods sont facilement remplaçables et rechargeables par un port micro USB. Le filtre, mais également l'unité de ventilation, peuvent être remplacés. Il est possible de commander des unités de ventilation de rechange pour prolonger l'autonomie afin de vous adapter à votre mode de vie et couvrir une journée complète d'utilisation avec un seul masque. Les pods additionnels sont vendus par paires (ventilateur d'entrée et de sortie), une paire de Pods prolonge l'autonomie du produit de 3 heures. 

De plus, le masque est très simple à utiliser ! Il suffit d'appuyer sur un bouton judicieusement situé sur chaque dispositif de ventilation pour le mettre en marche et d'appuyer à nouveau pour l'arrêter. 

Mask Off : Rechargement du pod et changement du filtre

Matériaux sans danger pour la peau

Mask Off utilise un profil de contour de visage en matériaux ultra-doux, confortable, bio-compatible, hypo-allergénique et compatible avec le contact alimentaire. Sa conception ergonomique lui permet de s'adapter facilement aux différents contours du visage et de s'adapter confortablement à toute personnalité.

Mask Off convient aux enfants de 11 ans et plus.

 

Objectifs élargis

Si nous atteignons l'objectif de 75k€, nous proposerons deux couleurs supplémentaires pour les lanières à choisir gratuitement parmi les 3 lanières inclus lors de l'expédition des commandes.

Si nous atteignons l'objectif de 250k€, nous proposerons l'option d'ajouter un étui de protection portable à votre commande.

Risques et Challenges

Nous sommes en train de finaliser l'industrialisation de notre produit fort de l'expérience de notre équipe ayant déjà mis sur le marché une trentaine de produits électroniques.

- Les CAO des plastiques sont finalisées et prêtes pour le lancement des moules de plasturgie. Le DFM a été validé par nos usines.

- Le dossier de fabrication de la carte électronique a été validé en production et les sous-traitants ont été sélectionnés et sont prêts à produire la premiere série.

- Les pièces telles que batteries, straps, et ventilateurs ont été sourcés et validés par nos équipes après une série de tests rigoureux.

- Les filtres sont validés par notre sous traitant et certifiés par la DGA.

Enfin le process complet de fabrication a été validé par le sous-traitant. Ainsi l'ensemble de la chaine de production et de logistique est prêt à être lancé dès que nous auront atteint notre objectif afin de délivrer les masques au plus vite.

story:
Elite Series Golf LLC

Where Art and Golf meet!

About Elite Series Golf- A company that helps Corporations and Charities create custom logo golf drivers and putters for their golf outings and most important clients, VIP, sales staff, give aways, prizes and top performers.

So where did the idea for Elite Series Golf come from?

Due to the advances in technology, golf equipment, specifically drivers, are better than they have ever been.   Since billions of dollars are spent on equipment each year, and the technologies are essentially as good as they can get, golf companies needed to find a way to separate themselves from one another.  The only change to be made to the clubs was a cosmetic one.  The first signs of this were the “white head” drivers.  A simple color change that has captured the top spot in the driver market.  So we at Elite Series started to think about what else we could do with the clubs to make them unique.  We started throwing ideas around and with the help of our design team Elite Series Corporate line was born!  We thought, what better way for a company to give a “one of a kind” gift to its key employees or important clients, and actually get marketing/advertising from it!

Golf's Greatest Dad Project

This project came about while the president of our company was xmas shopping for his father this past year.  He just had his first child and was so excited to buy his father a gift that had the words "GRANDPA" all over it.    As he spent 3 hours shopping for a gift all he could find was a #1 Grandpa Spatula.  Disappointed to say the least, he felt there had to be better, and now there is!  Elite series golf now plans to roll out not only the Golf's Greatest Dad project but also; mom, grandpa, and grandma.  This way everyone can enjoy a gift that not only looks great but is also thoughtful and functionable.

Our Equipment

Our product is NOT just a novelty.  Our research and development team spent over a year designing our shafts and club heads.  Our shafts are made from pure graphite.  We spared no expense working with cheap knock off shafts made from graphite and fiber glass fillers, ours are 100% pure.  Our club head is a top of the line titanium head built for maximum distance.  Our over-sized face is incredibly forgiving, designed for low spin and a high launch angle.   We wanted to make sure that EVERY golfer gets the best experience from PLAYING our club, not just showing it off.

Uses

*This project is intended as a gift!

Key employee/executives – why not give them something they will actually use, while at the same time advertises for your company!

Key clients/high rollers – Impress them with a gift that cannot be purchased in stores.  Our drivers will perform with the best on the market.   Combine that with your company colors/logos/slogans and your gift will be truly unique!

Marketing/advertising -  Why not give something away that will continue to be used and keep your company on the mind of the consumer.

Charity use – Are you donating to a charity golf outing?  Make a splash with everyone involved when you send our drivers to the event to be given away.  You’ll be the talk of the event for the rest of the year!

Putter Specifications

Head Material- Stainless Steel

Head Finish- Satin Finish with white paint coating/ Face double milled

Shaft- Branded 100% graphite, with plating finish.

Label & Logo- Designs are heat treated onto the club, leaving no imperfections on the shaft.  Putter head logo is an iron badge insert.

Grip Option- White Rubber Grip

 

Driver Specifications

Head- Forged 6AL4V Titanium Head with black PVD plating finish, white paint coating on top.

Shaft-  Branded 100% Graphite Shaft, with plating finish.

Label & Logo- Designs are heat treated onto the club, leaving no imperfections on the shaft or the head.

Grip Option- White Rubber Grip

What We Need & What You Get

What we need: Funding for upcoming and additional projects.

Most important, is what you get!

$5 Gets you a Thank You!

$25 Gets you a Head Cover

$50 Gets you a Elite Series Golf LOGO Polo

$75 Gets you a Elite Series Golf LOGO Hooded Sweatshirt

$150 Gets you the Golf's Greatest Dad Putter

 

$500 Gets you the Golf's Greatest Dad Head Cover, Putter, and Driver!

The Impact

Elite Series Golf is building a company from the ground up, your funding will help us create and launch new projects and products.  We will be able to update our website and fund advertising and marketing campaigns.  We will be able to grow our workforce which will allow us to continue to provide color to the golf world.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can help fund our project but you can help in other ways!

Like us on Facebook! http://www.facebook.com/#!/EliteSeriesGolf

Follow us on Twitter!  https://twitter.com/EliteSeriesGolf

Send our offer to your friends!

On Behalf of everyone at Elite Series Golf we Thank You for looking at our project and taking the time to find out more about our company!

Due to the advances in technology, golf equipment, specifically drivers, are better than they have ever been.   Since billions of dollars are spent on equipment each year, and the technologies are essentially as good as they can get, golf companies needed to find a way to separate themselves from one another.  The only change to be made to the clubs was a cosmetic one.  The first signs of this were the “white head” drivers.  A simple color change that has captured the top spot in the driver market.  So we at Elite Series started to think about what else we could do with the clubs to make them unique.  We started throwing ideas around and with the help of our design team Elite Series Corporate line was born!  We thought, what better way for a company to give a “one of a kind” gift to its key employees or important clients, and actually get marketing/advertising from it!
Golf's Greatest Dad Project
This project came about while the president of our company was xmas shopping for his father this past year.  He just had his first child and was so excited to buy his father a gift that had the words "GRANDPA" all over it.    As he spent 3 hours shopping for a gift all he could find was a #1 Grandpa Spatula.  Disappointed to say the least, he felt there had to be better, and now there is!  Elite series golf now plans to roll out not only the Golf's Greatest Dad project but also; mom, grandpa, and grandma.  This way everyone can enjoy a gift that not only looks great but is also thoughtful and functionable.
Our Equipment
Our product is NOT just a novelty.  Our research and development team spent over a year designing our shafts and club heads.  Our shafts are made from pure graphite.  We spared no expense working with cheap knock off shafts made from graphite and fiber glass fillers, ours are 100% pure.  Our club head is a top of the line titanium head built for maximum distance.  Our over-sized face is incredibly forgiving, designed for low spin and a high launch angle.   We wanted to make sure that EVERY golfer gets the best experience from PLAYING our club, not just showing it off.
Uses
*This project is intended as a gift!
Key employee/executives – why not give them something they will actually use, while at the same time advertises for your company!
Key clients/high rollers – Impress them with a gift that cannot be purchased in stores.  Our drivers will perform with the best on the market.   Combine that with your company colors/logos/slogans and your gift will be truly unique!
Marketing/advertising -  Why not give something away that will continue to be used and keep your company on the mind of the consumer.
Charity use – Are you donating to a charity golf outing?  Make a splash with everyone involved when you send our drivers to the event to be given away.  You’ll be the talk of the event for the rest of the year!
Putter Specifications
Head Material- Stainless Steel
Head Finish- Satin Finish with white paint coating/ Face double milled
Shaft- Branded 100% graphite, with plating finish.
Label & Logo- Designs are heat treated onto the club, leaving no imperfections on the shaft.  Putter head logo is an iron badge insert.
Grip Option- White Rubber Grip
 
Driver Specifications
Head- Forged 6AL4V Titanium Head with black PVD plating finish, white paint coating on top.
Shaft-  Branded 100% Graphite Shaft, with plating finish.
Label & Logo- Designs are heat treated onto the club, leaving no imperfections on the shaft or the head.
Grip Option- White Rubber Grip


What We Need & What You Get
What we need: Funding for upcoming and additional projects.
Most important, is what you get!
$5 Gets you a Thank You!
$25 Gets you a Head Cover
$50 Gets you a Elite Series Golf LOGO Polo
$75 Gets you a Elite Series Golf LOGO Hooded Sweatshirt
$150 Gets you the Golf's Greatest Dad Putter

 
$500 Gets you the Golf's Greatest Dad Head Cover, Putter, and Driver!
The Impact

Elite Series Golf is building a company from the ground up, your funding will help us create and launch new projects and products.  We will be able to update our website and fund advertising and marketing campaigns.  We will be able to grow our workforce which will allow us to continue to provide color to the golf world.
Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that not everyone can help fund our project but you can help in other ways!
Like us on Facebook! http://www.facebook.com/#!/EliteSeriesGolf
Follow us on Twitter!  https://twitter.com/EliteSeriesGolf
Send our offer to your friends!
On Behalf of everyone at Elite Series Golf we Thank You for looking at our project and taking the time to find out more about our company!

story:
The Crew

Amy Lukas & Mary Catterlin

South End Locals, Great Lake Surfers

 

The Plan

We are setting out to sail the perimeter of Lake Michigan and document the experience aboard our handmade canoe.  Lake Michigan has 1,638 miles of shoreline total.  Our trip will traverse over 1,200 of these miles.  If we travel 10-25 miles everyday, be it sailing or paddling, our trip is predicted to last around 2 months.  Weather, waves, and delays on land may contribute to the trip lasting as long as 3 months!  So Lake Michigan’s ports and campgrounds will be our home for perhaps a quarter of a year.  Our journey will begin with the Indiana waters taking us westward up along the Illinois and Wisconsin border, from island to island off Door Peninsula, through the Upper Peninsula, and back down through Michigan’s coastal waters.  Outfitted with a gps spot device, iphones, cameras, and journals, we will be documenting the experience as well as posting constant updates as to our progress.    

 

The Boat

Makeba is a 10’ 10.5” dugout sailing canoe.  Carved by hand from a cotton wood tree, this boat will be setting out on its maiden voyage after close to four years of work.  When set with a sail and outriggers, this short, yet sturdy boat will be ready for the open waters.  Makeba was given her name after Miriam Makeba, a famous calypso singer.  Her name was chosen as a link to the inspiring water adventurer Jacques Cousteau and his boat named Calypso.  Mary has worked a very long time on this bulky beast and hopes you can help her do this trip right.    

 

Your Help

 

By contributing, you are helping to make our dream a reality.  In order to make this circumnavigation a success, we will need to have reliable gear.  Your support will go towards providing us with some additional boating supplies, camping equipment, safety equipment, camera gear, and food.  Food and safety, being major factors here.  If you are somewhere on the planned route, maybe you can even meet up with us – we’ll even buy ice cream for anyone offering up a hot shower!

 


 

Get To Know Us and Track Our Trip

 

 

Read about us in the local media!- http://www.thebeacher.com/pdf/2012/BeacherFeb02...

 

Find us on Facebook to travel alongside us!  -Two Girls and a Tree Named Makeba

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Two-Girls-and-a-Tree-Named-Makeba/221104444635755?sk=info

 

Check out Mary’s Tumblr to hear our stories and view some photos!  -http://mcatter.tumblr.com/

 

 

 


 

 

Contribution Thank You's

 

Receive a part of the trip as thanks! All donations are greatly appreciated, please send this along to your friends and family, the more people this story reaches the better! 


All items personally made by Mary Catterlin.

Each is one of a kind!

(pics of the maps can be found in our Gallery and on our Facebook page)
