story:
Page en Français

Clessant brings you the first luxury watch straps for your Apple Watch. Instead of having the band everyone else has, wear your difference. 

Our straps are made to standards and with materials found on the most luxurious watches. Unlike the current trend of retrofitting stock bracelets, these are specifically designed for the Apple Watch. No compromises. 



A watch influences how you are perceived by others, but most importantly, how you perceive yourself. While you embrace the productivity and connectivity you now have with your Apple Watch, many of you seek a more personalized experience. 

We aim to provide a wide range of high qualitaty straps for your Watch, with different leathers and colors to fit your mood and desires. 

The Clessant strap is specifically designed for the Apple Watch. It makes no compromises or shortcuts. Every detail has been chosen with the Apple Watch in mind. 

When you receive your Clessant strap, you just need to disconnect your current strap and slide in ours, no need for tools or special adapters. Simple, elegant and personal. 

We very much hope you will enjoy these as much as we do and will contribute to making this project a reality.


In a glimpse:

  • Highest quality leathers (France, Italy, UK, Belgium)
  • Designed in France
  • Handmade in Western Europe & final assembly in France
  • Designed specifically for the Apple Watch
  • Stainless steel hardware

Calf - Vegetable Tanning (CK1-3): Smooth matte finish (absorbs light, no shine) -> a natural tanning process which shows off the natural grain of the leather. Takes on a strong patina and personality with age.  

Calf - Chrome Tanning (CK4-6): Smooth matte finish -> tanning process gives very deep and even colors. 


Buffalo Leather (BK1-4): Nubuck finish (soft, velvety texture, like suede but of better quality); matte finish (absorbs light, no shine).


Lizard Leather (LK1-5): Smooth finish (very slight texture to the touch). Glossy finish.


Crocodile Leather (CR1, CR2, CR6): Textured finish. Small scales. Matte finish. Very saturated colors. 

Crocodile Leather (CR5): Slightly textured finish. Small scales. Glossy finish.

Alligator Belly Leather (CR3, CR4): Textured finish. Small scales. Pastel colors. -> Same pledge level as crocodile. 


Alligator Leather: Textured finish. Large squarish scales.


Please note:

  • At the end of this Indiegogo campaign, pledgers will be able to fill out a survey stating their color choice, hardware choice, and size.
  • The leather has been selected for its suitability and any irregularities or marks are not considered as imperfection or fault. They may be typical characteristics such as vein and growth marks which are natural properties of genuine leather. Each bracelet is inspected to conform to the highest standards, eliminating any flaws which would degrade the overall finish of the product.
  • Colors can slightly vary from the pictures. Each Clessant bracelet is unique. 


Shape- Slightly tapered to offer a more refined look. This is ideal when dealing with larger widths (like the Apple Watch) to maintain better balance. 

The hole placement for the buckle is also chosen to obtain a secure and tight fit. This ensures that your watch maintains all of its functionalities.

The width is made to allow no sliding along the adapter. This prevents an unsightly gap as well as premature wear.

Buckle- Clessant buckles are made of stainless steel and individually inspected, the size is non-standard to go perfectly with the Apple Watch. Finally, these are engraved with Clessant as a mark of the utmost quality. 

Adapters- Are of the highest quality, made in stainless steel (316L) to fit seamlessly with your watch. Once again these are tested individually to ensure a perfect fit. We offer both polished stainless steel and black to match your watch.

Quality Control- Once each strap is finished, it is reviewed by hand thoroughly to ensure that it is of the highest standard.


William and Nicolas met eight years ago in school. Both share a passion for fashion, innovation, and technology. William has worked for small businesses in the healthcare and technology sectors as a business developer, while Nicolas has worked in media and finance.

To help them in this journey, they have assembled a team of experienced professionals in luxury goods, mechanical engineering, project management, entrepreneurship, and law.

This means that all aspects of the project, from design to production and fulfillments are covered by experienced and talented individuals. We know that a strong team will be key to delivering on our promise to you as backers.


When  the project began, we started with a simple task, making the Apple Watch a more personalized luxury product. 

We love the functionality of the Apple Watch, but we want to wear a watch we are proud of displaying.

After numerous prototypes and going back to the drawing board, we have finally reached what we know is the best possible product.

Our packaging is also underway and we are so far very happy with the quality of the presentation.

Now it’s time to start a first production run.

To do this, we need your support. With this campaign we hope to raise enough interest to cover production and tooling costs, as well as purchase the hides. We are confident we can bring the products to your door within a month after funding and all indicators point to this being a credible timeframe.

It’s up to you now to pledge and be amongst the very first to have a luxury strap on your Watch.

Time to show your difference!


We are extremely serious about taking care of our backers, early adopters, and clients. Service and trust are in the DNA of Clessant. We have worked extremely hard at readying our product for a launch on Indiegogo and are confident in our ability to get you the product we promise in the timeframe we provided. However, as with all projects, there are always imponderables. The following are what we see as risks and challenges, and more importantly, how we are mitigating them.

PRODUCTION: Our production workflow is ready to go, however, should we see a much larger demand for our product than expected, we could see some delays. We have prepared contingency plans in case of such events and although we could see an impact on delivery time, quality will never be compromised and delays should be minor.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENT: Our prototypes are made and we are satisfied, however, there could potentially be small modifications to further enhance the product. These changes will always be for the benefit of you, the customer, and will be announced and discussed with backers.

Any pledge brings us closer to our goal, we encourage you to share this page, images, and project with as many people as you can, and also by contributing to the project by clicking the ‘Contribute now’ at the top of the page.

Thank you for your trust and support in turning this project into a reality.

Most sincerely, 
William LAURENT & Nicolas PEROT


Note: These straps are examples of colors available for this campaign.






Page en Français

Clessant vous propose les premiers bracelets de luxe conçus pour l'Apple Watch. Par conséquent, vous avez maintenant le choix de porter un bracelet design, original et qualitatif; démarquer vous!

Nos bracelets sont conçus en respectant les standards les plus stricts et fabriqués avec les matériaux utilisés dans la bijouterie et l’horlogerie haut de gamme. A contre-courant de la mode qui consiste à adapter des bracelets classiques, nos bracelets sont spécifiquement conçus pour l’Apple Watch. Sans compromis.


Une montre influence la façon dont vous êtes perçu, mais aussi votre propre perception de vous-même. Par conséquent, le but de Clessant est de vous fournir un produit à la hauteur de vos attentes. Nous savons que nombre d’entre vous désirent plus que les fonctionnalités et les services rendus par l’Apple Watch, beaucoup recherchent un produit personnalisé reflétant leur caractère et leur envies.

Pour répondre à ces attentes, nous vous offrons donc une large gamme composée de bracelets de qualité avec de nombreuses options en terme de types de cuirs (exotiques ou non) et de couleurs afin de répondre au mieux à vos désirs et à vos humeurs. Cette gamme continuera de grandir dans les mois et années à venir.

En plus du choix, un des éléments essentiels offerts par les bracelets Clessant est qu’ils ont été conçus spécifiquement pour l’Apple Watch. Aucun compromis ou raccourci n’a été pris dans la conception. Tous les détails ont été pensés avec l’Apple Watch au centre du projet.

Quand vous recevrez votre nouveau bracelet, vous aurez juste à déconnecter votre ancien bracelet afin d’emboiter le bracelet Clessant. Nul besoin de préparation, d’outils ou d’adaptateurs.

Simplicité, élégance, personnalité.

Nous espérons que nos produits vous séduiront et que contribuerez à faire de Clessant un succès.

Nos bracelets en un clin d'oeil:

  • Créés spécifquement pour l'Apple Watch
  • A partir de cuirs de grande qualité (sélectionnés dans les meilleures tanneries en France, Italie, Angleterre et Belgique)
  • Dessinés en France
  • Fabriqués à la main en Europe de l’Ouest avec assemblage final fait en France
  • Boucles et éléments de connections fabriqués  en inox

Cuir de veau – Tannage végétal (cuirs de CK1 à 3): Peau très douce au toucher avec finition mate (le cuir absorbe la lumière donc pas d’éclat) -> Le tannage végétal est un processus naturel qui révèle la texture naturelle du cuir. Ce type de cuir se patine avec le temps et a donc beaucoup de personnalité.

Cuir de Veau – Chromage (cuirs de CK4 à 6) : Peau très douce au touché avec finition mate. Le tannage au chrome permet d’avoir des couleurs très profondes et homogènes.


Cuir de Buffle (Cuirs de BK1 à 4): Finition nubuck mate. Cuir extrêmement doux au toucher avec une texture type velours.


Cuirs de Lézard (Cuirs de LK1 à 5): Peau douce au toucher  mais légèrement texturée. Finition satin-mate avec reflets.


Cuirs de crocodile (CR1, CR2, CR5, CR6): Peau texturée. Petites écailles. Finition mate. Couleurs saturées. 

Cuirs alligator ventre (CR3, CR4): Peau texturé. Petites écailles. Couleurs pastel. -> Même palier de contribution que pour le crocodile. 


Cuir alligator: Peaux texturées. Larges écailles, assez carrées. 


Note:
  • A la fin de cette campagne de précommandes Indiegogo, nous ferons parvenir à nos soutiens qui ont choisi un ou des bracelets un questionnaire afin qu’ils renseignent leur choix de couleurs pour le bracelet et le connecteur ainsi que la taille de leur montre.
  • Les cuirs sélectionnés pour nos produits l’ont été pour leurs qualités. Certains cuirs peuvent avoir de légères irrégularités ou légères marques (veines ou traces de croissance). Ces irrégularités ou marques ne sont pas des défauts mais plutôt la preuve de l’utilisation d’un cuir naturel. Après la fabrication, chaque bracelet passe dans les mains d’un membre de notre équipe contrôle qualité afin de vérifier que le bracelet est bien conforme à nos standards. Les bracelets ne passant pas l’inspection sont détruits.
  • Les couleurs peuvent varier de façon subtile par rapport aux photos. Chaque bracelet Clessant est unique!

Forme – Légèrement fuselée afin d’offrir un bracelet plus raffiné et élégant. Etant donné que nous travaillons sur des bracelets assez larges, c’est la meilleure façon de procéder afin de garantir le meilleur équilibre visuel du produit.

La largeur des bracelets est choisie afin que le connecteur et le bracelet soient parfaitement adaptés. Ceci garantit l’esthétique mais aussi la durabilité du produit.

Le positionnement des trous pour la boucle est choisi afin d’obtenir une fermeture facile et sécurisée. Le positionnement garantit aussi le maintien optimal de la montre afin d’en garder toutes les fonctionnalités.

Boucle – Les boucles Clessant sont fabriquées chez de grands fournisseurs de l’horlogerie. Elles sont minutieusement inspectées et leurs tailles hors standard ont été sélectionnées afin de s’accorder parfaitement avec le bracelet et la montre. Enfin, un dernier signe de l’attention portée au produit est que chaque boucle est gravée par laser avec notre logo.

Connecteurs- De la plus grande qualité, ils sont fabriqués en Inox 316L. Nous offrons le choix entre couleur inox poli et couleur noire afin de s’adapter à la montre. Chaque connecteur est testé individuellement sur une de nos montres afin de garantir un assemblage parfait. 

Contrôle Qualité- Chaque bracelet est contrôlé à la main avant envoi pour garantir qu’il répond à nos standards de qualité.


William et Nicolas se sont rencontrés il y a 8 ans pendant leurs études. Les deux associés ont toujours partagé une passion pour la mode, l’innovation et la technologie. William a travaillé dans des PME et start-ups dans le domaine des sciences de la vie et des nouvelles technologies en tant que business développeur alors que Nicolas travaillait dans les médias et la finance.

Afin de les aider dans cette aventure, ils ont assemblé une solide équipe avec des compétences très diverses dans des domaines tels que le luxe, la mécanique de précision, l’entreprenariat et le juridique.

Par conséquent, tous les aspects de ce projet, du design à la production, sont couverts par des individus avec une grande expérience. Cette équipé sera une des clés de la réussite du projet.


Quand nous avons commencé  à travailler sur ce projet, nous sommes partis avec une idée simple, faire de l’Apple Watch un objet de luxe encore plus personnel.

Nous avons tout de suite été attirés par les fonctionnalités et le design de l’Apple Watch mais nous voulions en faire un objet que nos clients seraient encore plus fiers de montrer. Nous voulions offrir une alternative.

Après de nombreux prototypes, nombreuses modifications et quelques maux  de tête nous avons finalement réussi à produire ce que nous pensons être un produit final digne des plus grands en terme de qualité.

Le packaging est actuellement à l’étude mais nous sommes déjà très satisfaits des prototypes fonctionnels.

Il est donc maintenant temps de commencer notre première production.

Afin d’accélérer le processus et donner vie au projet plus rapidement, nous avons besoin de votre support. Avec cette campagne, nous espérons créer assez d’intérêt et prendre assez de précommandes afin de couvrir des coûts d’équipements ainsi que des matériels et matériaux. Grace au travail déjà effectué, nous sommes tout à fait confiants en notre capacité de vous fournir les produits en moins d’un mois après la fin de la campagne. Tous les voyants sont au vert et indiquent que cet objectif est atteignable.

Par conséquent, vous n’avez plus qu’à commander  afin d’être un des premiers à avoir un bracelet Clessant à votre poignet.

Démarquez-vous!

Nous remercions aussi tous nos soutiens  qui veulent juste aider le projet. En remerciement, vous recevrez une vachette cuir Clessant à votre domicile.


L’équipe Clessant est très concernée par le niveau de service offert à ses supporters, early adopters et clients. Le service et la confiance sont dans l’ADN de la marque. Nous avons ardemment travaillé avant cette campagne Indiegogo afin de créer un produit de qualité et surtout de s’organiser pour pouvoir répondre à nos engagements en respectant les délais. Cependant, comme dans tous projets, il y a toujours des impondérables. Les points suivants sont les risques potentiels identifiés et surtout ce que nous avons prévu pour les limiter.

PRODUCTION: Notre chaine de production est prête, cependant, si nous devions avoir une demande beaucoup plus forte qu’attendu, nous pourrions avoir des délais. Nous avons prévu des options pour pallier à cela. Bien que de légers délais puissent arriver, nous ne ferons jamais de compromis sur la qualité du produit.

AMELIORATIONS PRODUITS : nos prototypes sont prêts et nous sommes très satisfaits de la qualité. Cependant, il pourrait y avoir potentiellement des modifications mineures afin d’améliorer encore le produit. Ces changements, s’ils devaient avoir lieu, seront toujours faits au bénéfice de nos clients. De plus, ils seront annoncés et discutés avec nos supporteurs.

Pour conclure, chaque contribution nous rapproche de notre objectif. Par conséquent, nous vous encourageons donc à partager cette page, les photos de nos bracelets et surtout de parler de ce projet au maximum de personnes autour de vous. Les paliers de récompenses ont été conçus pour les clients potentiels Clessant. Cependant, le premier palier est destiné à toute personne qui souhaite seulement supporter Clessant et son équipe.

Vous pouvez donc maintenant appuyer sur « Contribuer » en haut de cette page.

Nous vous remercions par avance pour votre confiance et votre aide pour transformer ce projet en réalité.

Avec nos sentiments les meilleurs, 
William & Nicolas

events and although we could see an impact on delivery time, quality will never
be compromised and delays should be minor.
PRODUCT ADJUSTMENT: Our prototypes are made and we are
satisfied, however, there could potentially be small modifications to further
enhance the product. These changes will always be for the benefit of you, the
customer, and will be announced and discussed with backers.
Any pledge brings us closer to our goal, we encourage
you to share this page, images, and project with as many people as you can, and
also by contributing to the project by clicking the ‘Contribute now’ at the
top of the page.
Thank you for your trust and
support in turning this project into a reality.
Most
sincerely, 
William LAURENT & Nicolas PEROT



Note: These straps are examples of colors available for this campaign.






Page en Français

Clessant vous propose les premiers bracelets de luxe conçus pour l'Apple Watch. Par conséquent, vous avez maintenant le choix de porter un bracelet design, original et qualitatif; démarquer vous!Nos bracelets sont conçus en respectant
les standards les plus stricts et fabriqués avec les matériaux utilisés dans la
bijouterie et l’horlogerie haut de gamme. A contre-courant de la mode qui
consiste à adapter des bracelets classiques, nos bracelets sont spécifiquement
conçus pour l’Apple Watch. Sans compromis.Une montre influence la façon dont vous êtes perçu,
mais aussi votre propre perception de vous-même. Par conséquent, le but de Clessant
est de vous fournir un produit à la hauteur de vos attentes. Nous savons que
nombre d’entre vous désirent plus que les fonctionnalités et les services
rendus par l’Apple Watch, beaucoup recherchent un produit personnalisé
reflétant leur caractère et leur envies. 
Pour répondre à ces attentes, nous
vous offrons donc une large gamme composée de bracelets de qualité avec de
nombreuses options en terme de types de cuirs (exotiques ou non) et de couleurs
afin de répondre au mieux à vos désirs et à vos humeurs. Cette gamme continuera
de grandir dans les mois et années à venir.
En plus du choix, un des éléments
essentiels offerts par les bracelets Clessant est qu’ils ont été conçus
spécifiquement pour l’Apple Watch. Aucun compromis ou raccourci n’a été pris
dans la conception. Tous les détails ont été pensés avec l’Apple Watch au centre
du projet.
Quand vous recevrez votre nouveau
bracelet, vous aurez juste à déconnecter votre ancien bracelet afin d’emboiter
le bracelet Clessant. Nul besoin de préparation, d’outils ou d’adaptateurs. 
Simplicité, élégance, personnalité.
Nous espérons que nos produits vous séduiront et que contribuerez à faire
de Clessant un succès.Nos bracelets en un clin d'oeil:
Créés spécifquement pour l'Apple Watch
A partir de cuirs de grande
qualité (sélectionnés dans les meilleures tanneries en France, Italie,
Angleterre et Belgique)
Dessinés en France

Fabriqués à la main en Europe
de l’Ouest avec assemblage final fait en France

Boucles et éléments de
connections fabriqués  en inox




Cuir de veau – Tannage végétal (cuirs de CK1 à 3): Peau très douce au
toucher avec finition mate (le cuir absorbe la lumière donc pas d’éclat) -> Le
tannage végétal est un processus naturel qui révèle la texture naturelle du
cuir. Ce type de cuir se patine avec le temps et a donc beaucoup de
personnalité.
Cuir de Veau – Chromage (cuirs de CK4 à 6) : Peau très douce au touché
avec finition mate. Le tannage au chrome permet d’avoir des couleurs très
profondes et homogènes.


Cuir de Buffle (Cuirs de BK1 à 4): Finition nubuck mate. Cuir extrêmement
doux au toucher avec une texture type velours.


Cuirs de Lézard
(Cuirs de LK1 à 5): Peau douce au toucher  mais légèrement texturée. Finition satin-mate
avec reflets.


Cuirs de crocodile (CR1, CR2, CR5, CR6): Peau texturée. Petites écailles.
Finition mate. Couleurs saturées. 
Cuirs alligator ventre (CR3, CR4): Peau texturé. Petites écailles. Couleurs
pastel. -> Même palier de contribution que pour le crocodile. 


Cuir alligator: Peaux texturées. Larges
écailles, assez carrées. 
Note:

A la fin de cette campagne de
précommandes Indiegogo, nous ferons parvenir à nos soutiens qui ont choisi un
ou des bracelets un questionnaire afin qu’ils renseignent leur choix de
couleurs pour le bracelet et le connecteur ainsi que la taille de leur montre.
Les cuirs sélectionnés pour
nos produits l’ont été pour leurs qualités. Certains cuirs peuvent avoir de
légères irrégularités ou légères marques (veines ou traces de croissance).
Ces irrégularités ou marques ne sont pas des défauts mais plutôt la preuve de
l’utilisation d’un cuir naturel. Après la fabrication, chaque
bracelet passe dans les mains d’un membre de notre équipe contrôle qualité afin
de vérifier que le bracelet est bien conforme à nos standards. Les bracelets ne
passant pas l’inspection sont détruits.

Les couleurs peuvent varier de
façon subtile par rapport aux photos. Chaque bracelet Clessant est unique!




Forme – Légèrement fuselée
afin d’offrir un bracelet plus raffiné et élégant. Etant donné que nous
travaillons sur des bracelets assez larges, c’est la meilleure façon de
procéder afin de garantir le meilleur équilibre visuel du produit.
La largeur des bracelets est choisie
afin que le connecteur et le bracelet soient parfaitement adaptés. Ceci garantit
l’esthétique mais aussi la durabilité du produit.
Le
positionnement des trous pour la boucle est choisi afin d’obtenir une fermeture
facile et sécurisée. Le positionnement garantit aussi le maintien optimal de la
montre afin d’en garder toutes les fonctionnalités.
Boucle – Les boucles
Clessant sont fabriquées chez de grands fournisseurs de l’horlogerie. Elles
sont minutieusement inspectées et leurs tailles hors standard ont été
sélectionnées afin de s’accorder parfaitement avec le bracelet et la montre.
Enfin, un dernier signe de l’attention portée au produit est que chaque boucle
est gravée par laser avec notre logo.
Connecteurs- De la plus
grande qualité, ils sont fabriqués en Inox 316L. Nous offrons le choix entre couleur
inox poli et couleur noire afin de s’adapter à la montre. Chaque connecteur est
testé individuellement sur une de nos montres afin de garantir un assemblage
parfait. 
Contrôle Qualité- Chaque bracelet est contrôlé à la main avant envoi pour garantir qu’il répond
à nos standards de qualité.



William et Nicolas se sont rencontrés il
y a 8 ans pendant leurs études. Les deux associés ont toujours partagé une
passion pour la mode, l’innovation et la technologie. William a travaillé dans
des PME et start-ups dans le domaine des sciences de la vie et des nouvelles
technologies en tant que business développeur alors que Nicolas travaillait
dans les médias et la finance. 
Afin de les aider dans cette aventure,
ils ont assemblé une solide équipe avec des compétences très diverses dans des
domaines tels que le luxe, la mécanique de précision, l’entreprenariat et le
juridique.
Par conséquent, tous les aspects de ce
projet, du design à la production, sont couverts par des individus avec une
grande expérience. Cette équipé sera une des clés de la réussite du projet.


Quand nous avons commencé  à travailler sur ce projet, nous sommes partis
avec une idée simple, faire de l’Apple Watch un objet de luxe encore plus
personnel. 
Nous avons tout de suite été attirés par
les fonctionnalités et le design de l’Apple Watch mais nous voulions en faire
un objet que nos clients seraient encore plus fiers de montrer. Nous voulions
offrir une alternative.
Après de nombreux prototypes, nombreuses
modifications et quelques maux  de tête nous
avons finalement réussi à produire ce que nous pensons être un produit final
digne des plus grands en terme de qualité. 
Le packaging est actuellement à l’étude
mais nous sommes déjà très satisfaits des prototypes fonctionnels. 
Il est donc maintenant temps de
commencer notre première production.
Afin d’accélérer le processus et donner
vie au projet plus rapidement, nous avons besoin de votre support. Avec cette
campagne, nous espérons créer assez d’intérêt et prendre assez de précommandes
afin de couvrir des coûts d’équipements ainsi que des matériels et matériaux. Grace
au travail déjà effectué, nous sommes tout à fait confiants en notre capacité
de vous fournir les produits en moins d’un mois après la fin de la campagne.
Tous les voyants sont au vert et indiquent que cet objectif est atteignable.
Par conséquent, vous n’avez plus qu’à
commander  afin d’être un des premiers à
avoir un bracelet Clessant à votre poignet.
Démarquez-vous!

Nous remercions
aussi tous nos soutiens  qui veulent
juste aider le projet. En remerciement, vous recevrez une vachette cuir
Clessant à votre domicile.


L’équipe Clessant est très concernée par le niveau de service offert à ses supporters,
early adopters et clients. Le service et la confiance sont dans l’ADN de la
marque. Nous avons ardemment travaillé avant cette campagne Indiegogo afin de créer
un produit de qualité et surtout de s’organiser pour pouvoir répondre à nos
engagements en respectant les délais. Cependant, comme dans tous projets, il y
a toujours des impondérables. Les points suivants sont les risques potentiels identifiés
et surtout ce que nous avons prévu pour les limiter. 
PRODUCTION: Notre chaine de production est prête, cependant, si nous
devions avoir une demande beaucoup plus forte qu’attendu, nous pourrions avoir
des délais. Nous avons prévu des options pour pallier à cela. Bien que de légers
délais puissent arriver, nous ne ferons jamais de compromis sur la qualité du
produit.
AMELIORATIONS PRODUITS : nos prototypes sont prêts et nous sommes très
satisfaits de la qualité. Cependant, il pourrait y avoir potentiellement des
modifications mineures afin d’améliorer encore le produit. Ces changements, s’ils
devaient avoir lieu, seront toujours faits au bénéfice de nos clients. De plus,
ils seront annoncés et discutés avec nos supporteurs.
Pour conclure, chaque contribution nous rapproche de notre objectif. Par
conséquent, nous vous encourageons donc à partager cette page, les photos de
nos bracelets et surtout de parler de ce projet au maximum de personnes autour
de vous. Les paliers de récompenses ont été conçus pour les clients potentiels
Clessant. Cependant, le premier palier est destiné à toute personne qui souhaite
seulement supporter Clessant et son équipe.
Vous pouvez donc maintenant appuyer sur « Contribuer » en haut de
cette page. 
Nous vous remercions
par avance pour votre confiance et votre aide pour transformer ce projet en
réalité. 
Avec nos sentiments
les meilleurs, 
William & Nicolas

story:
SPEC



                 

                     Wonder much fits in a RuckJack?












Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What do I do with my stuff when I turn the backpack to a jacket?

A: Every RuckJack comes with an extra cargo bag on the back panel. 

Q: How much does RuckJack hold?

A: RuckJack can hold up to 35 pounds and has enough room to fit a parachute.

Q: Is RuckJack wind & waterproof?

A: Yes, We have two edition. All weather jacket (Sonar) & Light Weather jacket (Switch & Morph)

Q: Where can I buy this jacket?

A: You can buy (pre-order) your RuckJack on HERE

Q: What are the available size, color and style option?

A: You can get the size, color and more style information on HERE

Q: How do I pick my color, size and style when I buy on indiegogo?

A: At the end of campaign you will receive a final survey to fill out your order information.

EXCHANGE POLICY

If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the jackets shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your jacket for any reason, we will allow you to do that, but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our jackets at highly discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns

story:
• Exterior: High quality scratch proof PU
  • Interior: Matrix-3D Polyester
  • Zero-G 4-point independent suspension
  • Interchangeable lower suspension strap
  • EVA water/shock resistant base
  • 100% Water-resistant
  • Water-resistant zippers
  • Magnetic locking hardware
  • 12 Unique storage compartments
  • Laptop compartments
  • Padded iPad compartment (Fits iPad & iPad mini)
  • Detachable iPhone sized pockets (Fits iPhone 6 & 6 Plus)
  • Utility hatch (Designed for electronic accessories & essentials)
  • Pen slots & key ring
  • Concealed wallet pocket
  • Padded shoulder strap for extra comfort
  • Dimensions:
    • Zero-G 15": 13.5W x 19L x 5.75D (Inches) / 34W x 48L x 15D (CM) • 3lb / 1.4kg 
      • capacity up to 20 liter
      • laptop compartment: opening zipper length 15.5", internal size 15 x 13.5"
      • waterpocket: 4 1/2" x 7 1/2"
    • Zero-G 13": 12.75W x 17.5L x 5.25D (Inches) / 32W x 45L x 13D (CM) • 2.4lb / 1.1kg 
      • capacity up to 15 liter
      • laptop compartment: opening zipper length 14", internal size 14 x 12.5"
      • waterpocket: 4" x 7" 

 

  

 

 

 

 

Imagine a backpack not limited by gravity. One built with a weight-dispersion mechanism based on the suspension systems found in contemporary racecars, delivering a travel experience unaffected by bumps and vibrations — isolated from external irregularities to deliver a smooth and weightless trip.

 

World's First Backpack with 4-Point Independent Suspension

Introducing Project Zero-G: The ultimate backpack. With the world's first 4-point independent suspension - a dynamic system that maximizes comfort by minimizing weight – Zero-G offers the most comfortable and responsive wearable experience in the world.

As modern adventurers, we found that we needed a backpack that would both lighten our load and adapt more flexibly to our constantly changing environment. That’s why we launched Project Zero-G. After over 18 months of meticulously considering all of the existing limitations of traditional backpacks and obsessing over every functional and aesthetic detail, we finally designed the backpack of our dreams, developing original wearable technology in the process.

 

  

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

Let our suspension take the weight, not your shoulders.

Project Zero-G distinguishes itself from every other backpack on the market through both its design and its unique suspension system. Each of our backpack’s straps has both an upper and lower suspension — independent shock-absorbing points that reduce stress by distributing impact. The tops of each strap are connected with durable bellows — springy and permanently attached — while the bottoms are interchangeable, letting you fine-tune your Zero-G’s suspension to match your load and activity. From hard to soft, the included suspension sets offer 3 spring rates: heavy-duty, normal, and light.

 

 

The main goal of the Zero-G project was to create a system that protects your back by reducing the amount of pressure levied on your shoulders while you’re in motion; we were successful. Thanks to our proprietary suspension system, the effective force transferred to your shoulders while you walk, jog, or run is substantially reduced, and the faster you move, the greater the reduction in force. Students, travelers, and athletes will appreciate a 25% reduction in stress as they rush to class, through a terminal, or up a mountainside.

 

 

 

 

Smart Storage

Innovative, elegant, and functional — with 12 individual storage compartments, an ultra-matte, scratch-proof PU leather exterior, and an interior covered in a 3D polyester matrix design — Project Zero-G is the next-generation backpack from KP’s ever-evolving line of groundbreaking products. Please watch our demo video to see details of the Zero-G's unique features and storage compartments.

 

 

 

 

                               

   

 

 

Modern sophisticated cars are equipped with adjustable suspension for ride comfort and performance on different road conditions.

The Zero-G system allows you to fine-tune your backpack's suspension to match the load and the activity. 

 

 

 

 

 

The new KP Utility Hook II is convenient, sleek and durable. It can be attached to the key ring of the Zero-G backpack. Perfect for your keys or pocket tools. It also has a built-in bottle opener and LED flashlight.

Made of wear-resistance zinc alloy. Weight: 1.2 oz / 34 g

Dimensions: 3.3”L x 1.3”W x 0.3”D (Inches) / 85L x 33W x 8D (MM)

 

 

KP is all about good design that makes your life easier. Our new MultiPen combines a ballpoint pen, tablet stylus, laser pointer and flashlight; all the essential tools in one elegantly designed pen. With the KP MultiPen you'll never need to fumble around for the tool that you need.

  • A durable rubber tip that won’t scratch the screen of your device and allows the user to type accurately
  • Black ink rollerball pen for smooth, crisp & clear writing
  • A laser pointer that projects up to 500 yd / 457 m
  • Ultra bright LED flashlight
  • Body made of solid copper with matte finishing
  • Weighted and balanced for a smooth and delicate feel

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 Learn more about the KP Duffle

 

 

 

 

KP> KEEP PURSUING is a small design start-up based in Los Angeles, CA. Our team is comprised of members who have different talents and skills, but who all work towards the same goal: to blend art, function and innovation - harmoniously - with design.

 

 

 

                         

 

Thank you for believing in us. We can't wait to have you experience the amazing Zero-G backpack.

Thanks to all the people who helped put this project together. DP: Powell Robinson, Gaffer: Eitan Almagor, Cam Op: Adam Morely, Drone Op: Brian Bloss, Actor: Evan Gomez, Omar Ting, Sound Score: Kyle Hnedak, Voice Over: Jon Drew, Copy Writer: Dominik Sklarzyk, Antelope Valley Harley-Davidson: Scott Kellerman, Candy Shipley. Pattern maker: Tang Liang, Coordinator: Wang Sheng-Jian. Special thanks to Stone Yeh. We couldn't have done it without your support!

FAQ:

1. Is the magnetic buckle safe?

The magnetic buckle is made by Fidlock. It allows the backpack to be easily-closed, but for people to open it, it can be nearly impossible to undo the buckle unless they know the trick. We have posted a short video of how the buckle works in details in the past. Please check it out on our social media pages: 


Instagram: @keep_pursuing 
Snapchat: @keep_pursuing 
Facebook: facebook.com/Keeppursuing

It was our goal to not only make a sleek-looking backpack, but also guarantee the SAFETY of our backers’ personal items. For everything we do, you backers are the most important people.

Is the entire backpack water-resistant or just the hood?

The entire backpack is water-resistant, which means your important belongings will remain dry even in heavy rains.

How durable is the backpack? Does it hold its shape? Does the material PU leather last and how do I clean it?

We chose PU leather because we want to make fashionable and functional products without hurting animals. The PU leather we chose is one of highest quality materials. It is a very durable and should last for a very long time. However, the backpack's lifetime depends on your environment and how you handle the backpack. PU leather requires very little maintenance such as cleaning and wiping dirt or dust from its surface. It is not only dirt-resistant but also water-resistant. But the backpack is not machine-washable. To clean it, you simply wipe it down with a damp cloth.

There are also paddings in-between the exterior PU leather and the interior lining of the backpack. This means you don't have to worry about stretch marks or the backpack losing its shape.

My laptops don't seem to fit in the backpacks' laptop compartments. 

Everyone has laptops in different sizes so it's totally understandable. But don't forget that the backpack's main compartments are very spacious, so you can always put larger laptops there instead of using the laptop pockets. 

For example, the 15" has a 19" body length and can probably fit a large 17" gaming laptop in there. And the 13" can easily fit a 15" laptop in its main compartment as well. Although we designed the laptop pockets for laptops specifically, you can always get creative and use them for other purposes! The same thing goes for all of our other storage compartments.

How durable is the backpack? Does it hold its shape? Does the material PU leather last and how do I clean it?
We chose PU leather because we want to make fashionable and functional products without hurting animals. The PU leather we chose is one of highest quality materials. It is a very durable and should last for a very long time. However, the backpack's lifetime depends on your environment and how you handle the backpack. PU leather requires very little maintenance such as cleaning and wiping dirt or dust from its surface. It is not only dirt-resistant but also water-resistant. But the backpack is not machine-washable. To clean it, you simply wipe it down with a damp cloth.
There are also paddings in-between the exterior PU leather and the interior lining of the backpack. This means you don't have to worry about stretch marks or the backpack losing its shape.
My laptops don't seem to fit in the backpacks' laptop compartments. 
Everyone has laptops in different sizes so it's totally understandable. But don't forget that the backpack's main compartments are very spacious, so you can always put larger laptops there instead of using the laptop pockets. 
For example, the 15" has a 19" body length and can probably fit a large 17" gaming laptop in there. And the 13" can easily fit a 15" laptop in its main compartment as well. Although we designed the laptop pockets for laptops specifically, you can always get creative and use them for other purposes! The same thing goes for all of our other storage compartments.

story:
The MostRad™ Maverick Wallet

  • Integrated RFID shield, protection against credit card and identity theft.
  • Vertical Quick-Slide card slot for chipped cards.
  • Imported Genuine Leather.
  • Traditional cash pocket for USA and International currencies. Makes for the perfect travel wallet.
  • 8 individual card slots including a pull tab and 2 hidden pockets.

 The MostRad™ Maverick's vertical quick-slide pocket. Access your favorite card instantly.

Quick-pull tab to access less used cards stored in the interior pocket.

Individual interior pocket, perfect for ID's.

The hidden interior pocket, perfect for storing larger bills, important cards, or other small valuable objects.

story:
1st jeans…with light reflection, neon stitches!

Idea and Beginning

The constant demand for these jeans led us to realize "KMK jeans... the original" and bring that unique jeans as a world novelty on the jeans market.

As the parent of a 9-year-old daughter, who was our most important inspiration, I had the vision to create creative jeans for kids which besides the fashion aspect, could also provide safety. This was my most important priority.

KMK jeans were designed to stand out from all other jeans that exist. The  patent was registered by us in 2016 at the Patent Office in Munich.

The KMK jeans style stands for boldness and timeless fashion, now more than ever!

"KMK jeans…the Original" provide a safety function!

Help us to move forward and reach our goal.

The first steps are done. Prototypes, manufactoring, patent are registered.

  • we need the cut patterns for the jeans pants, for the kids pants, by MK Design Munich.
  •  http://www.mk-fashiondesign.com
  •  produce the first 1000 pair of jeans.
  •  best quality of denim
  •  light reflection stripes, neon yarn and rivets
  •  magnetic closures for the kids jeans 

We want to be completely transparent, so we will keep you "all" informed about every single step. 

We’d love you to join us in making this happen - with your "all support" we can make the impossible possible

 

Jeans sizes and prices (from August 2017)

Adjustable waistband with magnetic closures - Inch 18 - 26 Age 4 - 12 

  • Inch Size Kids            18 - 23 (Age 4 - 9)         - Price $49  USD
  • Inch Size Teens        24 - 30 (Age 9 - 16)       - Price $59  USD
  • Inch Size Women     25 - 33 (L 30, 32, 34)   - Price $119 USD
  • Inch Size Men           28 - 40 (L 30, 32, 34)   - Price $129 USD

Limited Edition available every year

Several jeans models are produced each year, with embroidery of the respective year on the back pocket. This makes our jeans unique every year! In 2019 we are planning an anniversary edition from 2017 to 2018.

Furthermore, we will offer reflective patches especially for the kid's jeans so that the jeans reinforce their safety function, and each kid has his own unique jeans. We have many other great ideas that we want to implement. 

Manufacture and production

We believe in the power and quality of American manufacturing. Made in the U.S.A. is our ambition. There are a few highly experienced Manufactures in this country. Our endeavor is to produce in the U.S.A.

We are in touch with some famous Jeans Producers in America to produce our "KMK jeans...the Original" for the USA market!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

If we do not reach the funding goal

We will use the collected amount to take our project "KMK jeans ... the Original" a step further. 

With your contribution, we bring together the following

Only together, with our idea and concept and you as a supporter, we can achieve that kids all over the world are noticed much earlier in road traffic. Up to now, there is no other supplier for kid's jeans with light stripes and safety function. Parents will sleep more quietly when their kids walk safely through the streets on the way to kindergarten or school.

These jeans should be available to everyone on the market so that they can be acquired by parents as well as by others. "KMK Jeans...the Original"

Risks and challenges

In case we are not able to produce and deliver so quickly in a run on the KMK jeans as the many orders will overrun us. But we will find a quick solution for every problem. This is our ambition for all future customers! And we will do it because we have an absolute positive will and our dream of realizing our concept into a company is driven by it.

 

Other ways you can help if you are not eligible as a financial supporter

Talk about the "KMK Jeans ... the Original", the world novelty with your family and friends, your acquaintances, work colleagues and with parents and point out the uniqueness and safety function of the jeans. Striking, lively, stylish and limited, every year new! Please use the Indiegogo tool to share and recommend the "KMK Jeans... the Original" with the worldwide unique light reflections and the neon-colored seams on all your networks and with all your loved ones.  

Giving Back

At the end of our successful campaign we will donate 3 % of the amounts received to the following organization ROWW (Reach out Worldwide the Foundation of Paul Walker) R.I.P. Always in our hearts! 

We want to give a very special Thank You!

First of all to all supporters at Indiegogo who will help us financially in our campaign on Indiegogo. Thank you from the bottom of my heart!)))

I would like to thank my family, my husband for his daily support and for his advice over the past several months who has always strengthened my back. Tianie' Shae, from the first moment you were born, you enriched our lives, thank you for being our girl model at KMK. Thank you for being who you are. Thank you Trifon and Ana-Marija from Crete Island for your immense support at KMK and our models Marios and Mario from Crete Island and Viktoria from St. Petersburg. Thank you guys and lovely people for the unique photo shooting on the island for KMK, your efforts and the special shoots. Pictures say more than words! Special thanks to the team of the photographer Marina from Crete Island, you did a great job! The video shoot crew Martin from Austria, without you much would not have been possible. Special thanks to Don John from Florida Miami for his productive music, you did a perfect job! And a great thank you to Bettina and Ray from Texas who recommended Indiegogo. 

Thanks to all the people mentioned! You let my dreams come true. With my love to you all,

Renata Wagner and family and the great team of the "KMK jeans... the Original" project. 

Renata, Tianiè, Viktoria & Mario...Fotoshooting Crete Island 2016

Ana-Marija & Trifon from Crete Island   

Men Model Marios and Photographer Marina...Shooting Crete Island 2016

Martin Coldice... Video production crete island, special thank you! Austria

Donald John -  Producer Video and Sound - Miami Florida

We are family & team

story:
Rebel Time Co. was founded by Shneur Lakein to craft top of the line watches with a bold, unique look that won't break the bank, and to bring the watchmaking traditions back into our family.​

We spent a year putting together these two designs and making sure we were going to have a watch that besides for taking you on your journey, would serve you well once you got there. 

Our exclusive designs coupled with quality craftsmanship deliver a truly remarkable timepiece.

We started Rebel Time out of respect for quality craftsmanship, modern convenience, and most importantly, for guys who know they shouldn't have to overpay for a great watch.

Rebel Time aims to support local New York businesses by producing our handmade Genuine Leather bands here locally.

We are committed to never compromise on any of our values and our quality doesn’t stop at manufacturing. We’re working with Swiss consultants who have decades of experience creating luxury timepieces.

We made 4 unique options to choose from to suit your style

 

1) Classic Rebel Chrono Black

Matte black finish dial. Chrome outlined raised luminous numbers. Sapphire crystal. 100 meter WR. Handmade genuine leather band made in NYC

2) Classic Rebel Chrono White

White finish dial. Chrome outlines raised black luminous numbers. Sapphire crystal. 100 meter WR. Handmade genuine leather band made in NYC

3) Rebel Aviator Black

Matte black finish with recessed sub-dials on a bronze inner ring. Cut-out luminous numbers. Sapphire crystal. 100 meter WR. Handmade genuine leather band made in NYC

4) Rebel Aviator White

Matte white finish with recessed sub-dials on a bronze inner ring.Cut-out luminous numbers. Sapphire crystal. 100 meter WR. Handmade genuine leather band made in NYC

 

Specifications:

• Case Length with Crown: 48 mm

• Case Diameter: 44 mm

• Case Thickness: 12 mm

• Case Back: Screwed down. Stainless steel. Brushed finish. Raised logo

• Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel

• Strap Width at the Lugs: 22

• Luminous Hands & Dial

• Clasp Material: Stainless Steel

• Water resistant: 10 ATM / 100 Meters

• Battery: Sony SR927W

• Crown Details: Gear design. Raised logo

• Display: Triple chronograph. Date at 4 o'clock

• Movement: Japanese Miyota 0S20 Quarts movement

• Dial: Multi layer. Bold brass option

• Crystal: Sapphire Crystal scratch-resistant.

• Genuine Leather Straps Handmade in New York City

 

We have 3 band options to choose from.

 

 

 

Rebel Time was designed to be a watch that lasts through the ages with it’s timeless style and long-lasting quality. This is not your typical watch.

With a top of the line, scratch-proof stainless steel case, 100 meter WR, Japanese luminous hands, and a extremely reliable Japanese Miyota movement, you’ll wear quality like you’ve never encountered before.

 

 

Quality: Rebel Time is created using only top of the line materials. We wont settle for anything less than the best for each and every part of our watch.

 Accessibility: Although we’ve used top notch materials, we’ve kept Rebel Time affordable. You’ll get more bang for your buck than other high quality watches with loads of style to boot. 

 Style: Your watch shouldn’t be boring. Rebel Time was made to stand out and to reflect unique, urban personalities. 

 Design: We designed Rebel time with bold, timeless class. It comes with a look that’s both handsome and progressive.

 Versatility: Rebel Time is a go where you go watch. It isn’t just meant to sit at a desk. The quality that’s infused in our watch ensures that you can take it anywhere. 

 

 

Rebel Time Warranty  

Quality is what Rebel Time is all about. We are so invested in offering only the best to our backers, that we’re offering a 2 year full warranty for mechanical failure.

Our Social Media

https://www.facebook.com/rebeltimebk

https://www.instagram.com/rebeltimebk

http://www.rebeltime.com/

Why We Need your support  

Creating a solid quantity of high quality watches isn’t easy or affordable.Rebel Time uses high quality materials and top notch design. While we’ve got the quality and craftsmanship down, we’re still in need of funding. To be able to provide this top-notch quality to people everywhere, we need support. Your support will helps us maintain high quality craftsmanship, start manufacturing, supply packaging, and determine logistics. You’re one of a kind, we know that. By supporting Rebel Time, you’ll be one of the first to wear the progressive timepiece and enjoy quality at an incredibly low price.

story:
Natalie Attired Success Update!

Natalie Attired was the 10th highest Fashion campaign overall and the NUMBER ONE  Fashion clothing campaign ever on IndieGoGo!

Contact us at info@natalieattired.com

You can still enjoy the Natalie Attired difference at NatalieAttired.com

Many thanks to all our "early adopters" -- couldn't be here without YOU!

....and THANKS, IndieGoGo, for your invaluable service!

                                      

Natalie Attired is a personalized, convenient, and fun "try before you buy" clothes shopping experience for women of all ages.  Based on your unique style profile, we'll send you a collection of five coordinates from our exclusive labels -- that are ready to go into production -- matched with other contemporary quality brands to create the "looks" you'll love.

WHO IS THE NATALIE ATTIRED CUSTOMER?

Natalie Attired is for women who…are size 2 to 22...are too busy to shop…don’t have a lot of shopping options nearby…are sometimes “hard to fit”…can’t seem to find the right color or style…don’t want to spend their time in front of a computer screen searching for clothes online.

Natalie Attired is for women who...love surprises…want to be on-trend without being trendy…want the freedom to do other things they love while someone else does their clothes shopping for them!

A Natalie Attired box on your doorstep will MAKE YOUR DAY!

HOW DOES IT WORK?

Complete your style profile online   We have carefully crafted a detailed survey that will help us size you up!  Using Shari Braendel's tried, true, and proprietary system, we will be able to determine your body shape and best color palette.  We will also gather information about your lifestyle and fashion style, your shopping habits, apparel preferences, and budget.  We expect our survey to be ready and available on our website at the end of this year.  You will be able to update your profile as often as you like.  Our job is to send you a box, not force you into one.

What's the cost of a box?  Because you will be able to tell us what your budget is when you fill out your style survey, there is no set price for a box or the individual items in a box.  We want to make sure you get the best value for your fashion dollar.

Choose a date to receive your first Natalie Attired box, with the option to schedule regular deliveries – you get to decide when and how often to receive a shipment.  There are no minimums or long-term commitments.  AND, there are no shipping fees for deliveries or returns.

We match your profile with one of our professionally trained Natalie Attired Stylists and she will personally curate a coordinated collection of five items just for you and send them on their way.  We choose clothes from a selection of fashion forward and quality brands along with our own exclusive labels designed to fit and flatter YOU.

Hooray! Your Natalie Attired box arrives!  You have three days to try everything on and decide what you want to keep.  You can buy some of it or none of it.  Check out online.  Return what doesn’t work in the enclosed postage-paid envelope and simply drop it in the mail.

There’s a $20 styling fee for each shipment - but we happily apply it toward your purchase. 

WE HOPE YOU LOVE EVERYTHING IN YOUR BOX!

We didn’t hit it out of the park? That’s OK – there’s virtually no risk for you. You have three days to send back what missed the mark. Returns are on us -- shipping is free both ways.  Don't give up! Just let us know what you did and didn't like.  With each order we will get to know you a little bit better so that you can look forward to your next shipment.  You can schedule regular deliveries, but you don’t have to. YOU decide when and how often to receive a shipment. And remember, the $20 Styling Fee for each box will be applied to the purchase of the items that you keep from that box.

WANT TO GIFT A NATALIE ATTIRED BOX TO SOMEONE SPECIAL?

With Natalie Attired you can give the gift of fashion without pulling your hair out trying to find "just the right thing".  We'll take care of that for you and promise you'll walk away without a hair out of place!  Choose a perk and check out.  When we are ready to send your gift certificate, you simply give us the name of your lucky  recipient.  When we have our survey up and running, the recipient of your generosity will be able to fill out her own profile and, voila!  She'll thank you and we'll thank you - because she's sure to become a Natalie Attired fan!

WHY SHOULD YOU PLACE YOUR CONFIDENCE IN US?

Take a look at who we are -- you'll find our bios by clicking on "See More Details" link next to the hanger icon near the top.  Each of us is accomplished in our respective field and each of us brings something different to the table.  But, we are united by a common goal -- we want to put the fun back into your shopping experience.  And, as women, we understand the perennial challenge of getting the best value for our wardrobe dollars with clothes and outfits that suit our individual styles.

WHAT ARE WE DOING WITH ALL THAT MONEY?

We're going to complete our top notch multi-functioning website, finalize our survey algorithms, start production on our exclusive label collection, source additional brands, and finalize packaging design and marketing materials.  As we grow we will be able to expand production and include more brands.

WHEN WILL YOU BE ABLE TO FILL OUT A STYLE PROFILE SURVEY AND WHEN WILL YOUR BOX BE SHIPPED?

We will have our survey up and running on our website early in 2016.  We expect to send out our first shipment of curated boxes late in January  And WE CAN'T WAIT to get started!!

HOW DID NATALIE ATTIRED CREATE SUCH AN AWESOME VIDEO???

The Natalie Attired team couldn't have done it without an amazing group of professionals and we tip our hats to ALL:  Steve BEEBE, QUARTER MILE FILMS, Damien D'AMICO, Kenan KREIS, Danny ALONSO,  Andy PUTSCHOEGL,               Chris CORSMEIER, Kenny CHANG, Jeremiah SCOTT, Ally HILLIARD,                Lyvonne KLINGLER, Kelly GREER, Amanda SPYKERMAN,                                                our models Lisa THOMAS and Michelle TACHICK,                                                               and everyone in our Focus Groups!


info@natalieattired.com

able to determine your body shape and best color palette.  We will also gather information about
your lifestyle and fashion style, your shopping habits, apparel preferences, and budget.  We expect our survey to be ready and available on our website at the end of this year.  You will be able to update your profile as often as you like.  Our job is to send you a box, not force you into one.
What's the cost of a box?  Because you will be able to tell us what your budget is when you fill out your style survey, there is no set price for a box or the individual items in a box.  We want to make sure you get the best value for your fashion dollar.
Choose a
date to receive your first Natalie
Attired box, with the option to schedule
regular deliveries – you get to decide when and how often to receive a
shipment.  There are no minimums or
long-term commitments.  AND, there are no shipping fees for deliveries or returns.
We match your profile with one of our
professionally trained Natalie Attired
Stylists and she will personally curate a coordinated collection of five items
just for you and send them on their way. 
We choose clothes from a selection of fashion forward and quality brands along with our own exclusive labels designed to fit and flatter YOU. 




Hooray! Your Natalie Attired box arrives!  You have three days to try everything on and decide what you
want to keep.  You can buy some of
it or none of it.  Check out online.  Return what doesn’t work in the enclosed postage-paid envelope and simply drop it in the mail. 

There’s a $20 styling fee for each shipment - but we happily apply it toward your
purchase.  



WE HOPE YOU LOVE EVERYTHING IN YOUR BOX!
We didn’t hit it out
of the park? That’s OK – there’s virtually no risk for you. You have three
days to send back what missed the mark. Returns are on us --
shipping is free both ways.  Don't give up! Just
let us know what you did and didn't like.  With each order we will get to know you
a little bit better so that you can look forward to your next shipment.  You can
schedule regular deliveries, but you don’t have to. YOU decide when and how
often to receive a shipment. And remember, the $20 Styling Fee for each box
will be applied to the purchase of the items that you keep from that box.
WANT TO GIFT A NATALIE ATTIRED BOX TO SOMEONE SPECIAL?
With Natalie Attired you can give the gift of fashion without pulling your hair out trying to find "just the right thing".  We'll take care of that for you and promise you'll walk away without a hair out of place!  Choose a perk and check out.  When we are ready to send your gift certificate, you simply give us the name of your lucky  recipient.  When we have our survey up and running, the recipient of your generosity will be able to fill out her own profile and, voila!  She'll thank you and we'll thank you - because she's sure to become a Natalie Attired fan!
WHY
SHOULD YOU PLACE YOUR CONFIDENCE IN US?
Take a look at who we
are -- you'll find our bios by clicking on "See More Details" link next to the hanger icon near the top.  Each of us is accomplished in
our respective field and each of us brings something different to the table.  But, we are united by a common goal -- we want to put the fun back into your shopping experience.  And, as women, we understand the perennial
challenge of getting the best value for our wardrobe dollars with clothes and
outfits that suit our individual styles. 
WHAT
ARE WE DOING WITH ALL THAT MONEY? 
We're going to complete our top notch multi-functioning
website, finalize our survey algorithms, start production on our exclusive label
collection, source additional brands, and finalize packaging design and
marketing materials.  As we grow we will be able to expand production and include more brands. WHEN WILL YOU BE ABLE TO FILL OUT A STYLE PROFILE SURVEY AND WHEN WILL YOUR BOX BE SHIPPED?
We will have our survey up and running on our website early in 2016.  We expect to send out our first shipment of curated boxes late in January  And WE CAN'T WAIT to get started!!HOW DID NATALIE ATTIRED CREATE SUCH AN AWESOME VIDEO???The Natalie Attired team couldn't have done it without an amazing group of professionals and we tip our hats to ALL:  Steve BEEBE, QUARTER MILE FILMS, Damien D'AMICO, Kenan KREIS, Danny ALONSO,  Andy PUTSCHOEGL,               Chris CORSMEIER, Kenny CHANG, Jeremiah SCOTT, Ally HILLIARD,                Lyvonne KLINGLER, Kelly GREER, Amanda SPYKERMAN,                                                our models Lisa THOMAS and Michelle TACHICK,                                                               and everyone in our Focus Groups!



info@natalieattired.com

story:
Quién soy y qué hago?

Hola! Para los que no me conocen mi nombre es Ariana Morales Cariani. Soy venezolana y vivo en Barcelona desde el 2009. 

Actualmente curso el último año en Diseño de Moda, en el cual como proyecto final debemos realizar una colección de 8 looks. Abarcamos desde el diseño y patronaje de las prendas, hasta la confección, fotos y video de la colección. Es un trabajo duro pero la recompensa es ver materializarse el sueño como diseñador de crear una colección de moda propia. 

Qué es "Blindfold"?

La colección Blindfold es una colección de mujer inspirada en la ceguera. He querido mostrar a través de algo tan visual como la moda, la belleza del braille y de las texturas, que son un aspecto tan importante para aquellas personas que no pueden ver y que perciben el mundo principalmente a través del sentido del tacto. 

El hecho de tener que realizar una colección desde cero significa un gasto considerable, que a través de mi propio esfuerzo y el de mi familia hemos asumido. En  mi país Venezuela actualmente hay un duro control de cambio que impide que mi familia me envíe ayuda monetaria en la moneda local, lo cual dificulta aún más recibir ayuda de su parte. 

Por eso ahora pido una colaboración, por más pequeña que sea, para poder ver hecho realidad este proyecto al cual he dedicado tanto y del cual me siento tan orgullosa.

Lo que reúna irá exclusivamente a la confección de las prendas, fotografía y video de la colección. 

Qué obtienes a cambio de tu generosa colaboración? 

Más allá de mi eterna gratitud, todo el que aporte recibirá una maravillosa recompensa de mi colección: 

  • 1-20€: Postales personalizadas hechas a mano con tu nombre en braille.
  • 20-50€: Monedero con bordado en braille.
  • 50-100€: Bolso con texto en braille.
  • 100€: Bolso + monedero con texto en braille.
  • + de 100€: Prenda personalizada de la colección. 

Si no puedes colaborar difúndelo con tus amigos y familia y ayúdame a convertir este bonito sueño en realidad!

Muchas gracias y mucho amor para todos!!!

story:
MEET THE REVERSIBLE

 

This versatile jacket dress by Redo for working women is a reversible garment which can be worn in four ways. You can wear it as a formal dress or as a jacket when you are on the move. On one side, it has a stunningly smooth plain black fabric which works perfectly for important occasions. And on the other side, we have a classic grey handloom fabric in a houndstooth-inspired weave.

 

 

 

We love fashion and detest waste. And when we couldn’t find women’s workwear which was beautiful, high-performance, sustainable and credible-looking, we made it. On our quest to find out what constitutes good workwear, we spoke to over a hundred women about their experience of dressing up for work. After months of thorough groundwork, we narrowed our findings to certain key aspects which mattered the most to a modern woman. With over 12 innovative features, The Reversible’s workwear design has become a modern essential every woman should own.

Wear it as a dress for important occasions like a meeting, an interview or a public speaking event. It is your go-to dress for all the times you want to project your credibility and influence. And style it as a jacket when you are on the move. The idea is to give the redoer purchasing this garment enough creative freedom. 

 

The anatomy of a Reversible jacket dress and the features which make it boardroom-worthy.

 

We believe that customers have the right to know what their products cost to make. We keep our distribution model lean by cutting out the middlemen to ensure only a 0.5-2x markup. We reveal the true costs- then offer them to you, minus the traditional retail markup of 3-8x. The goal is to offer you the best quality products at the best possible price.

 

 

PERKS

Note: Each perk that you order will contain one Reversible dress, a reusable organic cotton carry bag, a care handbook, and a styling guide. The first 10 backers won't be charged shipping. It's our way of saying thank you for being our earliest supporters. 

 

ETHICALLY MADE

The sustainable process of making The Reversible from scrap to suit. Ethically made in India.

 

 

We believe in buying less and making things last. Our high-quality, durable dresses are built to last because of precision cutting and tailoring. We chose to produce our dress ethically at advanced local productions. The Reversible jacket dress is produced by happy crafts(wo)men at Master G factory who have different interests and support our values. This factory trains marginalized women to be pattern cutters and tailors in a male-dominated industry. Our workwear is designed, constructed and worn by women. Isn’t that amazing?

 

 

SIZING

Note: You can either opt for Custom Sizing option or select from XS-XL sizes. On selecting the Custom Sizing option, we will email you a measuring guide within 24 hours.

 

The fabric is steamed, the sewing machines are revved up and our brains are eager to get to work on your own Reversible. 

It takes 4 days of cutting, tailoring and final quality check to produce an impeccably neat and super durable Reversible. And once the dress is shipped, it may take up to 3-7 days to reach your destination. Expect the garment at your doorstep in 15 days from the date of order placement.

 

Did we say that Redo is a circular company and we want to take responsibility for the garment at the end of its lifecycle? Keep your closet lean by returning The Reversible to us years later once you are done using it. We will donate or upcycle it. Don't wish to part with The Reversible? We get it. Make it an heirloom piece to cherish and pass it down generations.

 

TEAM

 

For all enquiries please email hello@redoworld.in

story:
On April 3, 2019 Petit Pli was announced as a 2019 Global Change Award Winner.  The challenge by the H&M Foundation rewards innovators taking active steps towards making the garment industry circular and waste-free.  Petit Pli is proud to have been recognised for its efforts to reduce waste in wearable design.

 

 

Figure 1: Patent pending growth structure

 

 

 

 

 

London-based Petit Pli was founded in 2017, by trained aeronautical engineer Ryan Mario Yasin. Shortly after Ryan gifted clothes to his newborn nephew, they were already too small! This experience served as a signal: childrenswear today fails to recognise the dynamic & rapidly changing bodies of Earth’s LittleHumans.

Inspired by aerospace engineering, Petit Pli’s continuous size adjustment is a new way of approaching garment design - one suitable to high growth rates in children. Petit Pli uses technical materials that are ultra-lightweight, reinforced, rainproof and breathable because children are extreme athletes.

Over the past two years, we have been hard at work testing and experimenting with a range of designs and fabrics. Petit Pli's interdisciplinary team consists of an agile force of engineers, product designers, fashion designers and sociologists. We have built an entire supply chain from the ground up, exhibited at galleries globally and won prestigious design awards. All our hard work has paid off!

 

Petit Pli's suits have been engineered to be breathable, lightweight and rainproof. While their expanding structure allows for unrivalled freedom of movement & enable LittleHumans to journey & summit dreamscapes and trees with ease.

 

 

 

The concept of Petit Pli is built upon using materials sustainably. Petit Pli's designs significantly reduce waste and CO2 emissions at the point of production, distribution and after purchase. Our garments grow up to 7 sizes – that’s 1 Petit Pli garment purchased in place of 7 traditional ones.

Petit Pli suits are constructed of man-made, recycled fabrics & have a monofibre construction - allowing them to be easily recycled at the end of their use! Along with this, we’ve partnered with a manufacturer in Portugal that derives 30% of their energy from solar panels.

Through its approach towards sustainability, Petit Pli hopes to instil slow-fashion values in growing children by inspiring them to value longevity and innovation in some of the most intimate products our lives - clothes!

 

 

Figure 2: fn(reset) in action

Petit Pli garments can be sculpted & contracted to fit the shape of a LittleHuman, by softly tugging garments along the horizontal with both hands. We call this feature fn(reset).

 

We are pushing present manufacturing capabilities to their limit, as such some irregularities may appear in the garment structures.

 

 

We believe that together we can build a better future for our children. For this reason,  we’ve created a unique range of perks for Backers with & without LittleHumans which reflect Petit Pli’s ethos.

 

 

Backers have the opportunity to own the latest iteration of Petit Pli’s iconic garments in an electric set of colours. Due to the complexity involved in manufacturing, these will be released in limited quantities.

Further information can be found at: petitpli.com

Designed in London. Made in Portugal.

 

 

We are offering a limited number of opportunities to co-design & user-test future Petit Pli - Clothes that grow. The Beta programme will consist of receiving a pioneering garment by October, then giving feedback that helps us iterate the design, and receiving the very final version before anyone else.

You can choose from a jacket that opens at the front or a technical hooded top. These garments are the next generation of Petit Pli and you will receive a minimum of 2 iterations.

 

For a one-off fee:
1. Enlist in the Beta Programme 
2. Receive your first set of Petit Pli garments (months before the rest of the world)
3. Tell us what you love and what features you wish they had 
4. We listen to all of you and come up with the best updates we can
5. We send you the new designs completely free of charge, including the postage 

 

 

With our diverse recognition, we are currently at the forefront of wearables, technology and sustainability - we’d like to share that knowledge with you. We believe that exploration is one of the best forms of education. For Backers keen to explore & learn more about our approach to design & Petit Pli’s experience with entrepreneurship we have created a Mission Journal for your (online/off-line) reading pleasure and a 3-day intensive workshop.

 

 

We’re proud of these testimonials from our Pioneers who tested C-1.0, the first ever Petit Pli garments. Their feedback has helped Petit Pli implement design upgrades in C-2.0, offered here .

 

 

“Our child has been wearing her Petit Pli outfit and we are so proud when we explain it to others. People are really impressed and point it out, which has happened a lot of times.”

 

“Love it! Lightweight, showerproof (and we all loved playing and resetting the pleats). We're going to get a lot of wear out of these”

 

“The clothes look fantastic and my older daughter loves them. She was thrilled when I did a magic trick and the baby clothes grew to big girl clothes.”

 

“The reflective elements were a really funky surprise (they made the baby really visible in the play-tube at the park).”
 

“Love the colour, lightweight, so intrigued that the folds just bounce back Awesome.”

 

“I love it. We get tonnes of comments. They look good separately too. Work well with other items in the wardrobe.”

 

“He loves loves loves the pants. They give him such great mobility. ”

 

 

 

We’re striving to make the best garments for you and for our planet. Petit Pli was born out of a desire to change & slow down fashion for the better. Our sole aim is to offer superior garments, intelligently designed to further humanity whilst considering our environment.

Together, we can build a better future.

petitpli.com
